vor, und es befolgt diese Befehle bis heute.
This Pokémon was created from clay. It r.es:
Este Pokémon fue creado a partir de arcilla. recibió
órdenes de su maestro muchos miles de años
hace, y todavía sigue esas órdenes hasta el día de hoy.
This Pokémon was created from clay. It r.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝是用粘土創造的。它收到了
來自其主人數千年的命令
直到今天，它仍然遵循這些命令。
This Pokémon was created from clay. It r.pt-br:
Este Pokémon foi criado a partir de argila. Recebeu
ordens de seu mestre há muitos milhares de anos
atrás, e ainda segue essas ordens até hoje.

This Pokémon's power level rises along w.en:
This Pokémon's power level rises along with the
temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500
degrees Fahrenheit.
This Pokémon's power level rises along w.es:
El nivel de poder de este Pokémon aumenta junto con el
temperatura de su fuego, que puede alcanzar los 2.500
grados Fahrenheit.
This Pokémon's power level rises along w.de:
Die Kraftstufe dieses Pokémon steigt mit der Zeit
Die Temperatur seines Feuers kann 2.500 erreichen
Grad Fahrenheit.
This Pokémon's power level rises along w.fr:
Le niveau de puissance de ce Pokémon augmente avec le
température de son feu, qui peut atteindre 2 500
degrés Fahrenheit.
This Pokémon's power level rises along w.it:
Il livello di potenza di questo Pokémon aumenta insieme a
temperatura del suo fuoco, che può raggiungere i 2.500
gradi Fahrenheit.
This Pokémon's power level rises along w.zh-tw:
該寶可夢的力量等級隨著
火的溫度可達2,500
華氏度。
This Pokémon's power level rises along w.pt-br:
O nível de poder deste Pokémon aumenta junto com o
temperatura do seu fogo, que pode chegar a 2.500
graus Fahrenheit.

This popular symbol of good fortune will.en:
This popular symbol of good fortune will never
fall over in its sleep, no matter how it's pushed
or pulled.
This popular symbol of good fortune will.es:
Este popular símbolo de buena fortuna nunca
caerse mientras duerme, no importa cómo lo empujen
o tirado.
This popular symbol of good fortune will.de:
Dieses beliebte Glückssymbol wird es nie geben
im Schlaf umfallen, egal wie sehr man es drückt
oder gezogen.
This popular symbol of good fortune will.fr:
Ce symbole populaire de bonne fortune ne sera jamais
tomber dans son sommeil, peu importe la façon dont on le pousse
ou tiré.
This popular symbol of good fortune will.it:
Questo popolare simbolo di buona fortuna non lo farà mai
cadere nel sonno, non importa come viene spinto
o tirato.
This popular symbol of good fortune will.zh-tw:
這種流行的吉祥象徵永遠不會
無論怎樣推它，它都會在睡夢中倒下
或拉。
This popular symbol of good fortune will.pt-br:
Este popular símbolo de boa sorte nunca
cair durante o sono, não importa como seja empurrado
ou puxado.

Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.en:
Though capable of flight, Archeops was
apparently better at hunting on the ground.
Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.es:
Aunque capaz de volar, Archeops era
aparentemente mejor cazando en el suelo.
Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.fr:
Bien que capable de voler, Archeops était
apparemment meilleur pour chasser au sol.
Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.pt-br:
Embora capaz de voar, Arquéops era
aparentemente melhor em caçar no chão.
Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.de:
Obwohl Archaeops flugfähig war, war er es
Offensichtlich ist er besser darin, am Boden zu jagen.
Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.zh-tw:
始祖鳥雖然能夠飛行，
顯然更擅長在地面上狩獵。
Though capable of flight, Archeops was\n.it:
Sebbene capace di volare, Archeops lo era
apparentemente più bravo a cacciare a terra.

Though its punches are powerful, this Po.en:
Though its punches are powerful, this Pokémon's
movements are sluggish. It blows icy bubbles
from its mouth to immobilize its opponents.
Though its punches are powerful, this Po.es:
Aunque sus golpes son poderosos, el poder de este Pokémon
los movimientos son lentos. Sopla burbujas heladas
de su boca para inmovilizar a sus oponentes.
Though its punches are powerful, this Po.fr:
Bien que ses coups soient puissants, celui de ce Pokémon
les mouvements sont lents. Il souffle des bulles glacées
de sa bouche pour immobiliser ses adversaires.
Though its punches are powerful, this Po.it:
Anche se i suoi pugni sono potenti, quelli di questo Pokémon
i movimenti sono lenti. Soffia bolle ghiacciate
dalla bocca per immobilizzare i suoi avversari.
Though its punches are powerful, this Po.pt-br:
Embora seus socos sejam poderosos, a habilidade deste Pokémon
os movimentos são lentos. Sopra bolhas geladas
de sua boca para imobilizar seus oponentes.
Though its punches are powerful, this Po.zh-tw:
雖然它的拳頭很強大，但這只神奇寶貝的
動作遲緩。它吹出冰冷的泡泡
從它的嘴裡發出來使對手動彈不得。
Though its punches are powerful, this Po.de:
Obwohl seine Schläge mächtig sind, sind die dieses Pokémon
Bewegungen sind träge. Es bläst eisige Blasen
aus seinem Mund, um seine Gegner bewegungsunfähig zu machen.

Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.en:
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of
many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life
from a fossil.
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.fr:
Tirtouga est considéré comme l'ancêtre de
de nombreux Pokémon tortue. Il a repris vie
à partir d'un fossile.
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.es:
Tirtouga es considerado el antepasado de
Muchos Pokémon tortuga. Fue devuelto a la vida
de un fósil.
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.it:
Tirtouga è considerato l'antenato di
molti Pokémon tartaruga. È stato riportato in vita
da un fossile.
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.zh-tw:
蒂爾圖加 (Tirtouga) 被認為是
許多烏龜神奇寶貝。它又恢復了生機
來自化石。
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.de:
Tirtouga gilt als der Vorfahre von
viele Schildkröten-Pokémon. Es wurde wieder zum Leben erweckt
aus einem Fossil.
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancesto.pt-br:
Tirtouga é considerado o ancestral de
muitos Pokémon tartaruga. Foi restaurado à vida
de um fóssil.

To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.en:
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing but
mimic a tree. It hates water and flees from rain.
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.it:
Per evitare di essere attaccato, non fa altro che
imitare un albero. Odia l'acqua e fugge la pioggia.
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.es:
Para evitar ser atacado, no hace más que
imitar un árbol. Odia el agua y huye de la lluvia.
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.fr:
Pour éviter d'être attaqué, il ne fait que
imiter un arbre. Il déteste l'eau et fuit la pluie.
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.zh-tw:
為了避免受到攻擊，它什麼也不做，只是
模仿一棵樹。它討厭水並躲避雨。
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.pt-br:
Para evitar ser atacado, ele não faz nada além de
imitar uma árvore. Ele odeia água e foge da chuva.
To avoid being attacked, it does nothing.de:
Um nicht angegriffen zu werden, tut es nichts anderes als
einen Baum nachahmen. Es hasst Wasser und flieht vor Regen.

Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.en:
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it once they've
grown close, but it's a powerful, sharp-clawed
Pokémon, so its Trainer gets covered in scratches.
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.fr:
Torracat laissera son entraîneur le dorloter une fois qu'il l'aura
devenu proche, mais c'est un puissant, aux griffes acérées
Pokémon, donc son dresseur est couvert de rayures.
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.it:
Torracat lascerà che il suo Allenatore lo coccoli dopo averlo fatto
cresciuto vicino, ma è potente e dagli artigli affilati
Pokémon, quindi il suo Allenatore si ricopre di graffi.
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.es:
Torracat dejará que su entrenador lo mime una vez que lo hayan
Se ha acercado, pero es un poderoso, con garras afiladas.
Pokémon, por lo que su Entrenador queda cubierto de arañazos.
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.de:
Torracat lässt sich von seinem Trainer verhätscheln, sobald er es getan hat
nah herangewachsen, aber es ist ein kräftiger, scharfklauiger Mensch
Pokémon, sodass sein Trainer mit Kratzern übersät ist.
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.zh-tw:
一旦他們完成任務，托拉貓就會讓訓練師寵愛它
距離很近，但它是一隻強大的、鋒利的爪子
神奇寶貝，所以它的訓練師佈滿了划痕。
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.pt-br:
Torracat deixará seu treinador mimá-lo assim que tiver
se aproximou, mas é um poderoso e com garras afiadas
Pokémon, então seu Treinador fica coberto de arranhões.

Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.en:
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Bruxish over
areas where warm ocean currents flow, but the
odds are always against it.
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.es:
Toxapex se involucra en feroces batallas con Bruxish
áreas donde fluyen corrientes oceánicas cálidas, pero el
las probabilidades siempre están en contra.
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.it:
Toxapex affronta feroci battaglie con Bruxish
aree dove scorrono le calde correnti oceaniche, ma il
le probabilità sono sempre contro.
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.de:
Toxapex liefert sich heftige Kämpfe mit Bruxish
Gebiete, in denen warme Meeresströmungen fließen, aber die
Die Chancen stehen immer dagegen.
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.fr:
Toxapex se lance dans des batailles féroces avec Bruxish
zones où circulent des courants océaniques chauds, mais le
les chances sont toujours contre.
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.zh-tw:
Toxapex 與 Bruxish 展開激烈戰鬥
溫暖洋流流動的地區，但
情況總是不利的。
Toxapex gets into fierce battles with Br.pt-br:
Toxapex entra em batalhas ferozes com Bruxish por causa
áreas onde fluem correntes oceânicas quentes, mas o
as probabilidades estão sempre contra ele.

Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.en:
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the moves of
its opponents. It strikes with punches that can
turn a dump truck into scrap with just one hit.
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.es:
Usando su hoja, Pangoro puede predecir los movimientos de
sus oponentes. Golpea con puñetazos que pueden
Convierte un camión volquete en chatarra con un solo golpe.
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.it:
Usando la sua foglia, Pangoro può prevedere le mosse di
i suoi avversari. Colpisce con pugni che possono
trasformare un autocarro con cassone ribaltabile in rottame con un solo colpo.
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.fr:
Grâce à sa feuille, Pangoro peut prédire les mouvements de
ses adversaires. Il frappe avec des coups qui peuvent
transformez un camion-benne en ferraille d'un seul coup.
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.pt-br:
Usando sua folha, Pangoro pode prever os movimentos de
seus adversários. Ele ataca com socos que podem
transforme um caminhão basculante em sucata com apenas um golpe.
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.de:
Mithilfe seines Blattes kann Pangoro die Bewegungen von vorhersagen
seine Gegner. Es schlägt mit Schlägen zu, die es können
Verwandle einen Muldenkipper mit nur einem Schlag in Schrott.
Using its leaf, Pangoro can predict the.zh-tw:
Pangoro 可以利用它的葉子來預測
它的對手。它的拳頭可以擊打
只需一擊，即可將一輛自卸卡車變成廢品。

Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.en:
Using its psychic power, it arranges pebbles to
form the shapes of constellations. Some people
believe this Pokémon came from outer space.
Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.es:
Utilizando su poder psíquico, dispone piedras para
Formar las formas de las constelaciones. algunas personas
Creo que este Pokémon vino del espacio exterior.
Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.fr:
Utilisant son pouvoir psychique, il dispose des cailloux pour
former les formes des constellations. Certaines personnes
Je crois que ce Pokémon vient de l'espace.
Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.de:
Mit seiner psychischen Kraft ordnet es Kieselsteine an
bilden die Formen von Sternbildern. Einige Leute
Ich glaube, dass dieses Pokémon aus dem Weltraum stammt.
Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.pt-br:
Usando seu poder psíquico, ele organiza pedras para
formar as formas das constelações. Algumas pessoas
acredito que este Pokémon veio do espaço sideral.
Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.zh-tw:
它利用其精神力量排列鵝卵石
形成星座的形狀。有些人
相信這只神奇寶貝來自外太空。
Using its psychic power, it arranges peb.it:
Usando il suo potere psichico, dispone i sassolini
formano le forme delle costellazioni. Alcune persone
credono che questo Pokémon provenga dallo spazio.

Very protective of its sprawling territo.en:
Very protective of its sprawling territorial area,
this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
Very protective of its sprawling territo.de:
Sehr beschützerisch für sein weitläufiges Territorium,
Dieses Pokémon wird jeden Eindringling heftig angreifen.
Very protective of its sprawling territo.es:
Muy protectora de su extensa área territorial,
Este Pokémon picoteará ferozmente a cualquier intruso.
Very protective of its sprawling territo.fr:
Très protectrice de son territoire tentaculaire,
ce Pokémon picorera férocement tout intrus.
Very protective of its sprawling territo.pt-br:
Muito protetor da sua extensa área territorial,
este Pokémon bicará ferozmente qualquer intruso.
Very protective of its sprawling territo.it:
Molto protettivo nei confronti della sua vasta area territoriale,
questo Pokémon beccherà ferocemente qualsiasi intruso.
Very protective of its sprawling territo.zh-tw:
非常保護其廣闊的領土面積，
這只神奇寶貝會猛烈地啄食任何入侵者。

Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.en:
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriously,
Pancham's always giving others a glare.
But if it's not focusing, it ends up smiling.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.fr:
Voulant être sûr que cela soit pris au sérieux,
Pancham jette toujours un regard noir aux autres.
Mais s'il ne se concentre pas, il finit par sourire.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.pt-br:
Querendo ter certeza de que isso será levado a sério,
Pancham está sempre olhando para os outros.
Mas se não estiver focando, acaba sorrindo.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.es:
Queriendo asegurarse de que se tome en serio,
Pancham siempre mira fijamente a los demás.
Pero si no se concentra, acaba sonriendo.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.it:
Volendo assicurarmi che venga preso sul serio,
Pancham lancia sempre un'occhiataccia agli altri.
Ma se non mette a fuoco, finisce per sorridere.
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.zh-tw:
想要確保它得到認真對待，
潘查姆總是瞪別人一眼。
但如果它不集中註意力，它就會微笑。
Wanting to make sure it's taken seriousl.de:
Ich möchte sicherstellen, dass es ernst genommen wird,
Pancham wirft anderen immer einen bösen Blick zu.
Aber wenn es nicht fokussiert ist, lächelt es am Ende.

When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.en:
When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from
its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear
over buildings.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.fr:
Face à un ennemi coriace, il perd des flammes
ses poignets. Ses pattes puissantes lui permettent de sauter clairement
sur les bâtiments.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.it:
Quando affronta un nemico duro, sprigiona fiamme
i suoi polsi. Le sue zampe potenti gli permettono di saltare
sopra gli edifici.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.es:
Cuando se enfrenta a un enemigo duro, suelta llamas de
sus muñecas. Sus poderosas patas le permiten saltar con claridad.
sobre edificios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.de:
Wenn es einem harten Gegner gegenübersteht, löst es Flammen aus
seine Handgelenke. Seine kräftigen Beine lassen ihn klar springen
über Gebäuden.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.pt-br:
Ao enfrentar um inimigo difícil, ele solta chamas
seus pulsos. Suas pernas poderosas permitem que ele salte
sobre edifícios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.zh-tw:
當面對強敵時，它會釋放火焰
它的手腕。它有力的腿讓它跳躍得更清楚
建築物上方。

When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.en:
When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from
its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over
buildings.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.fr:
Face à un ennemi coriace, il perd des flammes
ses poignets. Ses pattes puissantes lui permettent de sauter au-dessus
bâtiments.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.es:
Cuando se enfrenta a un enemigo duro, suelta llamas de
sus muñecas. Sus poderosas patas le permiten saltar
edificios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.pt-br:
Ao enfrentar um inimigo difícil, ele solta chamas
seus pulsos. Suas pernas poderosas permitem que ele salte
edifícios.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.de:
Wenn es einem harten Gegner gegenübersteht, löst es Flammen aus
seine Handgelenke. Mit seinen kräftigen Beinen kann er problemlos hinüberspringen
Gebäude.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.it:
Quando affronta un nemico duro, sprigiona fiamme
i suoi polsi. Le sue zampe potenti gli permettono di saltare oltre
edifici.
When facing a tough foe, it looses flame.zh-tw:
當面對強敵時，它會釋放火焰
它的手腕。它有力的腿使它能夠跳過

When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.en:
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their
shells. Those that have lived a long, long time
have shells green with moss.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.fr:
Quand les Golem vieillissent, ils arrêtent de perdre leurs
coquilles. Ceux qui ont vécu très, très longtemps
ont des coquilles vertes avec de la mousse.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.es:
Cuando los Golem envejecen, dejan de perder su
conchas. Aquellos que han vivido mucho, mucho tiempo.
tienen conchas verdes con musgo.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.de:
Wenn Golems älter werden, hören sie auf, ihre Haare zu verlieren
Muscheln. Diejenigen, die schon sehr lange gelebt haben
haben Muscheln, die grün mit Moos sind.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.pt-br:
Quando o Golem envelhece, ele para de se livrar de seus
conchas. Aqueles que viveram muito, muito tempo
têm conchas verdes com musgo.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.it:
Quando i Golem invecchiano, smettono di perdere i loro
conchiglie. Quelli che hanno vissuto molto, molto tempo
hanno conchiglie verdi di muschio.
When Golem grow old, they stop shedding.zh-tw:
當傀儡變老時，他們會停止脫落
貝殼。那些活了很久很久的人
貝殼綠色，長滿青苔。

When it gets dark, the light from its br.en:
When it gets dark, the light from its bright,
shiny tail can be seen from far away on the
ocean's surface.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.fr:
Quand il fait sombre, la lumière de sa lumière,
la queue brillante est visible de loin sur le
la surface de l'océan.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.es:
Cuando oscurece, la luz de su brillante,
La cola brillante se puede ver desde lejos en el
la superficie del océano.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.it:
Quando fa buio, la luce è brillante,
la coda lucida può essere vista da lontano sul
superficie dell'oceano.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.de:
Wenn es dunkel wird, geht das Licht aus seinem hellen,
Der glänzende Schwanz ist schon von weitem zu sehen
Meeresoberfläche.
When it gets dark, the light from its br.zh-tw:
當天黑時，燈光從明亮處發出，
從遠處就可以看到閃亮的尾巴
海洋表面。
When it gets dark, the light from its br.pt-br:
Quando escurece, a luz brilha,
cauda brilhante pode ser vista de longe no
superfície do oceano.

When it gets excited, embers rise from i.en:
When it gets excited, embers rise from its head
and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it
loves sweets.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.es:
Cuando se excita, le salen brasas de la cabeza.
y cola y se calienta. Por alguna razón,
le encantan los dulces.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.fr:
Quand il s'excite, des braises sortent de sa tête
et la queue et il fait chaud. Pour une raison ou une autre,
aime les sucreries.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.it:
Quando si eccita, le braci si alzano dalla sua testa
e la coda e fa caldo. Per qualche ragione, esso
ama i dolci.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.zh-tw:
當它興奮時，餘燼會從頭頂升起
和尾巴，它會變熱。由於某種原因，它
喜歡甜食。
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.pt-br:
Quando fica excitado, brasas sobem de sua cabeça
e cauda e fica quente. Por alguma razão,
adora doces.
When it gets excited, embers rise from i.de:
Wenn es aufgeregt ist, steigt Glut aus seinem Kopf
und Schwanz und es wird heiß. Aus irgendeinem Grund ist es
liebt Süßigkeiten.

When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.en:
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use
a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and
Confusion.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.fr:
Lorsqu'il croise les yeux d'un ennemi, il utilisera
un mélange de mouvements psi, tels que l'hypnose et
Confusion.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.es:
Cuando mira a un enemigo a los ojos, usará
una mezcla de movimientos psi, como hipnosis y
Confusión.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.zh-tw:
當它鎖定敵人時，它會使用
混合了 psi 動作，例如催眠和
混亂。
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.de:
Wenn es einen Feind ansieht, wird es ihn benutzen
eine Mischung aus Psi-Bewegungen wie Hypnose und
Verwirrung.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.it:
Quando fissa gli occhi con un nemico, utilizzerà
un mix di mosse psichiche, come Ipnosi e
Confusione.
When it locks eyes with an enemy, it wil.pt-br:
Quando ele encarar um inimigo, ele usará
uma mistura de movimentos psi, como hipnose e
Confusão.

When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.en:
When it sucks in a large volume of seawater,
it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton
of food daily.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.fr:
Lorsqu'il aspire un grand volume d'eau de mer,
cela devient comme une grosse balle rebondissante. Ça mange une tonne
de nourriture quotidiennement.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.de:
Wenn es eine große Menge Meerwasser ansaugt,
es wird wie ein großer, hüpfender Ball. Es frisst eine Tonne
Essen täglich.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.es:
Cuando aspira un gran volumen de agua de mar,
se vuelve como una pelota grande que rebota. come una tonelada
de comida diariamente.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.it:
Quando aspira un grande volume di acqua di mare,
diventa come una grande palla rimbalzante. Ne mangia una tonnellata
di cibo ogni giorno.
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.zh-tw:
當它吸入大量海水時，
它變得像一個大的有彈性的球。牠吃了一噸
每天的食物。
When it sucks in a large volume of seawa.pt-br:
Quando suga um grande volume de água do mar,
torna-se como uma bola grande e saltitante. Come uma tonelada
de comida diariamente.

When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.en:
When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it
gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even
notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.fr:
Quand il bat des rythmes rapides au combat, il
est tellement pris par le rythme qu'il ne peut même pas
remarquez qu'il a déjà assommé son adversaire.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.es:
Cuando toca ritmos rápidos en la batalla,
queda tan atrapado en el ritmo que ni siquiera
Observa que ya ha noqueado a su oponente.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.zh-tw:
當它在戰鬥中敲出急促的節拍時，
完全陷入節奏以至於無法
請注意，它已經擊敗了對手。
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.pt-br:
Quando está tocando batidas rápidas na batalha,
fica tão preso no ritmo que nem consegue
observe que ele já nocauteou seu oponente.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.de:
Wenn es im Kampf schnelle Beats trommelt, ist es
verfängt sich so sehr im Rhythmus, dass es gar nicht mehr funktioniert
Beachten Sie, dass es seinen Gegner bereits KO geschlagen hat.
When it's drumming out rapid beats in ba.it:
Quando suona ritmi rapidi in battaglia, esso
rimane così preso dal ritmo che non lo farà nemmeno
nota che ha già messo KO il suo avversario.

When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.en:
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus coating
its entire body becomes more concentrated—
it'll dissolve anything.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.fr:
Lorsque Sliggoo sent un danger, la couche de mucus
son corps tout entier devient plus concentré—
ça va dissoudre n'importe quoi.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.pt-br:
Quando Sliggoo sente o perigo, a camada de muco
todo o seu corpo fica mais concentrado -
isso dissolverá qualquer coisa.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.it:
Quando Sliggoo avverte il pericolo, si ricopre di muco
il suo intero corpo diventa più concentrato—
dissolverà qualsiasi cosa.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.zh-tw:
當 Sligoo 感覺到危險時，粘液塗層
整個身體變得更加集中——
它會溶解任何東西。
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.es:
Cuando Sliggoo siente peligro, la capa de moco
todo su cuerpo se vuelve más concentrado—
disolverá cualquier cosa.
When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus co.de:
Wenn Sliggoo eine Gefahr spürt, bildet sich eine Schleimschicht
sein ganzer Körper wird konzentrierter –
es wird alles auflösen.

When they see an enemy, their tails stan.en:
When they see an enemy, their tails stand high,
and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their
cheek pouches.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.es:
Cuando ven un enemigo, levantan la cola,
y escupen las semillas de las bayas almacenadas en sus
bolsas en las mejillas.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.fr:
Quand ils voient un ennemi, ils ont la queue haute,
et ils crachent les graines des baies stockées dans leur
poches pour les joues.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.it:
Quando vedono un nemico, tengono alta la coda,
e sputano i semi delle bacche conservate nelle loro
tasche per le guance.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.de:
Wenn sie einen Feind sehen, strecken sie ihren Schwanz hoch,
und sie spucken die Samen der in ihnen gelagerten Beeren aus
Backentaschen.
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.zh-tw:
當它們看到敵人時，它們的尾巴會高高豎起，
他們吐出儲存在他們的漿果中的種子
頰袋。
When they see an enemy, their tails stan.pt-br:
Quando eles veem um inimigo, suas caudas ficam erguidas,
e cuspiram as sementes das frutas armazenadas em seus
bolsas nas bochechas.

When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.en: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't get any points for it.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.fr: Lorsque ce Pokémon est mis KO, lancez une pièce. Si c'est face, votre adversaire ne peut obtenir aucun point.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.es: Cuando este Pokémon quede fuera de combate, lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, tu oponente no podrá obtener ningún punto por ello.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.it: Quando questo Pokémon viene messo KO, lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, il tuo avversario non potrà ottenere alcun punto.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.zh-tw: 當這只神奇寶貝被擊倒時，擲硬幣。如果出現正面，您的對手將無法獲得任何分數。
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.pt-br: Quando este Pokémon for nocauteado, jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, seu oponente não poderá ganhar nenhum ponto por isso.
When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a.de: Wenn dieses Pokémon kampfunfähig ist, wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ kann Ihr Gegner dafür keine Punkte bekommen.

When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.en:
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice
startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder.
It cries until it's exhausted, then it falls asleep.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.es:
Cuando Whismur llora, el sonido de su propia voz
lo sobresalta, haciendo que el Pokémon llore aún más fuerte.
Llora hasta agotarse y luego se queda dormido.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.fr:
Quand Whismur pleure, le son de sa propre voix
le fait sursauter, faisant pleurer le Pokémon encore plus fort.
Il pleure jusqu'à épuisement, puis il s'endort.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.pt-br:
Quando Whismur chora, o som de sua própria voz
assusta, fazendo o Pokémon chorar ainda mais alto.
Ele chora até ficar exausto e depois adormece.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.zh-tw:
當威斯莫哭泣時，是它自己的聲音
嚇到了它，讓神奇寶貝哭得更大聲。
它會哭到筋疲力盡，然後就睡著了。
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.it:
Quando Whismur piange, il suono della sua stessa voce
lo spaventa, facendo piangere il Pokémon ancora più forte.
Piange fino allo sfinimento, poi si addormenta.
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own.de:
Wenn Whismur weint, erklingt seine eigene Stimme
erschreckt es und lässt das Pokémon noch lauter weinen.
Es weint, bis es erschöpft ist, dann schläft es ein.

Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.en:
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky,
schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of
the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.fr:
Chaque fois qu'une pleine lune apparaît dans le ciel nocturne,
des bancs de Jellicent se rassemblent près de la surface de
la mer, attendant que leurs proies apparaissent.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.es:
Cada vez que hay luna llena en el cielo nocturno,
Las escuelas de Jellicent se reúnen cerca de la superficie de
el mar, esperando que aparezca su presa.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.pt-br:
Sempre que uma lua cheia paira no céu noturno,
cardumes de Jellicent se reúnem perto da superfície de
o mar, esperando que suas presas apareçam.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.zh-tw:
每當一輪滿月掛在夜空中時，
傑利森特學校聚集在地表附近
大海裡，等待著獵物的出現。
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.de:
Immer wenn ein Vollmond am Nachthimmel hängt,
Schulen von Jellicent versammeln sich nahe der Oberfläche von
das Meer und wartet auf das Erscheinen ihrer Beute.
Whenever a full moon hangs in the night.it:
Ogni volta che la luna piena è sospesa nel cielo notturno,
le scuole di Jellicent si riuniscono vicino alla superficie di
il mare, in attesa che appaia la loro preda.

Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.en: Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack used by the Pokémon this card is attached to, draw a card.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.fr: Chaque fois que le Pokémon de votre adversaire est mis KO par les dégâts d'une attaque utilisée par le Pokémon auquel cette carte est attachée, piochez une carte.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.es: Siempre que el Pokémon de tu rival quede Fuera de combate por el daño de un ataque utilizado por el Pokémon al que está unida esta carta, roba una carta.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.pt-br: Sempre que o Pokémon do seu oponente for Nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque usado pelo Pokémon ao qual esta carta está ligada, compre uma carta.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.zh-tw: 每當對手的寶可夢因這張卡所附著的寶可夢的攻擊而被擊倒時，抽一張卡。
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.it: Ogni volta che il Pokémon del tuo avversario viene messo KO dai danni di un attacco utilizzato dal Pokémon a cui è assegnata questa carta, pesca una carta.
Whenever your opponent's Pokémon is Knoc.de: Immer wenn das Pokémon deines Gegners durch Schaden durch einen Angriff des Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, kampfunfähig wird, ziehe eine Karte.

With a voice like a human child's, it cr.en:
With a voice like a human child's, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.fr:
Avec une voix semblable à celle d'un enfant humain, il crie
attirer les adultes au plus profond de la forêt et les perdre
parmi les arbres.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.es:
Con una voz como la de un niño humano, clama a
atraer a los adultos hacia las profundidades del bosque, haciéndolos perderse
entre los árboles.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.it:
Con una voce simile a quella di un bambino umano, grida
attira gli adulti nel profondo della foresta, facendoli perdere
tra gli alberi.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.zh-tw:
它用像人類孩子一樣的聲音呼喊著
引誘成年人進入森林深處，讓他們迷路
樹木之間。
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.de:
Mit einer Stimme wie die eines Menschenkindes schreit es
locken Erwachsene tief in den Wald und verirren sie
zwischen den Bäumen.
With a voice like a human child's, it cr.pt-br:
Com uma voz como a de uma criança humana, clama para
atrair adultos para as profundezas da floresta, fazendo com que eles se percam
entre as árvores.

With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.en:
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierces its
prey, and then it pecks at them. Although it also
consumes berries, it's a carnivore at heart.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.fr:
Avec ses griffes acérées, ce Pokémon lui transperce
proie, puis il les picote. Même si c'est aussi
consomme des baies, c'est un carnivore dans l'âme.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.es:
Con sus afiladas garras, este Pokémon perfora su
presa, y luego los picotea. Aunque también
consume bayas, es un carnívoro de corazón.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.it:
Con i suoi artigli affilati, questo Pokémon lo trafigge
preda, e poi li becca. Anche se anche
consuma bacche, è un carnivoro in fondo.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.de:
Mit seinen scharfen Krallen durchbohrt dieses Pokémon seine
Beute, und dann pickt es nach ihnen. Obwohl es auch
isst Beeren, ist im Herzen ein Fleischfresser.
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝用鋒利的爪子刺穿自己的身體
獵物，然後啄食它們。雖然這也
以漿果為食，本質上是肉食動物。
With its sharp claws, this Pokémon pierc.pt-br:
Com suas garras afiadas, este Pokémon perfura seus
presa, e então ele os bica. Embora também
consome frutas vermelhas, é um carnívoro de coração.

With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.en:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.es:
Con nervios de acero, nada puede perturbarlo. es
más ágil y activo de lo que parece.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.fr:
Avec des nerfs d’acier, rien ne peut la perturber. C'est
plus agile et actif qu’il n’y paraît.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.zh-tw:
有著鋼鐵般的意志，沒有什麼可以擾亂它。它是
比看上去更加敏捷和活躍。
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.it:
Con nervi d’acciaio, nulla può turbarlo. Lo è
più agile e attivo di quanto sembri.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.pt-br:
Com nervos de aço, nada pode perturbá-lo. É
mais ágil e ativo do que parece.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.de:
Mit Nerven aus Stahl kann es nichts aus der Ruhe bringen. Es ist
agiler und aktiver als es scheint.

With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.en:
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its
target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten—
Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.es:
Con la boca sobre su vientre, Dusknoir se traga su
objetivo completo. El alma es lo único que se come.
Dusknoir arroja el cuerpo antes de partir.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.fr:
La bouche sur le ventre, Dusknoir avale son
cibler l'ensemble. L'âme est la seule chose mangée—
Dusknoir dégorge le corps avant de partir.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.it:
Con la bocca sulla pancia, Dusknoir lo ingoia
obiettivo intero. L'anima è l'unica cosa che si mangia—
Dusknoir vomita il corpo prima di partire.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.zh-tw:
黑夜將嘴放在腹部，將其吞下
目標整體。靈魂是唯一被吃掉的東西——
暮色在離開前吐出了屍體。
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.pt-br:
Com a boca na barriga, Dusknoir engole
alvo inteiro. A alma é a única coisa comida -
Dusknoir despeja o corpo antes de partir.
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir sw.de:
Mit dem Mund auf dem Bauch schluckt Dusknoir es
Ziel ganz. Die Seele ist das Einzige, was gegessen wird –
Dusknoir spuckt den Körper aus, bevor er geht.

Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.en: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a Supporter card you find there and discard it.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.pt-br: Seu oponente revela sua mão. Escolha uma carta de Apoiador que encontrar lá e descarte-a.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.fr: Votre adversaire révèle sa main. Choisissez une carte Supporter que vous y trouvez et défaussez-la.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.es: Tu oponente revela su mano. Elige una carta de Partidario que encuentres allí y deséchala.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.it: Il tuo avversario rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta Aiuto che trovi lì e scartala.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.de: Ihr Gegner deckt seine Hand auf. Wähle eine Unterstützerkarte, die du dort findest, und wirf sie ab.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.zh-tw: 你的對手亮出了他們的牌。選擇您在那裡找到的一張支持者卡並將其丟棄。

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Dormido.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Endormi.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Adormecido.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於睡眠狀態。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è addormentato.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now As.de: Das aktive Pokémon deines Gegners schläft jetzt.

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Brûlé.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Quemado.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.de: Das aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt verbrannt.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在被燒毀了。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è ora bruciato.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Bu.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Queimado.

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Confundido.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.de: Das aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt verwirrt.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è ora confuso.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Confuso.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於混亂狀態。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Co.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Confus.

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival ahora está Envenenado.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.pt-br: O Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente agora está Envenenado.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.zh-tw: 你對手的主動神奇寶貝現在中毒了。
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est désormais Empoisonné.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario ora è avvelenato.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.de: Das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt vergiftet.

1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.en: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.zh-tw: 隨機選擇 1 只對手的神奇寶貝 4 次。每次選擇一隻神奇寶貝，對其造成 50 點傷害。

A body made up of nothing but muscle mak.en: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.
A body made up of nothing but muscle mak.zh-tw: 僅由肌肉組成的身體使得這只神奇寶貝用觸手進行的格鬥動作非常強大。

A common sight in forests and woods. It.en: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
A common sight in forests and woods. It.zh-tw: 森林和樹林中常見的景象。它在地面上拍打翅膀，揚起令人眼花繚亂的沙子。

A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glid.en: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glid.zh-tw: 聰明又善良的神奇寶貝，它在海面上滑行，周圍迴響著優美的歌聲。

A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely see.en: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely see.zh-tw: 罕見的膽怯的精靈寶可夢，一旦感覺到有人就會逃跑並躲起來。

A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered.en: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.
A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered.zh-tw: 由於突變而被發現的雙頭寶可夢。它的運行速度超過每小時 60 英里。

All it does is sleep during the daytime..en: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
All it does is sleep during the daytime..zh-tw: 它所做的就是在白天睡覺。晚上，它眼睛會發光，在自己的領地巡邏。

Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon.en: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝幾乎無法移動，只有在遇到危險時才能硬化外殼來保護自己。

Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.en: Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.
Although it's carrying its baby in a pou.zh-tw: 儘管袋鼠肚子上懷著孩子，但袋鼠的腳步卻很快。它通過快速刺擊來恐嚇對手。

Although its fur has many admirers, it i.en: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
Although its fur has many admirers, it i.zh-tw: 雖然它的皮毛有很多崇拜者，但由於它反复無常的卑鄙行為，很難作為寵物飼養。

An ancient picture scroll shows that peo.en: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.
An ancient picture scroll shows that peo.zh-tw: 一幅古老的畫卷顯示，人們被它奔跑穿過草原的動作所吸引。

An enemy that takes its eyes off any of.en: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads—even for a second—will get pecked severely.
An enemy that takes its eyes off any of.zh-tw: 敵人如果將目光從三個頭中的任何一個身上移開——哪怕只是一秒鐘——都會被狠狠地啄一下。

An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.en: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.
An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It ma.zh-tw: 力量不足、可憐的神奇寶貝。在極少數情況下，它可能會跳得很高，但永遠不會超過七英尺。

Artillery platforms built into the walls.en: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.
Artillery platforms built into the walls.zh-tw: 建在古城堡城牆上的砲台是古魯克可以發射能量束的棲息地。

As it digs through the ground, it absorb.en: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
As it digs through the ground, it absorb.zh-tw: 當它挖掘地面時，它會吸收許多堅硬的物體。這就是它的身體如此堅固的原因。

As long as this Pokémon is in the Active.en: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.
As long as this Pokémon is in the Active.zh-tw: 只要這只神奇寶貝在活動區域​​，對手就不能使用手牌中的任何支持者卡。

At the end of its life-span, Melmetal wi.en: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
At the end of its life-span, Melmetal wi.zh-tw: 在其使用壽命結束時，美錄金屬會生鏽並分崩離析。留下的小碎片最終將重生為美錄坦。

Because it can use all kinds of moves, m.en: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.
Because it can use all kinds of moves, m.zh-tw: 因為它可以使用各種招式，許多科學家認為喵是神奇寶貝的祖先。

Because some Omanyte manage to escape af.en: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.
Because some Omanyte manage to escape af.zh-tw: 由於一些阿曼人在被恢復後設法逃脫或被人類釋放到野外，這個物種正在成為一個問題。

Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gath.en: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.
Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gath.zh-tw: 這些神奇寶貝從污泥中誕生，現在聚集在污染的地方並增加了體內的細菌。

By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow p.en: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow p.zh-tw: 通過使下巴脫臼，它可以吞下比自己大的獵物。吃完飯後，它會蜷縮起來休息。

Carrying food through Fearow's territory.en: Carrying food through Fearow's territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!
Carrying food through Fearow's territory.zh-tw: 通過費羅領地運送食物是很危險的。它會瞬間把你的食物搶走！

Choose 1 of your {W} Pokémon, and flip a.en: Choose 1 of your {W} Pokémon, and flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.
Choose 1 of your {W} Pokémon, and flip a.zh-tw: 選擇你的 1 個 {W} 神奇寶貝，然後擲硬幣，直到出現反面。對於每個頭，從你的能量區取出一個 {W} 能量並將其附加到該神奇寶貝上。

Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s at.en: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn’t have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.
Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon’s at.zh-tw: 選擇對手寶可夢的1只攻擊，作為這次攻擊。如果該神奇寶貝沒有使用該攻擊所需的能量，則該攻擊不會執行任何操作。

Cloyster that live in seas with harsh ti.en: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
Cloyster that live in seas with harsh ti.zh-tw: 生活在潮汐洶湧的海洋中的蛤蚌，其貝殼上長有又大又尖的尖刺。

Despite their elegant appearance, they c.en: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
Despite their elegant appearance, they c.zh-tw: 儘管外表優雅，但它們卻能有力地扇動翅膀，飛翔千里。

Discard 1 {R} Energy from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 1 個 {R} 能量。

Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 2 個 {P} 能量。
Discard 2 {P} Energy from this Pokémon..es: Descarta 2 {P} de Energía de este Pokémon.

Discard a random Energy from your oppone.en: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.zh-tw: 丟棄對手的活躍神奇寶貝中的隨機能量。
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.fr: Défaussez une Énergie aléatoire du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.es: Descarta una Energía aleatoria del Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.pt-br: Descarte uma Energia aleatória do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.de: Lege eine zufällige Energie vom Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners ab.
Discard a random Energy from your oppone.it: Scarta un'Energia casuale dal Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.

During this turn, attacks used by your N.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Ninetales, Rapidash, or Magmar do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During this turn, attacks used by your N.zh-tw: 這個回合中，你的九尾、急流或熔岩使用的攻擊對對手的活躍寶可夢造成 +30 點傷害。

During this turn, attacks used by your P.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.zh-tw: 這個回合中，自己的寶可夢的攻擊對對手的活躍寶可夢造成+10點傷害。
During this turn, attacks used by your P.es: Durante este turno, los ataques utilizados por tu Pokémon hacen +10 de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.fr: Durant ce tour, les attaques utilisées par votre Pokémon infligent +10 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.it: Durante questo turno, gli attacchi usati dai tuoi Pokémon infliggono +10 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.pt-br: Durante este turno, os ataques usados ​​pelos seus Pokémon causam +10 de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.de: Während dieser Runde fügen Angriffe deines Pokémon dem aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners +10 Schadenspunkte zu.

During your opponent’s next turn, attack.en: During your opponent’s next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −20 damage.
During your opponent’s next turn, attack.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，防御神奇寶貝使用的攻擊造成−20點傷害。

During your opponent's next turn, the De.en: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.
During your opponent's next turn, the De.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，守方寶可夢不能攻擊。

During your opponent's next turn, this P.en: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.
During your opponent's next turn, this P.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝受到的攻擊傷害為-20。

Each of Exeggutor's three heads is think.en: Each of Exeggutor's three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don't seem to be very interested in one another.
Each of Exeggutor's three heads is think.zh-tw: 椰蛋樹的三個腦袋分別在思考著不同的想法。三人似乎對彼此都不太感興趣。

Emitting powerful sound waves tires it o.en: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won't be able to fly for a little while.
Emitting powerful sound waves tires it o.zh-tw: 發出強大的聲波使其疲憊不堪。之後，它將會有一段時間無法飛翔。

Even though its body is extremely skinny.en: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
Even though its body is extremely skinny.zh-tw: 儘管它的身體極其瘦弱，但捕捉獵物的速度卻快得驚人。

Females are more sensitive to smells tha.en: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they'll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
Females are more sensitive to smells tha.zh-tw: 女性比男性對氣味更敏感。覓食時，它們會用鬍鬚檢查風向並保持在捕食者的下風處。

Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。如果兩人都是正面，則這次攻擊會造成 80 點額外傷害。

Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.de: Wirf 2 Münzen. Wenn beide Köpfe sind, fügt dieser Angriff 80 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.
Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads,.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Si les deux sont face, cette attaque inflige 80 dégâts supplémentaires.

Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.en: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched {R} Pokémon in any way you like.
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.zh-tw: 翻轉 3 個硬幣。從你的能量區取出相當於頭部數量的 {R} 能量，並以你喜歡的任何方式將其附加到你的後備 {R} 神奇寶貝上。
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.fr: Lancez 3 pièces. Prenez une quantité d'Énergie {R} de votre Zone d'Énergie égale au nombre de têtes et attachez-la à votre Pokémon {R} de Banc comme vous le souhaitez.
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.es: Lanza 3 monedas. Toma una cantidad de Energía {R} de tu Zona de Energía igual al número de cabezas y únela a tus Pokémon {R} en Banca de la forma que quieras.
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.pt-br: Jogue 3 moedas. Pegue uma quantidade de Energia {R} da sua Zona de Energia igual ao número de cabeças e ligue-a aos seus Pokémon {R} no Banco da maneira que desejar.
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.it: Lancia 3 monete. Prendi una quantità di Energia {R} dalla tua Zona Energetica pari al numero di teste e assegnala ai tuoi Pokémon {R} in panchina nel modo che preferisci.
Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of {R} Ener.de: Wirf 3 Münzen. Nimm eine Menge {R}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone, die der Anzahl der Köpfe entspricht, und lege sie auf beliebige Weise an dein Bank-{R}-Pokémon an.

Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage.en: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 4 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 40 點傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.en: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現正面，則丟棄對手的活躍神奇寶貝中的隨機能量。
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, défaussez une Énergie aléatoire du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ wirf eine zufällige Energie vom Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners ab.

Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, scarta un'Energia casuale dal Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se sair cara, descarte uma Energia aleatória do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.

Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.en: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, during your oppon.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面朝上，則在對手的下一個回合中，阻止對該神奇寶貝造成的所有攻擊造成的傷害和效果。

Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面朝上，則防守寶可夢在對手的下一個回合中不能攻擊。

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，此攻擊會造成 40 點額外傷害。如果是反面，這只神奇寶貝也會對自己造成 20 點傷害。
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, este ataque hace 40 puntos de daño más. Si sale cruz, este Pokémon también se hace 20 puntos de daño a sí mismo.
