On dit qu'il vit 1 000 ans et que chacune de ses queues
est chargé de pouvoirs surnaturels.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.it:
Si dice che viva 1.000 anni e ciascuna delle sue code
è carico di poteri soprannaturali.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.pt-br:
Diz-se que vive 1.000 anos, e cada uma de suas caudas
está carregado de poderes sobrenaturais.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.zh-tw:
據說它的壽命是1000歲，它的每條尾巴
充滿了超自然的力量。
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each.de:
Es wird gesagt, dass jeder seiner Schwänze 1.000 Jahre alt wird
ist voller übernatürlicher Kräfte.

It is small but rough and tough. It won'.en:
It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to
take a bite out of anything that moves.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.es:
Es pequeño pero áspero y resistente. No dudará en
Dale un mordisco a todo lo que se mueva.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.fr:
Il est petit mais rude et résistant. Il n'hésitera pas à
mordez tout ce qui bouge.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.it:
È piccolo ma ruvido e resistente. Non esiterà a farlo
dai un morso a tutto ciò che si muove.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.pt-br:
É pequeno, mas áspero e resistente. Não hesitará em
dê uma mordida em qualquer coisa que se mova.
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.zh-tw:
它雖小，但粗糙而堅韌。它會毫不猶豫地
咬一口任何會動的東西。
It is small but rough and tough. It won'.de:
Es ist klein, aber rau und robust. Es wird nicht zögern
Beißen Sie in alles, was sich bewegt.

It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.en:
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a
variety of cries for communicating with others.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.fr:
Il est assez intelligent pour chasser en meute. Il utilise un
variété de cris pour communiquer avec les autres.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.pt-br:
É inteligente o suficiente para caçar em matilhas. Ele usa um
variedade de gritos para se comunicar com outras pessoas.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.it:
È abbastanza intelligente da cacciare in branco. Utilizza a
varietà di grida per comunicare con gli altri.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.es:
Es lo suficientemente inteligente como para cazar en manadas. Utiliza un
Variedad de gritos para comunicarse con los demás.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.de:
Es ist klug genug, in Rudeln zu jagen. Es verwendet a
Vielzahl von Schreien für die Kommunikation mit anderen.
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It.zh-tw:
它足夠聰明，可以成群狩獵。它使用一個
與他人交流的各種哭聲。

It is timid and always curls itself up i.en:
It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball.
If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.es:
Es tímido y siempre se hace un ovillo.
Si es atacado, ensancha su espalda para protegerse.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.fr:
Il est timide et se met toujours en boule.
S’il est attaqué, il flambe le dos pour se protéger.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.de:
Er ist schüchtern und rollt sich immer zu einer Kugel zusammen.
Wenn es angegriffen wird, breitet es zum Schutz seinen Rücken aus.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.zh-tw:
它膽小，總是把自己蜷縮成一團。
如果受到攻擊，它會張開背部進行保護。
It is timid and always curls itself up i.pt-br:
É tímido e sempre se enrola como uma bola.
Se atacado, ele ergue as costas para proteção.
It is timid and always curls itself up i.it:
È timido e si raggomitola sempre.
Se attaccato, alza la schiena per proteggersi.

It is unskilled at storing electric powe.en:
It is unskilled at storing electric power.
Any kind of shock causes it to discharge
energy spontaneously.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.it:
Non è abile nell’immagazzinare energia elettrica.
Qualsiasi tipo di shock ne provoca la scarica
energia spontaneamente.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.fr:
Il n’est pas doué pour stocker l’énergie électrique.
Tout type de choc provoque sa décharge
l'énergie spontanément.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.es:
No está capacitado para almacenar energía eléctrica.
Cualquier tipo de shock hace que se descargue.
energía de forma espontánea.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.zh-tw:
它不擅長儲存電力。
任何形式的衝擊都會導致其放電
自發的能量。
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.de:
Es ist nicht in der Lage, elektrische Energie zu speichern.
Jede Art von Erschütterung führt zur Entladung
Energie spontan.
It is unskilled at storing electric powe.pt-br:
Não é qualificado para armazenar energia elétrica.
Qualquer tipo de choque faz com que ele descarregue
energia espontaneamente.

It launches kicks while spinning. If it.en:
It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high
speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.es:
Lanza patadas mientras gira. Si gira en alto
velocidad, puede perforar el suelo.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.fr:
Il lance des coups de pied en tournant. S'il tourne à haute vitesse
vitesse, il peut s'enfoncer dans le sol.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.zh-tw:
它在旋轉時發射踢腿。如果它高速旋轉
速度，它可能會鑽入地下。
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.pt-br:
Ele lança chutes enquanto gira. Se girar alto
velocidade, ele pode penetrar no solo.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.it:
Lancia i calci mentre gira. Se gira in alto
velocità, potrebbe penetrare nel terreno.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.de:
Beim Drehen werden Tritte ausgelöst. Wenn es auf Hochtouren läuft
Geschwindigkeit, kann es sich in den Boden bohren.

It lies still in the same pose for days.en:
It lies still in the same pose for days in its web,
waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
It lies still in the same pose for days.fr:
Il reste dans la même pose pendant des jours dans sa toile,
attendant que sa proie sans méfiance s'approche.
It lies still in the same pose for days.es:
Sigue en la misma postura durante días en su red,
esperando que su presa desprevenida se acerque.
It lies still in the same pose for days.it:
Giace ancora per giorni nella stessa posa nella sua rete,
aspettando che la sua ignara preda si avvicini.
It lies still in the same pose for days.zh-tw:
它在網上好幾天都保持同樣的姿勢，
等待毫無戒心的獵物靠近。
It lies still in the same pose for days.pt-br:
Ele permanece na mesma posição por dias em sua teia,
esperando que sua presa desavisada se aproxime.
It lies still in the same pose for days.de:
Es liegt tagelang still in der gleichen Pose in seinem Netz,
Er wartet darauf, dass seine ahnungslose Beute näherkommt.

It lives close to water. Its long tail i.en:
It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with
a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.fr:
Il vit près de l'eau. Sa longue queue est striée de
une nageoire, qui est souvent confondue avec celle d'une sirène.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.it:
Vive vicino all'acqua. La sua lunga coda è increspata
una pinna, che spesso viene scambiata per quella di una sirena.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.zh-tw:
它生活在靠近水的地方。它的長尾巴上佈滿了脊狀的
鰭，經常被誤認為是美人魚的鰭。
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.de:
Es lebt in der Nähe von Wasser. Sein langer Schwanz ist gerippt
eine Flosse, die oft mit der einer Meerjungfrau verwechselt wird.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.es:
Vive cerca del agua. Su larga cola está surcada por
una aleta, que a menudo se confunde con la de una sirena.
It lives close to water. Its long tail i.pt-br:
Vive perto da água. Sua longa cauda é estriada
uma barbatana, que muitas vezes é confundida com a de uma sereia.

It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.en:
It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of
its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.fr:
Il vit en groupe à la cime des arbres. S'il perd de vue
son groupe, il devient furieux de sa solitude.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.es:
Vive en grupos en las copas de los árboles. Si pierde de vista
su grupo, se enfurece por su soledad.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.de:
Er lebt in Gruppen in den Baumwipfeln. Wenn es aus den Augen verliert
seiner Gruppe wird es wütend über seine Einsamkeit.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.it:
Vive in gruppi sulle cime degli alberi. Se lo perde di vista
suo gruppo, si infuria per la sua solitudine.
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.zh-tw:
它成群生活在樹頂。如果它失去了視線
它的群體，它因孤獨而變得憤怒。
It lives in groups in the treetops. If i.pt-br:
Vive em grupos nas copas das árvores. Se perder de vista
seu grupo, fica furioso com sua solidão.

It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.en:
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it
from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.es:
Parece una piña. Su caparazón lo protege
de Pokémon pájaro que lo picotean por error.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.fr:
Cela ressemble à une pomme de pin. Sa coque le protège
des Pokémon oiseaux qui le picorent par erreur.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.zh-tw:
它看起來就像一個松果。它的外殼保護著它
來自誤啄它的鳥神奇寶貝。
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.de:
Es sieht aus wie ein Tannenzapfen. Seine Hülle schützt es
von Vogel-Pokémon, die es versehentlich picken.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.it:
Sembra proprio una pigna. Il suo guscio lo protegge
dai Pokémon uccello che lo beccano per errore.
It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell.pt-br:
Parece uma pinha. Sua casca o protege
de Pokémon pássaros que o bicam por engano.

It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.en:
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to
itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.es:
Le encanta el néctar dulce. Para conservar todo el néctar
mismo, arroja a sus rivales con su preciado cuerno.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.fr:
Il aime le nectar sucré. Pour garder tout le nectar
lui-même, il repousse ses rivaux avec sa corne précieuse.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.it:
Ama il nettare dolce. Per conservare tutto il nettare
stesso, scaglia via i rivali con il suo prezioso corno.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.de:
Es liebt süßen Nektar. Um den ganzen Nektar zu behalten
selbst, schleudert es Rivalen mit seinem wertvollen Horn weg.
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.zh-tw:
牠喜歡甜甜的花蜜。為了保留所有的花蜜
它本身也用它珍貴的角把對手趕走。
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the n.pt-br:
Adora néctar doce. Para manter todo o néctar
por si só, ele afasta os rivais com seu valioso chifre.

It loves to drink other creatures' blood.en:
It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said
that if it finds others of its kind going hungry,
it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.fr:
Il adore boire le sang des autres créatures. On dit
que s'il en trouve d'autres de son espèce affamés,
il partage parfois le sang qu'il a recueilli.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.it:
Ama bere il sangue di altre creature. E' detto
che se trova altri suoi simili affamati,
a volte condivide il sangue raccolto.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.es:
Le encanta beber la sangre de otras criaturas. se dice
que si encuentra a otros de su especie pasando hambre,
a veces comparte la sangre que recoge.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.pt-br:
Ele adora beber o sangue de outras criaturas. Está dito
que se encontrar outros da sua espécie passando fome,
às vezes compartilha o sangue que reuniu.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.de:
Es liebt es, das Blut anderer Lebewesen zu trinken. Es heißt
dass, wenn es andere seiner Art hungrig vorfindet,
Manchmal teilt es das Blut, das es gesammelt hat.
It loves to drink other creatures' blood.zh-tw:
牠喜歡喝其他生物的血。據說
如果它發現其他同類正在挨餓，
它有時會分享它所收集的血液。

It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.en:
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked
by bird Pokémon that would love to make off
with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.es:
Corre ágilmente para evitar ser picoteado.
por Pokémon pájaro al que le encantaría escapar
con su pequeña bola de almacenamiento rica en nutrientes.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.fr:
Il se précipite agilement pour éviter de se faire picorer
par des Pokémon oiseaux qui adoreraient s'enfuir
avec sa petite boule de stockage riche en nutriments.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.zh-tw:
它敏捷地奔跑以避免被啄
喜歡偷走的鳥神奇寶貝
其小而營養豐富的存儲球。
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.it:
Si lancia agilmente per evitare di essere beccato
da Pokémon uccello che vorrebbero scappare
con la sua piccola sfera di stoccaggio ricca di sostanze nutritive.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.pt-br:
Ele corre agilmente para evitar ser bicado
por Pokémon pássaros que adorariam fugir
com sua pequena bola de armazenamento rica em nutrientes.
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting.de:
Es rennt flink umher, um nicht gepickt zu werden
von Vogel-Pokémon, die sich gerne aus dem Staub machen würden
mit seiner kleinen, nährstoffreichen Speicherkugel.

It observes prey while hanging inverted.en:
It observes prey while hanging inverted from
branches. When the chance presents itself,
it swoops!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.fr:
Il observe ses proies en étant suspendu à l'envers.
branches. Quand l'occasion se présente,
ça fonce !
It observes prey while hanging inverted.es:
Observa a sus presas mientras cuelga invertido.
ramas. Cuando se presenta la oportunidad,
¡se lanza en picado!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.it:
Osserva la preda mentre pende capovolto
rami. Quando si presenta l'occasione,
piomba!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.zh-tw:
它倒掛在空中觀察獵物
分支機構。當機會出現時，
它猛撲！
It observes prey while hanging inverted.de:
Es beobachtet Beute, während es kopfüber hängt
Zweige. Wenn sich die Chance bietet,
es schwappt!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.pt-br:
Ele observa a presa enquanto está pendurado invertido
filiais. Quando a oportunidade se apresenta,
ele desce!

It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.en:
It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads
instantly while flying by at high speed.
It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.fr:
Il préfère se battre en mordant la tête de ses ennemis
instantanément en volant à grande vitesse.
It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.es:
Prefiere luchar mordiendo las cabezas de los enemigos.
instantáneamente mientras vuela a alta velocidad.
It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.zh-tw:
它更喜歡通過咬碎敵人的頭來戰鬥
高速飛行的瞬間。
It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.de:
Es kämpft lieber, indem es seinen Gegnern die Köpfe auseinanderbeißt
sofort beim Vorbeifliegen mit hoher Geschwindigkeit.
It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.pt-br:
Ele prefere lutar mordendo a cabeça dos inimigos
instantaneamente enquanto voa em alta velocidade.
It prefers to battle by biting apart foe.it:
Preferisce combattere facendo a pezzi le teste dei nemici
istantaneamente mentre voli ad alta velocità.

It races around the world to purify foul.en:
It races around the world to purify fouled water.
It dashes away with the north wind.
It races around the world to purify foul.es:
Corre alrededor del mundo para purificar el agua contaminada.
Se aleja con el viento del norte.
It races around the world to purify foul.fr:
Il fait le tour du monde pour purifier les eaux usées.
Il s'enfuit avec le vent du nord.
It races around the world to purify foul.zh-tw:
它在世界各地競相淨化污水。
隨北風而逝。
It races around the world to purify foul.it:
Corre in giro per il mondo per purificare l'acqua contaminata.
Si allontana con il vento del nord.
It races around the world to purify foul.de:
Es rast um die Welt, um verschmutztes Wasser zu reinigen.
Es rennt mit dem Nordwind davon.
It races around the world to purify foul.pt-br:
Ele corre ao redor do mundo para purificar a água suja.
Ele foge com o vento norte.

It remains immovably rooted to its tree..en:
It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters
pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree..fr:
Il reste immobile enraciné à son arbre. Il se disperse
des morceaux de sa carapace dure pour chasser ses ennemis.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree..es:
Permanece inamoviblemente arraigado a su árbol. Se dispersa
pedazos de su duro caparazón para ahuyentar a sus enemigos.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree..it:
Rimane inamovibilmente radicato al suo albero. Si disperde
pezzi del suo duro guscio per scacciare i suoi nemici.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree..de:
Es bleibt unbeweglich mit seinem Baum verwurzelt. Es zerstreut
Teile seiner harten Schale, um seine Feinde zu vertreiben.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree..pt-br:
Permanece firmemente enraizado em sua árvore. Ele se espalha
pedaços de sua casca dura para afastar seus inimigos.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree..zh-tw:
它仍然牢牢地紮根於樹上。它散開
其堅硬的外殼碎片可以驅趕敵人。

It rubs its snout on the ground to find.en:
It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up
food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.fr:
Il frotte son museau contre le sol pour trouver et déterrer
nourriture. Il découvre parfois des sources chaudes.
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.es:
Frota el hocico en el suelo para encontrar y desenterrar.
comida. A veces descubre fuentes termales.
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.zh-tw:
它用鼻子在地上摩擦來尋找和挖掘
食物。有時它會發現溫泉。
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.it:
Strofina il muso sul terreno per trovare e scavare
cibo. A volte scopre sorgenti termali.
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.pt-br:
Ele esfrega o focinho no chão para encontrar e desenterrar
comida. Às vezes descobre fontes termais.
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.de:
Es reibt seine Schnauze über den Boden, um es zu finden und auszugraben
Essen. Manchmal entdeckt es heiße Quellen.

It slashes through grass with its sharp\.en:
It slashes through grass with its sharp
scythes, moving too fast for the human
eye to track.
It slashes through grass with its sharp\.es:
Corta la hierba con su afilado
guadañas, moviéndose demasiado rápido para el humano
ojo para seguir.
It slashes through grass with its sharp\.fr:
Il coupe l'herbe avec son tranchant
des faux, se déplaçant trop vite pour l'humain
oeil à suivre.
It slashes through grass with its sharp\.de:
Mit seiner scharfen Klinge schneidet es durch das Gras
Sensen, die sich zu schnell für den Menschen bewegen
Auge zum Verfolgen.
It slashes through grass with its sharp\.zh-tw:
它用鋒利的刀砍過草地
鐮刀，對於人類來說移動得太快
眼睛追踪。
It slashes through grass with its sharp\.pt-br:
Ele corta a grama com seu poder afiado
foices, movendo-se rápido demais para o humano
olho para rastrear.
It slashes through grass with its sharp\.it:
Taglia l'erba con la sua lama affilata
falci, che si muovono troppo velocemente per l'umano
occhio al tracciamento.

It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.en:
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the morning.
Knowing it's weak, it simply feeds until it evolves.
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.es:
Cae repentinamente del cielo por la mañana.
Sabiendo que es débil, simplemente se alimenta hasta evolucionar.
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.fr:
Il tombe soudainement du ciel le matin.
Sachant qu'il est faible, il se nourrit simplement jusqu'à ce qu'il évolue.
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.it:
Cade improvvisamente dal cielo al mattino.
Sapendo che è debole, si nutre semplicemente finché non si evolve.
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.de:
Es fällt morgens plötzlich vom Himmel.
Da es weiß, dass es schwach ist, ernährt es sich einfach, bis es sich entwickelt.
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.zh-tw:
早上它突然從天上掉下來。
它知道自己很弱，只是簡單地進食，直到進化為止。
It suddenly falls out of the sky in the.pt-br:
De repente, cai do céu pela manhã.
Sabendo que está fraco, simplesmente se alimenta até evoluir.

It uses its docile-looking face to lull.en:
It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into
complacency, then bites with its huge,
relentless jaws.
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.es:
Utiliza su rostro de aspecto dócil para adormecer a los enemigos.
complacencia, luego muerde con su enorme,
mandíbulas implacables.
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.fr:
Il utilise son visage docile pour endormir ses ennemis.
complaisance, puis mord avec son énorme,
des mâchoires implacables.
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.zh-tw:
它用它溫順的面孔來誘騙敵人
自滿，然後用它的巨大咬住，
無情的下巴。
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.pt-br:
Ele usa seu rosto de aparência dócil para acalmar os inimigos.
complacência, então morde com seu enorme,
mandíbulas implacáveis.
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.it:
Usa il suo volto dall'aspetto docile per ingannare i nemici
compiacimento, poi morde con il suo enorme,
mascelle implacabili.
It uses its docile-looking face to lull.de:
Es nutzt sein fügsam aussehendes Gesicht, um Feinde einzulullen
Selbstgefälligkeit, dann beißt er mit seinem riesigen,
unerbittliche Kiefer.

It usually clings to cliffs. When it spo.en:
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey,

Late at night, it appears beside people'.pt-br:
Tarde da noite, aparece ao lado dos travesseiros das pessoas.
À medida que se alimenta de sonhos, os padrões do seu corpo
emite um leve brilho.

Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.en:
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense.
With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield
its children from any kind of attack.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.fr:
Nidoqueen est meilleur en défense qu'en attaque.
Avec des écailles comme une armure, ce Pokémon fera bouclier
ses enfants de toute sorte d’attaque.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.pt-br:
Nidoqueen é melhor na defesa do que no ataque.
Com escamas como armadura, este Pokémon irá proteger
seus filhos de qualquer tipo de ataque.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.de:
Nidoqueen ist besser in der Verteidigung als im Angriff.
Mit schuppenähnlichen Rüstungen schützt dieses Pokémon
seine Kinder vor Angriffen jeglicher Art.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.es:
Nidoqueen es mejor en defensa que en ataque.
Con escamas como armadura, este Pokémon protegerá
sus hijos de cualquier tipo de ataque.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.it:
Nidoqueen è più bravo in difesa che in attacco.
Con scaglie come un'armatura, questo Pokémon proteggerà
i suoi figli da ogni tipo di attacco.
Nidoqueen is better at defense than offe.zh-tw:
尼多女王更擅長防守而不是進攻。
擁有像盔甲一樣的鱗片，這只神奇寶貝會盾牌
它的孩子免受任何形式的攻擊。

No matter how dirty the water in the riv.en:
No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will
adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.fr:
Peu importe à quel point l'eau de la rivière est sale, elle
s'adapter et s'épanouir. Il a une forte volonté de survivre.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.es:
No importa cuán sucia esté el agua del río,
adaptarse y prosperar. Tiene una fuerte voluntad de sobrevivir.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.it:
Non importa quanto sia sporca l'acqua del fiume, lo farà
adattarsi e prosperare. Ha una forte volontà di sopravvivere.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.zh-tw:
不管河裡的水有多髒，它都會
適應並茁壯成長。它有強烈的求生意志。
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.de:
Egal wie schmutzig das Wasser im Fluss ist, es wird es tun
anpassen und gedeihen. Es hat einen starken Überlebenswillen.
No matter how dirty the water in the riv.pt-br:
Não importa quão suja seja a água do rio, ela irá
adaptar e prosperar. Tem uma forte vontade de sobreviver.

Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.en:
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.
It remains enraged until it demolishes
everything around it.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.fr:
Une fois apparu, il se déchaîne.
Il reste enragé jusqu'à ce qu'il démolisse
tout autour.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.es:
Una vez que aparece, se enfurece.
Sigue enfurecido hasta derribar
todo lo que lo rodea.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.it:
Una volta apparso, va su tutte le furie.
Rimane infuriato finché non demolisce
tutto ciò che lo circonda.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.de:
Sobald es auftaucht, tobt es.
Es bleibt wütend, bis es zerstört wird
alles drumherum.
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.zh-tw:
一旦出現，就會橫衝直撞。
它仍然憤怒，直到它被摧毀
它周圍的一切。
Once it appears, it goes on a rampage.\n.pt-br:
Uma vez que aparece, ele fica furioso.
Ele permanece enfurecido até destruir
tudo ao seu redor.

Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.en:
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be found
practically everywhere. This is because the wind
carries this species all over the world.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.fr:
En dehors des régions froides, Hoppip peut être trouvé
pratiquement partout. C'est parce que le vent
transporte cette espèce partout dans le monde.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.es:
Fuera de las regiones frías, se puede encontrar Hoppip.
prácticamente en todas partes. Esto se debe a que el viento
lleva esta especie por todo el mundo.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.zh-tw:
在寒冷地區之外，也可以找到 Hoppip
幾乎無處不在。這是因為風
該物種遍布世界各地。
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.it:
Al di fuori delle regioni fredde, è possibile trovare Hoppip
praticamente ovunque. Questo perché il vento
trasporta questa specie in tutto il mondo.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.pt-br:
Fora das regiões frias, o Hoppip pode ser encontrado
praticamente em todos os lugares. Isto acontece porque o vento
carrega esta espécie por todo o mundo.
Outside of cold regions, Hoppip can be f.de:
Außerhalb kalter Regionen ist Hoppip zu finden
praktisch überall. Das liegt am Wind
trägt diese Art auf der ganzen Welt.

Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.en:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals
rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.es:
Abundante en los trópicos. Cuando baila, sus pétalos
se frotan y emiten un agradable sonido de timbre.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.de:
In den Tropen reichlich vorhanden. Wenn es tanzt, sind seine Blütenblätter
aneinander reiben und einen angenehmen Klang erzeugen.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.zh-tw:
熱帶地區資源豐富。當它跳舞時，它的花瓣
相互摩擦並發出悅耳的鈴聲。
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.it:
Abbondante ai tropici. Quando balla, i suoi petali
strofinare insieme e produrre un piacevole suono squillante.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.fr:
Abondant sous les tropiques. Quand il danse, ses pétales
frottez ensemble et faites une sonnerie agréable.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.pt-br:
Abundante nos trópicos. Quando dança, suas pétalas
esfregue e faça um som de toque agradável.

Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.en:
Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to
move between dimensions, but the program also
caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.fr:
Porygon-Z avait un programme installé pour lui permettre de
se déplacer entre les dimensions, mais le programme aussi
a provoqué une instabilité dans le comportement de Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.zh-tw:
Porygon-Z 安裝了一個程序，允許它
在維度之間移動，但程序也
導致 Porygon-Z 行為不穩定。
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.pt-br:
Porygon-Z tinha um programa instalado para permitir
mover-se entre dimensões, mas o programa também
causou instabilidade no comportamento de Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.es:
Porygon-Z tenía un programa instalado que le permitía
moverse entre dimensiones, pero el programa también
causó inestabilidad en el comportamiento de Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.de:
Porygon-Z hatte ein Programm installiert, um dies zu ermöglichen
Bewegen Sie sich zwischen den Dimensionen, aber auch das Programm
verursachte Instabilität im Verhalten von Porygon-Z.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.it:
Porygon-Z aveva un programma installato che glielo permetteva
spostarsi tra le dimensioni, ma anche il programma
ha causato instabilità nel comportamento di Porygon-Z.

Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.fr: Mettez un Pokémon aléatoire de votre deck dans votre main.

Put a random Pokémon from your deck into.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將一隻神奇寶貝放入你的手牌。

Seven Binacle come together to form one\.en:
Seven Binacle come together to form one
Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head
gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.de:
Sieben Binakel vereinen sich zu einem
Barbaracle. Das Binakel, das als Kopf dient
gibt denen, die als Gliedmaßen dienen, Befehle.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.it:
Sette Binacle si uniscono per formarne uno solo
Barbaracolo. Il Binacolo che funge da testa
dà ordini a coloro che fanno da membra.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.fr:
Sept Binacle se réunissent pour n'en former qu'un
Barbaracle. Le Binacle qui sert de tête
donne des ordres à ceux qui servent de membres.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.es:
Siete Binacle se unen para formar uno
Bárbaracle. El Binacle que sirve de cabecera.
da órdenes a quienes sirven como miembros.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.pt-br:
Sete Binacle se unem para formar um
Bárbara. O Bináculo que serve como cabeça
dá ordens àqueles que servem como membros.
Seven Binacle come together to form one\.zh-tw:
七個 Binacle 合而為一
野蠻人。作為頭部的 Binacle
對那些充當肢體的人發出命令。

Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.en:
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell where a
Skiploom was born by the scent drifting from the
flower on the Pokémon's head.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.fr:
Les amateurs de Skiploom peuvent apparemment dire où se trouve un
Skiploom est né du parfum qui s'échappe du
fleur sur la tête du Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.es:
Los entusiastas de Skiploom aparentemente pueden saber dónde
Skiploom nació del aroma que emanaba del
flor en la cabeza del Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.it:
Gli appassionati di Skiploom possono apparentemente dire dove a
Skiploom è nato dal profumo che deriva dal
fiore sulla testa del Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.zh-tw:
Skiploom 愛好者顯然可以分辨出
Skiploom 的誕生是由飄來的香味所決定的。
神奇寶貝頭上的花。
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.pt-br:
Os entusiastas do Skiploom aparentemente podem dizer onde um
Skiploom nasceu do perfume que vem do
flor na cabeça do Pokémon.
Skiploom enthusiasts can apparently tell.de:
Skiploom-Enthusiasten können offenbar erkennen, wo a
Skiploom wurde durch den Duft geboren, der von dort wehte
Blume auf dem Kopf des Pokémon.

State-of-the-art technology was used to.en:
State-of-the-art technology was used to create
Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be
created via computer programming.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.fr:
Une technologie de pointe a été utilisée pour créer
Porygon. C'était le premier Pokémon artificiel à être
créé via la programmation informatique.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.it:
Per creare è stata utilizzata la tecnologia più avanzata
Porygon. È stato il primo Pokémon artificiale ad esserlo
creato tramite la programmazione del computer.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.es:
Se utilizó tecnología de punta para crear
Porygón. Fue el primer Pokémon artificial en ser
creado mediante programación informática.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.de:
Bei der Erstellung kam modernste Technik zum Einsatz
Porygon. Es war das erste künstliche Pokémon überhaupt
durch Computerprogrammierung erstellt.
State-of-the-art technology was used to.zh-tw:
採用最先進的技術來創造
多邊形。這是第一個人造神奇寶貝
通過計算機編程創建。
State-of-the-art technology was used to.pt-br:
Tecnologia de ponta foi usada para criar
Porígon. Foi o primeiro Pokémon artificial a ser
criado através de programação de computador.

Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.en:
Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and
mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely
sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.fr:
Rapide comme le vent, Absol court à travers champs et
montagnes. Sa corne courbée en forme d'arc est extrêmement
sensibles aux signes avant-coureurs des catastrophes naturelles.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.es:
Rápido como el viento, Absol corre por los campos y
montañas. Su cuerno curvo, en forma de arco, es agudamente
sensibles a las señales de alerta de desastres naturales.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.pt-br:
Rápido como o vento, Absol corre pelos campos e
montanhas. Seu chifre curvo em forma de arco é agudamente
sensíveis aos sinais de alerta de desastres naturais.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.it:
Veloce come il vento, Absol corre attraverso i campi e
montagne. Il suo corno ricurvo, a forma di arco, è acuto
sensibile ai segnali premonitori dei disastri naturali.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.zh-tw:
阿勃索爾疾馳如風，穿過田野，
山。它彎曲的弓狀角非常鋒利
對自然災害的警告信號敏感。
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.de:
Schnell wie der Wind rast Absol durch Felder und
Berge. Sein gebogenes, bogenförmiges Horn ist spitz
sensibel auf die Warnsignale von Naturkatastrophen reagieren.

Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone.pt-br: Pegue uma Energia {L} da sua Zona de Energia e ligue-a a 1 dos seus Pokémon Básicos no Banco.

Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.fr: Prenez une Énergie {R} de votre Zone d'Énergie et attachez-la à l'un de vos Pokémon de Base de Banc.
Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.es: Toma una Energía {R} de tu Zona de Energía y únela a 1 de tus Pokémon Básicos en Banca.

Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.fr: Prenez une Énergie {R} de votre Zone d'Énergie et attachez-la à l'un de vos Pokémon de Banc.

Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.en: Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach them to your Benched Basic Pokémon in any way you like.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.fr: Prenez une énergie {R}, {W} et {L} de votre zone d'énergie et attachez-les à votre Pokémon de base de banc comme vous le souhaitez.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.de: Nimm eine {R}-, {W}- und {L}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone und lege sie auf beliebige Weise an dein Basis-Pokémon auf deiner Bank an.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出 {R}、{W} 和 {L} 能量，並以你喜歡的任何方式將它們附加到你的後備基礎神奇寶貝上。
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.es: Toma una Energía {R}, {W} y {L} de tu Zona de Energía y únelas a tus Pokémon Básicos en Banca de la forma que quieras.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.pt-br: Pegue uma energia {R}, {W} e {L} da sua zona de energia e ligue-as aos seus Pokémon Básicos no Banco da maneira que desejar.
Take a {R}, {W}, and {L} Energy from you.it: Prendi un'Energia {R}, {W} e {L} dalla tua Zona Energetica e assegnale ai tuoi Pokémon Base in panchina nel modo che preferisci.

Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.en:
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it
pleases. Recent research has shown that these
arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.es:
Tangrowth tiene dos brazos que puede extender a medida que
agrada. Investigaciones recientes han demostrado que estos
Las armas son, de hecho, haces de enredaderas.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.pt-br:
Tangrowth tem dois braços que pode estender conforme
agrada. Pesquisas recentes mostraram que estes
os braços são, na verdade, feixes de videiras.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.fr:
Tangrowth a deux bras qu'il peut étendre à mesure qu'il
plaît. Des recherches récentes ont montré que ces
les bras sont en fait des fagots de vigne.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.zh-tw:

請。最近的研究表明，這些
事實上，手臂是一捆捆的藤蔓。
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.de:

gefällt. Neuere Untersuchungen haben gezeigt, dass diese
Arme sind in Wirklichkeit Weinrebenbündel.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.it:
Tangrowth ha due braccia che può estendere man mano
piace. Recenti ricerche hanno dimostrato che questi
le braccia sono, infatti, fasci di viti.

The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.en: The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to takes −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon, recovers from all Special Conditions, and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.fr: Le Pokémon {M} auquel cette carte est attachée subit -10 dégâts des attaques du Pokémon de votre adversaire, récupère de toutes les Conditions Spéciales et ne peut être affecté par aucune Conditions Spéciales.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.zh-tw: 這張卡所附著的 {M} 只神奇寶貝因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到 -10 傷害，從所有特殊狀態中恢復，並且不會受到任何特殊狀態的影響。
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.es: El Pokémon {M} al que está unida esta carta recibe -10 de daño de los ataques de los Pokémon de tu rival, se recupera de todas las Condiciones Especiales y no puede verse afectado por ninguna Condición Especial.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.it: Il Pokémon {M} a cui è assegnata questa carta subisce -10 danni dagli attacchi dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, si riprende da tutte le condizioni speciali e non può essere influenzato da alcuna condizione speciale.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.de: Das {M}-Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, erleidet −10 Schaden durch Angriffe der Pokémon deines Gegners, erholt sich von allen Sonderzuständen und kann von keinem Sonderzustand betroffen sein.
The {M} Pokémon this card is attached to.pt-br: O Pokémon {M} ao qual este card está anexado sofre -10 de dano de ataques dos Pokémon do seu oponente, se recupera de todas as Condições Especiais e não pode ser afetado por nenhuma Condições Especiais.

La lumière vive sur sa queue est visible de loin
loin. Il est précieux depuis l’Antiquité

lejos. Ha sido atesorado desde la antigüedad.
veces como un faro.

lontano. È stato apprezzato fin dall'antichità

尾巴上的亮光遠遠就能看見

en la intensidad de su tono como el del Pokémon

The fur on its body naturally repels wat.en:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can
stay dry even when it plays in the water.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.es:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. puede
stay dry even when it plays in the water.
The fur on its body naturally repels wat.fr:

它身上的皮毛天然具有防水功能。它可以

The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead contains

The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.fr:
La corne sur le front d'un Nidoran mâle contient
un poison puissant. C'est une démarche très prudente

Das Horn auf der Stirn eines männlichen Nidoraners enthält

un veneno poderoso. Esto es muy cauteloso.
Pokémon, siempre forzando sus grandes orejas.

The horn on a male Nidoran's forehead co.zh-tw:
雄性尼多蘭額頭上的角含有

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.en:
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought
that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.fr:
La corne sur sa tête s'est atrophiée. On pense
que cela se produit pour que les enfants de Nidorina n'aient pas
piqué pendant que leur mère les nourrit.
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.zh-tw:
它頭上的角已經萎縮了。是以為
發生這種情況是為了讓尼多麗娜的孩子們不會受到
當他們的母親餵他們的時候被戳了。
The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.de:
Das Horn auf seinem Kopf ist verkümmert. Es ist gedacht

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.it:
Il corno sulla sua testa si è atrofizzato. È pensato

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.pt-br:

The horn on its head has atrophied. It's.es:
El cuerno de su cabeza se ha atrofiado. es pensamiento

The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.en:
The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up
around them. It corners foes with speed.
The mother puts its offspring to sleep b.fr:
La mère endort sa progéniture en se recroquevillant

La madre pone a dormir a sus crías acurrucándose

The next time you flip any number of coi.en: The next time you flip any number of coins for the effect of an attack, Ability, or Trainer card after using this card on this turn, the first coin flip will definitely be heads.
The next time you flip any number of coi.es: La próxima vez que lances cualquier cantidad de monedas para obtener el efecto de una carta de ataque, habilidad o entrenador después de usar esta carta en este turno, el primer lanzamiento de moneda definitivamente será cara.
The next time you flip any number of coi.fr: La prochaine fois que vous lancerez un nombre quelconque de pièces pour obtenir l'effet d'une carte d'attaque, de capacité ou de dresseur après avoir utilisé cette carte ce tour-ci, le premier tirage au sort sera définitivement face.
The next time you flip any number of coi.zh-tw: 在本回合使用這張卡後，下次為攻擊、能力或訓練卡的效果而翻轉任意數量的硬幣時，第一個硬幣翻轉肯定是正面。
The next time you flip any number of coi.it: La prossima volta che lanci un qualsiasi numero di monete per l'effetto di un attacco, di un'abilità o di una carta Allenatore dopo aver usato questa carta in questo turno, il primo lancio di moneta darà sicuramente testa.
The next time you flip any number of coi.pt-br: Na próxima vez que você lançar qualquer número de moedas para o efeito de uma carta de ataque, habilidade ou treinador depois de usar esta carta neste turno, o primeiro lançamento de moeda será definitivamente cara.
The next time you flip any number of coi.de: Wenn Sie das nächste Mal eine beliebige Anzahl von Münzen für den Effekt einer Angriffs-, Fähigkeits- oder Trainerkarte werfen, nachdem Sie diese Karte in diesem Zug verwendet haben, wird der erste Münzwurf definitiv „Kopf“ sein.

a voluntad. Dicen que descendió con un rayo.

The thick arms of this hot-blooded Pokémon

Los gruesos brazos de este Pokémon de sangre caliente
Puede dar golpes capaces de destruir a un

The two minigears that compose this Pokémon

組成這只神奇寶貝的兩個迷你齒輪

The water they shoot from their mouths c.en:

L'eau qu'ils tirent de leur bouche peut frapper

Il y a un trou dans sa queue qui lui permet de rentrer
l'air dont il a besoin pour entretenir son feu. Si le
Si le trou est bouché, ce Pokémon tombera malade.

el aire que necesita para mantener encendido su fuego. si el

Wenn das Loch blockiert wird, wird dieses Pokémon krank.

These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.en:
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near
conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly
been seen at all.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.fr:
Ces Pokémon ne sont jamais vus à proximité
conflit ou troubles. Ces derniers temps, ils ont à peine
été vu du tout.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.es:
Estos Pokémon nunca se ven cerca
conflicto o agitación. En los últimos tiempos apenas han

These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.de:

These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.pt-br:

These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.en:
These Pokémon can crush a car with no more
than a headbutt. Bouffalant with more hair on

Estos Pokémon pueden aplastar un coche sin más
que un cabezazo. Bouffalant con más pelo

Ces Pokémon peuvent écraser une voiture sans plus

Questi Pokémon possono schiacciare un'auto senza altro

比用頭撞。蓬鬆的頭髮更多
他們的頭部在牛群中佔據較高的位置。
These Pokémon can crush a car with no mo.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon podem esmagar um carro sem mais
do que uma cabeçada. Bouffalant com mais cabelo

Diese Pokémon können ohne weiteres ein Auto zerquetschen
als ein Kopfstoß. Bouffalant mit mehr Haaren
Ihre Köpfe nehmen innerhalb der Herde eine höhere Position ein.

These Pokémon judge one another based on.en:
These Pokémon judge one another based on
pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make
for more popularity with the opposite gender.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.es:
Estos Pokémon se juzgan entre sí basándose en
pinzas. Unas pinzas más gruesas e impresionantes hacen
para obtener más popularidad entre el sexo opuesto.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.fr:
Ces Pokémon se jugent mutuellement en fonction de
pinces. Des pinces plus épaisses et plus impressionnantes font
pour plus de popularité auprès du sexe opposé.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.it:
Questi Pokémon si giudicano a vicenda in base a
tenaglie. Le tenaglie sono più spesse e più impressionanti
per una maggiore popolarità con il sesso opposto.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.de:
Diese Pokémon beurteilen sich gegenseitig anhand
Zangen. Dickere, eindrucksvollere Zangen ergeben
für mehr Beliebtheit beim anderen Geschlecht.
These Pokémon judge one another based on.zh-tw:
這些神奇寶貝根據以下標準相互評判
鉗子。更厚、更令人印象深刻的鉗子
為了更受異性歡迎。
These Pokémon judge one another based on.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon julgam uns aos outros com base em
pinças. Pinças mais grossas e impressionantes fazem
para mais popularidade com o sexo oposto.

These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.en:
These very cowardly Pokémon join together and
use Reflect to protect their nest.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.fr:
Ces Pokémon très lâches se réunissent et
utilisez Reflect pour protéger leur nid.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.es:
Estos Pokémon muy cobardes se unen y
usa Reflect para proteger su nido.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.it:

usa Reflect per proteggere il loro nido.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.zh-tw:
這些非常膽小的神奇寶貝聯合起來，
使用反射來保護它們的巢穴。
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon muito covardes se unem e
use Reflect para proteger seu ninho.
These very cowardly Pokémon join togethe.de:
Diese sehr feigen Pokémon schließen sich zusammen und
Verwenden Sie Reflect, um ihr Nest zu schützen.

They say that it stays still and quiet b.en:
They say that it stays still and quiet because it is
seeing both the past and future at the same time.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.fr:
On dit qu'il reste immobile et silencieux parce qu'il est
voir à la fois le passé et le futur.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.de:
Sie sagen, dass es still und still bleibt, weil es so ist
Vergangenheit und Zukunft gleichzeitig sehen.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.zh-tw:
他們說它保持靜止和安靜，因為它是
同時看到過去和未來。
They say that it stays still and quiet b.it:
Dicono che sta fermo e tranquillo perché è così
vedere il passato e il futuro allo stesso tempo.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.pt-br:
Dizem que fica quieto e quieto porque é
vendo o passado e o futuro ao mesmo tempo.
They say that it stays still and quiet b.es:
Dicen que se queda quieto y en silencio porque es
viendo el pasado y el futuro al mismo tiempo.

They say that it will appear before kind.en:
They say that it will appear before kindhearted,
caring people and shower them with happiness.
They say that it will appear before kind.fr:
Ils disent qu'il apparaîtra devant un bon cœur,
des gens attentionnés et les comble de bonheur.
They say that it will appear before kind.es:

cuidar a las personas y colmarlas de felicidad.
They say that it will appear before kind.zh-tw:
都說它會出現在善良的人面前，
關愛人們並為他們帶來幸福。
They say that it will appear before kind.de:
Sie sagen, dass es vor gutherzigen Menschen erscheinen wird,
Fürsorgliche Menschen und überschütte sie mit Glück.
They say that it will appear before kind.it:
Dicono che apparirà prima di buon cuore,
prendersi cura delle persone e inondarle di felicità.
They say that it will appear before kind.pt-br:
Dizem que aparecerá diante de pessoas de bom coração,
cuidar das pessoas e regá-las de felicidade.

This Ability works if you have any Unown.en: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than . All of your Pokémon take −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.es: Esta habilidad funciona si tienes algún Unown en juego con una habilidad distinta a . Todos tus Pokémon reciben -10 de daño de los ataques de los Pokémon de tu oponente.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.it: Questa abilità funziona se hai in gioco degli Unown con un'abilità diversa da . Tutti i tuoi Pokémon subiscono -10 danni dagli attacchi dei Pokémon del tuo avversario.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.fr: Cette capacité fonctionne si vous avez un Zarbi en jeu avec une capacité autre que . Tous vos Pokémon subissent -10 dégâts des attaques des Pokémon de votre adversaire.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.de: Diese Fähigkeit funktioniert, wenn Sie einen Unbekannten mit einer anderen Fähigkeit als im Spiel haben. Alle deine Pokémon erleiden −10 Schaden durch Angriffe der Pokémon deines Gegners.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.zh-tw: 如果您有任何未知的技能與 以外的技能一起使用，則此技能有效。你的所有神奇寶貝因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到−10點傷害。
This Ability works if you have any Unown.pt-br: Esta habilidade funciona se você tiver algum Unown em jogo com uma habilidade diferente de . Todos os seus Pokémon sofrem -10 de dano de ataques dos Pokémon do seu oponente.

This Ability works if you have any Unown.en: This Ability works if you have any Unown in play with an Ability other than . Attacks used by your Pokémon do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.fr: Cette capacité fonctionne si vous avez un Zarbi en jeu avec une capacité autre que . Les attaques utilisées par votre Pokémon infligent +10 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.es: Esta habilidad funciona si tienes algún Unown en juego con una habilidad distinta a . Los ataques utilizados por tus Pokémon causan +10 de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu oponente.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.it: Questa abilità funziona se hai in gioco degli Unown con un'abilità diversa da . Gli attacchi usati dai tuoi Pokémon infliggono +10 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.de: Diese Fähigkeit funktioniert, wenn Sie einen Unbekannten mit einer anderen Fähigkeit als im Spiel haben. Angriffe deines Pokémon fügen dem aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners +10 Schaden zu.
This Ability works if you have any Unown.zh-tw: 如果您有任何未知的技能與 以外的技能一起使用，則此技能有效。你的神奇寶貝使用的攻擊對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成+10傷害。
This Ability works if you have any Unown.pt-br: Esta habilidade funciona se você tiver algum Unown em jogo com uma habilidade diferente de . Os ataques usados ​​pelos seus Pokémon causam +10 de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.

This attack does 20 damage for each Ener.en: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

This attack does 40 more damage for each.en: This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

This attack does 40 more damage for each.de: Dieser Angriff verursacht 40 weitere Schadenspunkte für jede Energie in den Rückzugskosten des Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.it: Questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più per ogni Energia nel costo di ritirata del Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.pt-br: Este ataque causa 40 pontos de dano a mais para cada Energia no Custo de Recuo do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.

This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritio.en:
This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs
and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

Ce gentil Pokémon pond des œufs très nutritifs
et les partage avec des Pokémon ou des personnes blessés.

這只善良的神奇寶貝會產下營養豐富的蛋

y los comparte con Pokémon o personas heridas.

This Pokémon apparently used to live in.fr:
Ce Pokémon vivait apparemment dans de nombreux

ambientes mais severos e, portanto, já teve

desde hace 10.000 años. por un

This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.en:
This Pokémon is still small and timid.
Whenever Magby gets excited or surprised,
flames leak from its mouth and its nose.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.es:
Este Pokémon todavía es pequeño y tímido.
Cada vez que Magby se emociona o se sorprende,
Las llamas se escapan de su boca y su nariz.
This Pokémon is still small and timid.\n.fr:
Ce Pokémon est encore petit et timide.
Chaque fois que Magby est excitée ou surprise,
des flammes s'échappent de sa bouche et de son nez.

This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank.

settle down unless it washes its body.

calmarse a menos que se lave el cuerpo.

這只神奇寶貝在河岸上生活和築巢。
玩泥巴之後就不行了
除非它清洗身體，否則就安定下來。

Dopo aver giocato nel fango, non sarà in grado di farlo

You may discard any number of your Bench.en: You may discard any number of your Benched {W} Pokémon. This attack does 40 more damage for each Benched Pokémon you discarded in this way.
You may discard any number of your Bench.fr: Vous pouvez défausser n'importe quel nombre de vos Pokémon {W} de Banc. Cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque Pokémon de Banc que vous avez défaussé de cette manière.
You may discard any number of your Bench.es: Puedes descartar cualquier cantidad de tus Pokémon {W} en Banca. Este ataque hace 40 daños más por cada Pokémon en Banca que descartes de esta forma.
You may discard any number of your Bench.de: Du kannst eine beliebige Anzahl deiner {W}-Pokémon auf deiner Bank abwerfen. Dieser Angriff verursacht 40 weitere Schadenspunkte für jedes Bank-Pokémon, das du auf diese Weise abgeworfen hast.
You may discard any number of your Bench.zh-tw: 您可以丟棄任意數量的替補 {W} 神奇寶貝。你以這種方式丟棄的每個後備神奇寶貝都會額外受到 40 點傷害。
You may discard any number of your Bench.it: Puoi scartare un qualsiasi numero dei tuoi Pokémon {W} in panchina. Questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più per ogni Pokémon in panchina che hai scartato in questo modo.
You may discard any number of your Bench.pt-br: Você pode descartar qualquer número dos seus Pokémon {W} no Banco. Este ataque causa 40 pontos de dano a mais para cada Pokémon no Banco que você descartou dessa forma.
