Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.en: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a Supporter card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.fr: Votre adversaire révèle sa main. Choisissez une carte Supporter que vous y trouvez et mélangez-la dans le deck de votre adversaire.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.de: Ihr Gegner deckt seine Hand auf. Wähle eine Unterstützerkarte, die du dort findest, und mische sie in das Deck deines Gegners.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.pt-br: Seu oponente revela sua mão. Escolha uma carta de Apoiador que encontrar lá e embaralhe-a no baralho do seu oponente.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.es: Tu oponente revela su mano. Elige una carta de Partidario que encuentres allí y mézclala en el mazo de tu oponente.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.zh-tw: 你的對手亮出了他們的牌。選擇在那裡找到的一張支持者卡並將其洗入對手的牌庫中。
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.it: Il tuo avversario rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta Aiuto che trovi lì e mischiala nel mazzo del tuo avversario.

A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.en: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a constant search for warm places.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slo.zh-tw: 它在火山地區很常見，它緩慢地滑行，不斷尋找溫暖的地方。

A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it.en: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.
A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it.zh-tw: 性情溫和的草食性神奇寶貝，它用臉挖樹根來吃。臉上的皮膚非常堅韌。

A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it c.en: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it c.zh-tw: 性格頑強的寶可夢，會追逐選定的獵物直至獵物筋疲力盡。

A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard.en: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.
A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard.zh-tw: 它是一種原始神奇寶貝，擁有堅硬的頭骨，內部缺乏任何智慧。

After burrowing into the sand, it waits.en: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.
After burrowing into the sand, it waits.zh-tw: 鑽入沙子後，它耐心地等待獵物靠近。這只神奇寶貝和西毛足蟲有著共同的血統。

After captivating opponents with its swe.en: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
After captivating opponents with its swe.zh-tw: 用甜美的氣味迷惑對手後，用帶刺的鞭子抽打他們。

Although it can control its units known.en: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don't come back.
Although it can control its units known.zh-tw: 雖然它可以控制被稱為迷你鼻子的單位，但它們有時會迷路並且不會回來。

Ancient people imagined that beneath the.en: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground dwelt a gigantic Torterra.
Ancient people imagined that beneath the.zh-tw: 古人想像地下有一個巨大的托爾特拉。

As it did more and more with its tail, i.en: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.
As it did more and more with its tail, i.zh-tw: 隨著它尾巴的動作越來越多，它的手也變得笨拙了。它把巢築在高高的樹頂上。

As often as you like during your turn, y.en: As often as you like during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon that has damage on it, and move all of its damage to this Pokémon.
As often as you like during your turn, y.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以隨時選擇一隻受到傷害的神奇寶貝，並將其所有傷害轉移到這只神奇寶貝上。

At the bidding of transmissions from the.en: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.
At the bidding of transmissions from the.zh-tw: 在來自靈界的傳送指令下，它會偷走人類和神奇寶貝。沒有人知道它是否有自己的意志。

At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon.en: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, it recovers from all of them, and discard this card.
At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon.zh-tw: 每回合結束時，如果這張卡所附著的神奇寶貝受到任何特殊狀態的影響，它就會從所有特殊狀態中恢復，並捨棄這張卡。

Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.en: Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.zh-tw: 你的{F}神奇寶貝使用的攻擊對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成+20傷害。
Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.es: Los ataques utilizados por tu Pokémon {F} hacen +20 de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.fr: Les attaques utilisées par votre Pokémon {F} infligent +20 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.pt-br: Os ataques usados ​​pelos seus Pokémon {F} causam +20 de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.it: Gli attacchi usati dai tuoi Pokémon {F} infliggono +20 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.
Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20.de: Angriffe deines {F}-Pokémon fügen dem Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners +20 Schaden zu.

By allowing its cry to resonate in the h.en: By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces a captivating sound.
By allowing its cry to resonate in the h.zh-tw: 通過讓它的叫聲在腹部的空腔中產生共鳴，它會發出迷人的聲音。

Change the type of the next Energy that.en: Change the type of the next Energy that will be generated for your opponent to 1 of the following at random: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, or {M}.
Change the type of the next Energy that.zh-tw: 將為對手生成的下一個能量類型隨機更改為以下其中一種：{G}、{R}、{W}、{L}、{P}、{F}、{D}或{M}。

Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. A.en: Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. Attach 2 {L} Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.
Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. A.zh-tw: 選擇您的 Electivire 或 Luxray 之一。從你的棄牌堆中將 2 個 {L} 能量附加到該神奇寶貝上。

Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.en: Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch it with a random Pokémon in your deck.
Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.zh-tw: 選擇你手中的一隻神奇寶貝，然後將其與你牌組中隨機的一隻神奇寶貝進行交換。
Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.fr: Choisissez un Pokémon dans votre main et échangez-le avec un Pokémon aléatoire dans votre deck.
Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.it: Scegli un Pokémon che hai in mano e scambialo con un Pokémon casuale nel tuo mazzo.
Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.es: Elige un Pokémon en tu mano y cámbialo por un Pokémon aleatorio en tu mazo.
Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.de: Wähle ein Pokémon in deiner Hand und tausche es gegen ein zufälliges Pokémon in deinem Deck.
Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch.pt-br: Escolha um Pokémon em sua mão e troque-o por um Pokémon aleatório em seu baralho.

Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon..en: Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 {L} 能量。
Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon..fr: Défaussez une Énergie {L} de ce Pokémon.
Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon..es: Descarta una {L} Energía de este Pokémon.
Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon..de: Wirf eine {L} Energie von diesem Pokémon ab.

Discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon.en: Discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
Discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon.zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的所有 {L} 能量。這次攻擊對對手的 1 只神奇寶貝造成 120 點傷害。

Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.en: Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的所有 {R} 能量。
Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.fr: Défaussez toute l'énergie {R} de ce Pokémon.
Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.es: Descarta toda la Energía {R} de este Pokémon.
Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.it: Scarta tutte le Energie {R} da questo Pokémon.
Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.de: Lege alle {R}-Energien von diesem Pokémon ab.
Discard all {R} Energy from this Pokémon.pt-br: Descarte todas as energias {R} deste Pokémon.

Discard the top 3 cards of your deck..en: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
Discard the top 3 cards of your deck..zh-tw: 丟棄你牌組頂的 3 張牌。

During this turn, attacks used by your G.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Garchomp or Togekiss do +50 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During this turn, attacks used by your G.zh-tw: 這個回合中，你的巨咬怪或巨齒鯊使用的攻擊對對手的活躍寶可夢造成 +50 點傷害。

During your next turn, this Pokémon can'.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Frenzy Plant.
During your next turn, this Pokémon can'.zh-tw: 在你的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝無法使用瘋狂植物。

During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overdrive Smash attack does +60 damage.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.zh-tw: 在你的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝的超速粉碎攻擊造成+60點傷害。

Every bit of Regirock's body is made of.en: Every bit of Regirock's body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what's been lost.
Every bit of Regirock's body is made of.zh-tw: 雷吉洛克身體的每一部分都是石頭製成的。當身體的一部分被侵蝕時，這只神奇寶貝會將岩石粘在自己身上以修復失去的部分。

Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.en: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
Feared and loathed by many, it is believ.zh-tw: 許多人害怕和厭惡它，人們相信它會給所有在夜間看到它的人帶來不幸。

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 40 點傷害。

Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more d.en: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more d.zh-tw: 翻轉 3 個硬幣。此攻擊對每個頭造成 50 點額外傷害。

Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage.en: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads. If at least 2 of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 4 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 40 點傷害。如果其中至少有 2 個為正面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在中毒。

Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in.en: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in.zh-tw: 為遊戲中的每個神奇寶貝投一枚硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 20 點傷害。

Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in.en: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in.zh-tw: 為遊戲中的每個神奇寶貝投一枚硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 40 點傷害。

Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.en: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣，直到出現反面。此攻擊對每個頭造成 30 點額外傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent.en: Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.
Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，則將對手的活躍寶可夢放入手牌。

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，這次攻擊會造成 20 點額外傷害。
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, este ataque hace 20 daños más.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c'est face, cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts supplémentaires.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ fügt dieser Angriff 20 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, questo attacco infligge 20 danni in più.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, este ataque causa 20 de dano a mais.

If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.en: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.
If any damage is done to this Pokémon by.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝受到攻擊造成的傷害，則擲硬幣。如果正面，該寶可夢因這次攻擊受到 -100 點傷害。

If both of Buneary's ears are rolled up,.en: If both of Buneary's ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It's a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.
If both of Buneary's ears are rolled up,.zh-tw: 如果Buneary的兩隻耳朵都捲起來，則表明它的身體或精神出了問題。這是神奇寶貝需要照顧的明確信號。

If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.en: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on.zh-tw: 如果它沖向敵人，它背上的汗毛就會豎起來。它對聲音非常敏感。

If it finds bad children who won't liste.en: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it's said.
If it finds bad children who won't liste.zh-tw: 如果它發現不聽父母的話的壞孩子，它就會把他們偷走——至少是這麼說的。

If the convection microwave oven is not.en: If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic.
If the convection microwave oven is not.zh-tw: 如果對流微波爐無法正常工作，那麼居住在其中的洛托姆就會變得昏昏欲睡。

If the Pokémon this card is attached to.en: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.zh-tw: 這張卡所附著的寶可夢位於活動區域並因對方寶可夢的攻擊而受到傷害時，對攻擊的寶可夢造成 20 點傷害。
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.es: Si el Pokémon al que está unida esta carta está en el Punto Activo y es dañado por un ataque del Pokémon de tu rival, haz 20 puntos de daño al Pokémon Atacante.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.fr: Si le Pokémon auquel cette carte est attachée se trouve dans le Point Actif et est endommagé par une attaque du Pokémon de votre adversaire, infligez 20 dégâts au Pokémon attaquant.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.it: Se il Pokémon a cui è assegnata questa carta è in posizione attiva e viene danneggiato da un attacco dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, infliggi 20 danni al Pokémon attaccante.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.de: Wenn sich das Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, an der aktiven Stelle befindet und durch einen Angriff des Pokémon deines Gegners beschädigt wird, füge dem angreifenden Pokémon 20 Schadenspunkte zu.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.pt-br: Se o Pokémon ao qual esta carta está ligada estiver no Ponto Ativo e for danificado por um ataque dos Pokémon do seu oponente, cause 20 pontos de dano ao Pokémon Atacante.

If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attac.en: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.
If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attac.zh-tw: 如果該神奇寶貝附加了神奇寶貝工具，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.en: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.
If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.zh-tw: 如果該神奇寶貝附加了任何能量，則它沒有撤退成本。
If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.fr: Si ce Pokémon a de l'Énergie attachée, il n'a pas de Coût de Retraite.
If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.es: Si este Pokémon tiene alguna Energía unida, no tiene Coste de Retirada.
If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.pt-br: Se este Pokémon tiver alguma Energia ligada, ela não terá Custo de Recuo.
If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.it: Se questo Pokémon ha delle Energie assegnate, non ha costo di ritirata.
If this Pokémon has any Energy attached,.de: Wenn an dieses Pokémon Energie angelegt ist, fallen keine Rückzugskosten an.

If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L}.en: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L} Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L}.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝附加了至少 2 個額外的 {L} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 80 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍神奇寶貝附有神奇寶貝工具，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {F} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢是{F}寶可夢，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.en: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.zh-tw: 如果對手的寶可夢因這次攻擊而被擊倒，則該寶可夢也會對其自身造成 50 點傷害。

In ancient times, people would dig up fo.en: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.
In ancient times, people would dig up fo.zh-tw: 在古代，人們會挖掘這種神奇寶貝的化石，並用它比鋼鐵還硬的頭骨來製作頭盔。

It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly.en: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.
It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly.zh-tw: 它通過從尾尖噴出難聞的液體來進行攻擊。來自上方的攻擊使其感到困惑。

It busily makes its nest with stacks of.en: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
It busily makes its nest with stacks of.zh-tw: 它忙著用鋒利的門牙切下的成堆的樹枝和樹根築巢。

It can control its body temperature at w.en: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
It can control its body temperature at w.zh-tw: 它可以隨意控制自己的體溫。這使得它能夠凍結大氣中的水分，產生鑽石塵埃。

It can load up to three projectiles per.en: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.
It can load up to three projectiles per.zh-tw: 它每隻手臂最多可以將三枚射彈裝入其手中的孔中。從這些洞中噴出的可能是岩石，也可能是羅根羅拉。

It can see clearly through walls to trac.en: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
It can see clearly through walls to trac.zh-tw: 它可以清晰地透過牆壁追踪獵物並尋找丟失的幼崽。

It chases people and Pokémon from its te.en: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
It chases people and Pokémon from its te.zh-tw: 它通過讓人類和神奇寶貝經歷噩夢般的深度睡眠來將他們驅逐出其領地。

It claws if displeased and purrs when af.en: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
It claws if displeased and purrs when af.zh-tw: 當它不高興時，它會用爪子抓；當它充滿感情時，它會發出咕嚕聲。它的善變在一些人中很受歡迎。

It doesn't like to be taken care of. It'.en: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
It doesn't like to be taken care of. It'.zh-tw: 它不喜歡被照顧。它很難與它建立聯繫，因為它不聽訓練師的話。

It is born with a wondrous power that le.en: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
It is born with a wondrous power that le.zh-tw: 它天生就擁有一種神奇的力量，可以與任何種類的神奇寶貝產生聯繫。

It is merciless by nature. It is said th.en: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
It is merciless by nature. It is said th.zh-tw: 它本質上是無情的。據說它永遠不會原諒暗鴉追隨者所犯的錯誤。

It is said that when one runs at high sp.en: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
It is said that when one runs at high sp.zh-tw: 據說，當一個人高速奔跑時，它的翅膀會產生風葉，可以吹倒附近的樹木。

It is said to have made Pokémon that loo.en: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
It is said to have made Pokémon that loo.zh-tw: 據說，它用特殊的冰山、岩石和岩漿創造了與自己相似的神奇寶貝。

It is surprisingly quick to anger. It ho.en: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.
It is surprisingly quick to anger. It ho.zh-tw: 它非常容易生氣。它張開嘴以展示其力量。

It is whispered that any child who mista.en: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.
It is whispered that any child who mista.zh-tw: 有傳言說，任何將 Drifloon 誤認為氣球並抓住它的孩子都可能會失踪。

It launches kicks while spinning. If it.en: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
It launches kicks while spinning. If it.zh-tw: 它在旋轉時發射踢腿。如果它高速旋轉，它可能會鑽入地下。

It lives alone, away from others. Appare.en: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
It lives alone, away from others. Appare.zh-tw: 它獨自生活，遠離他人。顯然，他們每個人都認為這是最重要的。

It lives along water in forests. In the.en: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
It lives along water in forests. In the.zh-tw: 它生活在森林裡的水邊。白天，它離開森林去曬樹殼上的日光浴。

It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to.en: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to.zh-tw: 它模仿其他神奇寶貝的叫聲，讓它們誤以為它是其中之一。這樣他們就不會攻擊它。

It observes prey while hanging inverted.en: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
It observes prey while hanging inverted.zh-tw: 它倒掛在樹枝上觀察獵物。當機會出現時，它就會猛撲過去！

It rubs its snout on the ground to find.en: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.
It rubs its snout on the ground to find.zh-tw: 它用鼻子在地上摩擦來尋找和挖掘食物。有時它會發現溫泉。

It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.en: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and.zh-tw: 它尋找漂浮的鬼火，並將它們吸進它空蕩蕩的身體裡。裡面發生的事情是個謎。

It shuts its nostrils tight, then travel.en: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.
It shuts its nostrils tight, then travel.zh-tw: 它緊緊閉上鼻孔，然後像走路一樣穿過沙子。它們形成大約 10 個的群體。

It skillfully controls the intensity of.en: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
It skillfully controls the intensity of.zh-tw: 它巧妙地控制尾部火焰的強度，使敵人保持在理想的距離。

It spins its two tails like a screw to p.en: It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself through water. The tails also slice clinging seaweed.
It spins its two tails like a screw to p.zh-tw: 它像螺絲一樣旋轉兩條尾巴，在水中推進自己。尾巴還可以切掉附著的海藻。

It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. It.en: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. It.zh-tw: 它從後部噴出骯髒的液體。它的惡臭蔓延一英里半徑，將神奇寶貝趕走了。

It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edge.en: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edge.zh-tw: 它游得像噴射艇一樣快。它的翅膀邊緣很鋒利，可以切開流冰。

It used to have a shell on its back long.en: It used to have a shell on its back long ago. This species is closely related to Pokémon like Shellder.
It used to have a shell on its back long.zh-tw: 很久以前，它的背上曾經有一個殼。這個物種與貝殼怪等神奇寶貝有密切關係。

It uses its tails for everything. If it.en: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that's proof it really likes you.
It uses its tails for everything. If it.zh-tw: 它用尾巴做一切事情。如果它用兩條尾巴纏住你並擠壓你，那就證明它真的喜歡你。

It uses its whole body to photosynthesiz.en: It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from hardened soil.
It uses its whole body to photosynthesiz.zh-tw: 當暴露在陽光下時，它會利用整個身體進行光合作用。它的外殼是由硬化的土壤製成的。

It usually clings to cliffs. When it spo.en: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spo.zh-tw: 它通常緊貼懸崖。當它發現獵物時，它會展開翅膀並滑翔下來進行攻擊。

It will always obey the commands of a sk.en: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
It will always obey the commands of a sk.zh-tw: 它總是服從熟練訓練師的命令。它的行為源於遠古時期的群居生活。

It would claim another Pokémon's nest as.en: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
It would claim another Pokémon's nest as.zh-tw: 如果它發現一個足夠舒適的巢穴，它會聲稱另一個神奇寶貝的巢穴是自己的。

It's said that no foe can remain invisib.en: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.
It's said that no foe can remain invisib.zh-tw: 據說路卡利歐無法對任何敵人保持隱形，因為它可以探測到光環——甚至是它無法看到的敵人的光環。

Its appearance changes depending on wher.en: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
Its appearance changes depending on wher.zh-tw: 它的外觀會根據它的進化位置而變化。手上的材料變成了它身體的一部分。

Its brittle shell occasionally spouts in.en: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.
Its brittle shell occasionally spouts in.zh-tw: 它脆弱的外殼偶爾會噴出強烈的火焰，並在其全身循環。

Its constant mischief and misdeeds resul.en: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.
Its constant mischief and misdeeds resul.zh-tw: 它不斷的惡作劇和惡行導致它被一個神秘的咒語束縛在一個奇怪的基石上。

Its eyes can see 360 degrees without mov.en: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss prey—even those behind it.
Its eyes can see 360 degrees without mov.zh-tw: 它的眼睛無需移動頭部即可看到 360 度。它不會錯過獵物——甚至是獵物背後的獵物。

Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made.en: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.
Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made.zh-tw: 它燃燒的後端由腹部產生的氣體提供燃料。即使下雨也無法撲滅大火。

Its flowers give off a relaxing fragranc.en: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.
Its flowers give off a relaxing fragranc.zh-tw: 它的花朵散發出令人放鬆的香味。 Roselia 的香氣越濃，就越健康。

Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles.en: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.
Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles.zh-tw: 它的腿很短。每當它絆倒時，它僵硬的觸角就會發出木琴般的聲音。

Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees.en: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.
Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees.zh-tw: 它的毒力很強，但很少有人使用。這種神奇寶貝更喜歡使用物理力量，利用其碾碎汽車的力量進行狂暴。

Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taug.en:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taug.zh-tw:
被稱為“情感的存在”。它教導了
人類是悲傷、痛苦和歡樂的高貴。

Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is.en:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said
that it can wipe out the memory of those who see
its eyes.
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is.zh-tw:
被稱為“知識的存在”。據說
它可以抹去那些看過的人的記憶
它的眼睛。

Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sl.en:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the
bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sl.zh-tw:
被稱為“意志力的存在”。它睡在
湖底維持世界平衡。

Lopunny is constantly monitoring its sur.en: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.
Lopunny is constantly monitoring its sur.zh-tw: Lopunny 不斷監視著周圍的環境。如果危險臨近，這只神奇寶貝會用超破壞性的踢來回應。

Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.en: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.zh-tw: 將能量從你的 1 個後備神奇寶貝轉移到你的活躍神奇寶貝上。
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.it: Sposta un'Energia da 1 dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina al tuo Pokémon attivo.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.fr: Déplacez une Énergie de l'un de vos Pokémon de Banc vers votre Pokémon Actif.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.es: Mueve una Energía de 1 de tus Pokémon en Banca a tu Pokémon Activo.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.pt-br: Mova uma Energia de 1 dos seus Pokémon no Banco para o seu Pokémon Ativo.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Po.de: Verschiebe eine Energie von einem deiner Bank-Pokémon auf dein Aktives Pokémon.

Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.en: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以治療每隻神奇寶貝造成的 10 點傷害。
Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.es: Una vez durante tu turno, puedes curar 10 daños de cada uno de tus Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, puoi curare 10 danni a ciascuno dei tuoi Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, vous pouvez soigner 10 dégâts de chacun de vos Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, você pode curar 10 pontos de dano de cada um dos seus Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 10 d.de: Einmal während deines Zuges kannst du 10 Schadenspunkte bei jedem deiner Pokémon heilen.

People fashion swords from Skarmory's sh.en: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.
People fashion swords from Skarmory's sh.zh-tw: 人們用斯卡莫里脫落的羽毛製作劍，因此這只神奇寶貝是紋章設計中的流行元素。

Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Bas.en: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.
Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Bas.zh-tw: 像使用 40 HP 基本 {C} 神奇寶貝一樣使用這張卡。在你回合中的任何時候，你都可以將這張牌從遊戲中丟棄。這張卡不能撤退。

Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.en: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances.zh-tw: 熱帶地區資源豐富。當它跳舞時，花瓣相互摩擦，發出悅耳的鈴聲。

Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.en: Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.
Porygon-Z had a program installed to all.zh-tw: Porygon-Z 安裝了一個程序，允許它在維度之間移動，但該程序也導致了 Porygon-Z 行為的不穩定。

Prevent all effects of attacks used by y.en: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon.
Prevent all effects of attacks used by y.zh-tw: 阻止對方寶可夢對這只寶可夢的所有攻擊效果。

Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your dec.en: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your deck onto your Bench.
Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your dec.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將 1 只基礎寶可夢放到你的替補席上。

Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagun.en: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.
Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagun.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將 1 只 Glameow、Stunky 或 Croagunk 置入你的手牌。

Registeel's body is made of a strange ma.en: Registeel's body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.
Registeel's body is made of a strange ma.zh-tw: Registeel 的身體由一種奇怪的材料製成，這種材料具有足夠的柔韌性，可以拉伸和收縮，但也比任何金屬都更耐用。

Shiny particles are released from its wi.en: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
Shiny particles are released from its wi.zh-tw: 閃亮的粒子像面紗一樣從翅膀上釋放出來。據說它代表新月。

Some say this Pokémon is a collection of.en: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.
Some say this Pokémon is a collection of.zh-tw: 有人說，這只神奇寶貝是一群帶著遺憾的靈魂的集合，在黃昏中默默地漂流。

Strong electricity courses through the t.en: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
Strong electricity courses through the t.zh-tw: 強大的電流穿過它鋒利的爪子的尖端。輕微的抓傷會使敵人昏厥。

Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.en: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.
Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.zh-tw: 將對手後備場的 1 只受到傷害的寶可夢切換到活躍點。
Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.es: Cambia al Punto Activo 1 de los Pokémon en Banca de tu rival que tenga daño.
Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.fr: Insérez 1 des Pokémon de Banc de votre adversaire qui ont des dégâts sur le point actif.
Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.pt-br: Troque 1 dos Pokémon no Banco do seu oponente que tenha dano no Ponto Ativo.
Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.it: Metti in posizione attiva uno dei Pokémon nella panchina del tuo avversario che ha dei danni su di sé.
Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched P.de: Tauschen Sie 1 Pokémon auf der Bank Ihres Gegners, das Schaden hat, an der aktiven Stelle aus.

Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to Mesprit or Azelf.
Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區獲取 {P} 能量並將其附加到 Mesprit 或 Azelf 上。

Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
Take a {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出一個{R}能量並將其附加到該神奇寶貝上。

Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.en: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.
Tangrowth has two arms that it can exten.zh-tw: Tangrowth 有兩條手臂，可以隨意伸展。最近的研究表明，這些手臂實際上是一束藤蔓。

The amount of electrical energy this Pok.en: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.
The amount of electrical energy this Pok.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝產生的電能與其脈衝頻率成正比。當 Electiire 處於戰斗狀態時，電壓會跳躍。

The bones of its face are huge and hard,.en: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.
The bones of its face are huge and hard,.zh-tw: 它的臉部骨骼巨大且堅硬，因此被誤認為是它的脊柱，直到這只神奇寶貝被成功修復後。

The extension and contraction of its mus.en: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
The extension and contraction of its mus.zh-tw: 其肌肉的伸展和收縮會產生電力。當遇到困難時它會發光。

The lawn mower is one of the household a.en: The lawn mower is one of the household appliances that led to the development of the Rotom Dex.
The lawn mower is one of the household a.zh-tw: 割草機是推動 Rotom Dex 發展的家用電器之一。

The line running down its side can store.en: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.
The line running down its side can store.zh-tw: 沿著其側面延伸的線可以儲存陽光。它在夜間閃閃發光。

The Pokémon this card is attached to get.en: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.
The Pokémon this card is attached to get.zh-tw: 貼有這張卡的神奇寶貝HP+20。
The Pokémon this card is attached to get.es: El Pokémon al que está unida esta carta obtiene +20 HP.
The Pokémon this card is attached to get.fr: Le Pokémon auquel cette carte est attachée obtient +20 PV.
The Pokémon this card is attached to get.pt-br: O Pokémon ao qual esta carta está anexada recebe +20 HP.
The Pokémon this card is attached to get.it: Il Pokémon a cui è assegnata questa carta ottiene +20 HP.
The Pokémon this card is attached to get.de: Das Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, erhält +20 HP.

The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.en: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
The shell seems to be filled with joy. I.zh-tw: 貝殼裡似乎充滿了喜悅。據說，如果受到善待，它會分享好運。

These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.en: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly been seen at all.
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere ne.zh-tw: 這些神奇寶貝從未出現在衝突或動亂附近。最近一段時間，幾乎看不到他們的身影了。

They communicate with one another using.en: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.
They communicate with one another using.zh-tw: 他們利用自己的氣場相互交流。他們能夠整夜奔跑。

They normally inhabit rocky seashores, b.en: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.
They normally inhabit rocky seashores, b.zh-tw: 它們通常棲息在岩石海岸，但在持續下雨的時候，有時也可以在遠離大海的山上找到它們。

They say that it will appear before kind.en: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
They say that it will appear before kind.zh-tw: 據說它會出現在善良、有愛心的人面前，給他們帶來幸福。

This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of.en: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of.zh-tw: 這次攻擊也會對對手後備的 1 只神奇寶貝造成 30 點傷害。

This attack does 10 damage to each of yo.en: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.
This attack does 10 damage to each of yo.zh-tw: 這次攻擊對對手的每隻神奇寶貝造成 10 點傷害。

This attack does more damage equal to th.en: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.
This attack does more damage equal to th.zh-tw: 這次攻擊造成的傷害等於該神奇寶貝對其造成的傷害。

This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.en: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cov.zh-tw: 這種狡猾的神奇寶貝隱藏在黑暗的掩護下，等待攻擊獵物。

This is a Porygon that was updated with.en: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.
This is a Porygon that was updated with.zh-tw: 這是一個用特殊數據更新的 Porygon。 Porygon2 通過自行學習許多不同的主題來發展自己。

This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.en: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall pain.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝可以追溯到一萬年前的壁畫中。有一段時間，人們認為它已經滅絕了。

This Pokémon startles people in the midd.en: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.
This Pokémon startles people in the midd.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝會在半夜嚇到人們。它聚集恐懼作為能量。

This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attac.en: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks from {R} or {W} Pokémon.
This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attac.zh-tw: 該神奇寶貝因 {R} 或 {W} 神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到 -20 點傷害。

This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. I.en: This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze the area around it.
This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. I.zh-tw: 這個洛托姆已經進入了冰箱。當它使用冷空氣凍結周圍區域後，它會高興地跳來跳去。

This Rotom has entered a washing machine.en: This Rotom has entered a washing machine. It nods with satisfaction after it floods the surrounding area.
This Rotom has entered a washing machine.zh-tw: 這個洛托姆已經進入了洗衣機。當它淹沒了周圍區域後，它滿意地點點頭。

This Rotom has entered an electric fan..en: This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.
This Rotom has entered an electric fan..zh-tw: 這個洛托姆已經進入了電風扇之中。當它吹走了周圍的一切後，它對一個精心策劃的惡作劇感到滿意地傻笑。

To shelter itself from cold, wintry wind.en: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
To shelter itself from cold, wintry wind.zh-tw: 為了躲避寒冷的冬風，它用樹枝和樹葉製成的斗篷蓋住自己。

When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire.en: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire.zh-tw: 當瑪格莫塔深吸一口氣時，其腹部燃燒的火焰會加劇，溫度升至 3,600 華氏度以上。

When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch o.en: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch o.zh-tw: 當你看到Leafeon在陽光下熟睡時，你就會知道它正在利用光合作用來產生清潔的空氣。

Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.en: Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.zh-tw: 每當你將能量區中的 {D} 能量附加到這只神奇寶貝上時，就會對對手的活躍神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害。
Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.es: Siempre que unes una Energía {D} de tu Zona de Energía a este Pokémon, haz 20 puntos de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu rival.
Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.fr: Chaque fois que vous attachez une Énergie {D} de votre Zone d'Énergie à ce Pokémon, infligez 20 dégâts au Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire.
Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.de: Immer wenn du diesem Pokémon eine {D}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone anlegst, füge dem Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners 20 Schadenspunkte zu.
Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.pt-br: Sempre que você associar uma Energia {D} da sua Zona de Energia a este Pokémon, cause 20 pontos de dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente.
Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from yo.it: Ogni volta che assegni un'Energia {D} dalla tua Zona delle Energie a questo Pokémon, infliggi 20 danni al Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario.

With cold air that can reach temperature.en: With cold air that can reach temperatures as low as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly freezes any creature that approaches it.
With cold air that can reach temperature.zh-tw: 雷吉斯的冷空氣溫度可低至-328華氏度，會立即凍結任何接近它的生物。

With its flotation sac inflated, it can.en: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
With its flotation sac inflated, it can.zh-tw: 當浮囊膨脹時，它可以背著人。它在潛水前將囊放氣。

With its shining light, it lures its pre.en: With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.
With its shining light, it lures its pre.zh-tw: 它用耀眼的光芒引誘獵物靠近。然而，光線也恰好吸引了兇猛的魚類神奇寶貝——它的天敵。

With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.en: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
With nerves of steel, nothing can pertur.zh-tw: 有著鋼鐵般的意志，沒有什麼可以擾亂它。它比看上去更加敏捷和活躍。

You can use this attack only if you have.en: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.
You can use this attack only if you have.zh-tw: 僅當您的替補席上有 Uxie 和 Azelf 時，您才能使用此攻擊。丟棄該神奇寶貝的所有能量。

You must discard a card from your hand i.en: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.
You must discard a card from your hand i.zh-tw: 您必須從手上棄掉一張牌才能使用此能力。在你的回合中，你可以抽一張牌。

Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.en: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.
Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose.zh-tw: 你的對手亮出了他們的牌。選擇在那裡找到的一張牌並將其洗入對手的牌庫中。

Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.en: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.zh-tw: 你的對手將他們的手牌洗入牌庫，並根據獲勝所需的剩餘點數抽一張牌。
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.es: Tu oponente baraja su mano en su mazo y roba una carta por cada uno de los puntos restantes necesarios para ganar.
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.fr: Votre adversaire mélange sa main dans son deck et pioche une carte pour chacun de ses points restants nécessaires pour gagner.
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.pt-br: Seu oponente embaralha a mão no baralho e compra uma carta para cada um dos pontos restantes necessários para vencer.
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.it: Il tuo avversario mescola la sua mano nel suo mazzo e pesca una carta per ciascuno dei punti rimanenti necessari per vincere.
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.de: Ihr Gegner mischt seine Hand in sein Deck und zieht eine Karte für jeden seiner verbleibenden Punkte, die er zum Sieg benötigt.

1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.en: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 3 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.zh-tw: 隨機選擇 1 只對手的神奇寶貝 3 次。每次選擇一隻神奇寶貝，對其造成 50 點傷害。
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.es: 1 de los Pokémon de tu oponente se elige al azar 3 veces. Por cada vez que se elija un Pokémon, hazle 50 daños.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.pt-br: 1 dos Pokémon do seu oponente é escolhido aleatoriamente 3 vezes. Para cada vez que um Pokémon for escolhido, cause 50 de dano a ele.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.fr: 1 des Pokémon de votre adversaire est choisi au hasard 3 fois. À chaque fois qu'un Pokémon est choisi, infligez-lui 50 dégâts.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.de: 1 Pokémon deines Gegners wird dreimal zufällig ausgewählt. Füge ihm jedes Mal, wenn ein Pokémon ausgewählt wurde, 50 Schadenspunkte zu.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.it: 1 dei Pokémon del tuo avversario viene scelto a caso 3 volte. Per ogni volta che viene scelto un Pokémon, infliggigli 50 danni.

1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.en: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random. Do 30 damage to it.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.zh-tw: 隨機選擇 1 只對手的神奇寶貝。對其造成 30 點傷害。
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.fr: 1 des Pokémon de votre adversaire est choisi au hasard. Faites-lui 30 dégâts.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.pt-br: 1 dos Pokémon do seu oponente é escolhido aleatoriamente. Cause 30 de dano a ele.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.es: 1 de los Pokémon de tu oponente se elige al azar. Hazle 30 daños.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.de: 1 Pokémon deines Gegners wird zufällig ausgewählt. Füge ihm 30 Schaden zu.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.it: Viene scelto a caso 1 dei Pokémon del tuo avversario. Infliggigli 30 danni.

After losing a territorial struggle, Woo.en: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokémon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.
After losing a territorial struggle, Woo.zh-tw: 在領土爭奪戰中失敗後，伍珀開始在陸地上生活。隨著時間的推移，神奇寶貝發生了變化，產生了一層有毒的薄膜來保護它的身體。

After stunning its opponents with the pa.en: After stunning its opponents with the pattern on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its body and waits for them to stop moving.
After stunning its opponents with the pa.zh-tw: 用腹部的圖案擊暈對手後，它會迅速將對手包裹在自己的身體中，等待他們停止移動。

Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing pe.en: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.
Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing pe.zh-tw: 顯然 Cyclizar 自古以來就允許人們騎在它的背上。一萬年前的壁畫中就發現了對此的描述。

During this turn, attacks used by your P.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.zh-tw: 這個回合中，自己的寶可夢的攻擊對對手的現役寶可夢造成+20點傷害。
During this turn, attacks used by your P.es: Durante este turno, los ataques utilizados por tu Pokémon causan +20 de daño al Pokémon Activo de tu rival, ex.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.fr: Durant ce tour, les attaques utilisées par votre Pokémon infligent +20 dégâts au Pokémon Actif ex de votre adversaire.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.pt-br: Durante este turno, os ataques usados ​​pelos seus Pokémon causam +20 de dano ao Pokémon Ativo ex do seu oponente.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.it: Durante questo turno, gli attacchi usati dai tuoi Pokémon infliggono +20 danni al Pokémon attivo ex del tuo avversario.
During this turn, attacks used by your P.de: Während dieser Runde fügen Angriffe deines Pokémon dem aktiven Pokémon ex deines Gegners +20 Schaden zu.

During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overacceleration attack does +20 damage.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.zh-tw: 在你的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝的過度加速攻擊造成+20點傷害。
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.it: Durante il tuo prossimo turno, l'attacco Accelerazione eccessiva di questo Pokémon infligge +20 danni.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.fr: Lors de votre prochain tour, l'attaque Suraccélération de ce Pokémon inflige +20 dégâts.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.es: Durante tu próximo turno, el ataque Sobreaceleración de este Pokémon hace +20 de daño.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.de: Während deines nächsten Zuges verursacht der Überbeschleunigungsangriff dieses Pokémon +20 Schaden.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's Ov.pt-br: Durante o seu próximo turno, o ataque de Superaceleração deste Pokémon causará +20 de dano.

Each player shuffles the cards in their.en: Each player shuffles the cards in their hand into their deck, then draws that many cards.
Each player shuffles the cards in their.zh-tw: 每個玩家將手中的牌洗入自己的牌庫，然後抽出相應數量的牌。
Each player shuffles the cards in their.fr: Chaque joueur mélange les cartes de sa main dans son deck, puis pioche autant de cartes.
Each player shuffles the cards in their.de: Jeder Spieler mischt die Karten auf seiner Hand in sein Deck und zieht dann entsprechend viele Karten.
Each player shuffles the cards in their.es: Cada jugador baraja las cartas que tiene en la mano en su mazo y luego roba esa cantidad de cartas.
Each player shuffles the cards in their.pt-br: Cada jogador embaralha as cartas de sua mão em seu baralho e, em seguida, compra aquela quantidade de cartas.
Each player shuffles the cards in their.it: Ogni giocatore mescola le carte che ha in mano nel proprio mazzo, poi pesca altrettante carte.

Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage.en: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 4 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 20 點傷害。

Flip a coin for each {M} Energy attached.en: Flip a coin for each {M} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin for each {M} Energy attached.zh-tw: 為該神奇寶貝附加的每 {M} 能量拋一枚硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 50 點傷害。

Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果正面，此攻擊會造成 80 點額外傷害。
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.es: Lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, este ataque hace 80 puntos de daño más.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.it: Lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, questo attacco infligge 80 danni in più.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.fr: Lancez une pièce de monnaie. Si c’est face, cette attaque inflige 80 dégâts supplémentaires.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.pt-br: Jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, este ataque causa 80 de dano a mais.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does.de: Wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ fügt dieser Angriff 80 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.

Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.en: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's A.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果出現正面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在處於混亂狀態。

Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden.en: Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.
Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden.zh-tw: 弗洛拉加托巧妙地揮舞著隱藏在長毛皮下的藤蔓，將堅硬的花蕾​​猛擊對手。

Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon, a.en: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon, and it recovers from all Special Conditions.
Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon, a.zh-tw: 治療你的 1 只神奇寶貝造成的 30 點傷害，並且它會從所有特殊狀況中恢復。

If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F}.en: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F} Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F}.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝附加了至少 2 個額外的 {F} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 50 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 70 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.zh-tw: 如果對手的現役神奇寶貝是前神奇寶貝，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 70 點。
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.es: Si el Pokémon Activo de tu rival es un Pokémon ex, este ataque hace 70 puntos de daño más.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.fr: Si le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est un ex Pokémon, cette attaque inflige 70 dégâts supplémentaires.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.pt-br: Se o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente for um Pokémon ex, este ataque causará 70 de dano a mais.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.it: Se il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è un Pokémon ex, questo attacco infligge 70 danni in più.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a P.de: Wenn das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ein Pokémon-Ex ist, fügt dieser Angriff 70 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢中毒，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.fr: Si le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est Empoisonné, cette attaque inflige 60 dégâts supplémentaires.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.es: Si el Pokémon Activo de tu rival está Envenenado, este ataque hace 60 puntos de daño más.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.it: Se il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è avvelenato, questo attacco infligge 60 danni in più.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.pt-br: Se o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente estiver Envenenado, este ataque causará 60 de dano a mais.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.de: Wenn das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners vergiftet ist, fügt dieser Angriff 60 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.

It can generate and release gas within i.en: It can generate and release gas within its body. That's how it can control the altitude of its drift.
It can generate and release gas within i.zh-tw: 它可以在體內產生並釋放氣體。這就是它如何控制漂移高度的方法。

It creates a gas out of poison and miner.en: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders— now numbering eight—to generate energy.
It creates a gas out of poison and miner.zh-tw: 它利用岩石中的毒物和礦物質產生氣體。然後它引爆其氣瓶（現在有八個）中的氣體來產生能量。

It has underdeveloped electric sacs on i.en: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.
It has underdeveloped electric sacs on i.zh-tw: 它的臉頰上有不發達的電囊。只有當波米用前爪上的肉墊猛烈摩擦時，這些囊才能產生電力。

It hugely inflates its stomach and sings.en: It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you'll become sleepy right away.
It hugely inflates its stomach and sings.zh-tw: 它的胃膨脹得很厲害，唱著神秘的旋律。如果你聽到這個旋律，你會立刻昏昏欲睡。

It inflates its flotation sac, keeping i.en: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.
It inflates its flotation sac, keeping i.zh-tw: 它會膨脹浮囊，將臉保持在水面以上，以觀察獵物的運動。

It is said that this Pokémon was born wh.en: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.
It is said that this Pokémon was born wh.zh-tw: 據說這只神奇寶貝是在一種未知的有毒神奇寶貝進入並激發了廢品加工廠留下的引擎時誕生的。

It swings its handmade hammer around to.en: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.
It swings its handmade hammer around to.zh-tw: 它會揮動手工製作的錘子來保護自己，但錘子經常被吃金屬的神奇寶貝偷走。

It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with el.en: It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with el.zh-tw: 它是帶有電動頰囊的神奇寶貝之一。它從尾巴發射電荷。

Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 co.en: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. This Pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.
Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 co.zh-tw: 它的身體似乎是由1000枚硬幣組成的。這只神奇寶貝與其他人相處得很好，很快就能和任何人成為朋友。

Its fluffy fur is similar in composition.en: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.
Its fluffy fur is similar in composition.zh-tw: 它蓬鬆的皮毛與植物的成分相似。這只神奇寶貝經常洗臉以防止臉乾燥。

Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.en: Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky's tongue can stretch so far.
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.zh-tw: Lickilicky 奇怪的舌頭可以伸展到其身體長度的許多倍。到目前為止，還沒有人知道 Lickilicky 的舌頭是如何伸展的。

Once during your turn, you may flip a co.en: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Once during your turn, you may flip a co.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以拋一次硬幣。如果正面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在中毒。

Once during your turn, you may take a {P.en: Once during your turn, you may take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.
Once during your turn, you may take a {P.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以從你的能量區取出一個{P}能量並將其附加到這只神奇寶貝身上。如果你使用了這個能力，你的回合就結束了。
Once during your turn, you may take a {P.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, vous pouvez prendre une Énergie {P} de votre Zone d'Énergie et l'attacher à ce Pokémon. Si vous utilisez cette Capacité, votre tour se termine.
Once during your turn, you may take a {P.es: Una vez durante tu turno, puedes tomar una Energía {P} de tu Zona de Energía y unirla a este Pokémon. Si usas esta habilidad, tu turno termina.
Once during your turn, you may take a {P.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, puoi prendere un'Energia {P} dalla tua Zona Energetica e assegnarla a questo Pokémon. Se usi questa Abilità, il tuo turno termina.
Once during your turn, you may take a {P.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, você pode pegar uma Energia {P} da sua Zona de Energia e associá-la a este Pokémon. Se você usar esta habilidade, seu turno termina.
Once during your turn, you may take a {P.de: Einmal während deines Zuges kannst du eine {P}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone nehmen und sie an dieses Pokémon anlegen. Wenn du diese Fähigkeit nutzt, endet dein Zug.

Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.en: Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto your Bench.
Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.zh-tw: 將 1 個隨機雜草從你的牌組放到你的替補席上。
Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.es: Coloca 1 Weedle aleatorio de tu mazo en tu Banca.
Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.fr: Placez 1 Weedle aléatoire de votre deck sur votre Banc.
Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.pt-br: Coloque 1 Weedle aleatório do seu deck no seu Banco.
Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.it: Metti 1 Weedle a caso dal tuo mazzo nella tua panchina.
Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto.de: Lege 1 zufälliges Unkraut aus deinem Deck auf deine Bank.

Put a random Basic Pokémon from your dec.en: Put a random Basic Pokémon from your deck into your hand.
Put a random Basic Pokémon from your dec.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將一隻基礎寶可夢置入你的手牌。

Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出 3 個 {R} 能量並將其附加到這只神奇寶貝身上。
Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.es: Toma 3 Energías {R} de tu Zona de Energía y únelas a este Pokémon.
Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.fr: Prenez 3 {R} Énergie de votre Zone d'Énergie et attachez-la à ce Pokémon.
Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.it: Prendi 3 Energie {R} dalla tua Zona Energetica e assegnale a questo Pokémon.
Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.de: Nimm 3 {R}-Energie aus deiner Energiezone und lege sie an dieses Pokémon an.
Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone.pt-br: Pegue 3 {R} Energias da sua Zona de Energia e ligue-as a este Pokémon.

Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched  Pokémon.
Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出一個{L}能量並將其附加到你的1只後備神奇寶貝上。

The color of the poisonous saliva depend.en: The color of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.
The color of the poisonous saliva depend.zh-tw: 有毒唾液的顏色取決於神奇寶貝吃的東西。 Grafaiai 用唾液覆蓋手指，在森林裡的樹木上畫出圖案。

This attack also does 20 damage to each.en: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any Energy attached.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.zh-tw: 此攻擊還會對對手後備戰中每隻帶有能量的神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害。

This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives.en: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.
This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives.zh-tw: 這是小型龍系神奇寶貝。它生活在棟多佐的嘴裡，以保護自己免受外部敵人的侵害。

This Pokémon apparently ties the base of.en: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.
This Pokémon apparently ties the base of.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝顯然將它的脖子根部打成一個結，這樣儲存在腹部的能量就不會從它的喙中逸出。

This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a.en: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.
This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝可以在 65 英尺外捕捉到貝魯扎的氣味，並將自己隱藏在沙子裡。

This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad.en: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.
This Pokémon is a glutton, but it's bad.zh-tw: 該寶可夢雖然貪吃，但不擅長獲取食物。它與龍切合作捕捉獵物。

This Pokémon normally is slow to react,.en: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.
This Pokémon normally is slow to react,.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝通常反應遲緩，但一旦進入戰鬥，就會以閃電般的動作擊倒敵人。

This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lin.en: This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining its cape to camouflage the stem of its flower, creating the illusion that the flower is floating.
This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lin.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝使用斗篷內襯的反光毛皮來偽裝花莖，創造出花朵漂浮的錯覺。

This Pokémon was born inside a treasure.en: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.
This Pokémon was born inside a treasure.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝誕生於大約 1500 年前的寶箱內。它會吸走試圖偷竊寶藏的惡棍的生命力。

This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawni.en: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.
This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawni.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝會攻擊成群的典當者和雙刃者，從他們身上收集金屬，以製造一把大而堅固的錘子。

Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will.en: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.
Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will.zh-tw: 雖然它通常是性情溫和的神奇寶貝，但它會用鋒利的、浸有毒液的門牙咬住任何激怒它的東西，導致它憤怒的對象癱瘓。

When heated by fire energy, its horns ca.en: When heated by fire energy, its horns can get hotter than 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Those gored by them will suffer both wounds and burns.
When heated by fire energy, its horns ca.zh-tw: 當被火能量加熱時，它的角的溫度會超過 1,800 華氏度。被它們刺傷的人會受傷和燒傷。

When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the.en: When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.
When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the.zh-tw: 當群體受到攻擊時，Pawmo 會第一個投入戰鬥，用電擊的戰鬥技術擊敗敵人。

Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost..en: Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost.
Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost..zh-tw: 您的活躍棟多佐沒有撤退成本。

1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen a.en: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

A deity resides in the snowy mountains w.en: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity's incarnation.
A deity resides in the snowy mountains w.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝居住的雪山里棲息著一位神靈。在古代，它被視為神的化身而受到崇拜。

Although it's alien to this world and a.en:
Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently
a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

Sebbene sia estraneo a questo mondo e un pericolo qui, a quanto pare lo è
un organismo comune nel mondo in cui vive normalmente.

Embora seja estranho a este mundo e seja um perigo aqui, aparentemente é
um organismo comum no mundo onde normalmente vive.
Although it's alien to this world and a.zh-tw:
雖然它對這個世界來說是陌生的，並且是這裡的危險，但它顯然是
其正常生活的世界中的常見有機體。

Obwohl es dieser Welt fremd und hier eine Gefahr darstellt, ist es das offenbar
ein gewöhnlicher Organismus auf der Welt, wo er normalerweise lebt.

Bien que ce soit étranger à ce monde et qu'il représente un danger ici, c'est apparemment

Aunque es ajeno a este mundo y un peligro aquí, aparentemente es
un organismo común en el mundo donde vive normalmente.

Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to
ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of

Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing pe.zh-tw:
顯然 Cyclizar 一直在允許人們
自古就騎在它的背上。的描述
這是在一萬年前的壁畫中發現的。

Apparemment, Cyclizar a permis aux gens de
monter sur le dos depuis l'Antiquité. Des représentations de

Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing pe.es:
Aparentemente Cyclizar ha estado permitiendo que la gente
cabalga sobre su lomo desde la antigüedad. Representaciones de
Esto se ha encontrado en murales de 10.000 años de antigüedad.

seit der Antike auf dem Rücken reiten. Darstellungen von
Dies wurde in 10.000 Jahre alten Wandgemälden gefunden.

Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.en:
Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements

Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.zh-tw:

更快。它比雙手更擅長使用藤蔓。

Être exposé au soleil fait ses mouvements
plus rapide. Il utilise la vigne plus habilement que ses mains.
Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.es:

Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.it:

Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.pt-br:

Blazing sunlight has brought out the tru.en:

form and powers of this Pokémon.

Al dislocarse la mandíbula, puede tragar presas más grandes.
que él mismo. Después de una comida, se acurruca y descansa.

di se stesso. Dopo il pasto si rannicchia e riposa.

By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow p.pt-br:

During your opponent's next turn, if thi.de: Wenn dieses Pokémon im nächsten Zug deines Gegners durch einen Angriff beschädigt wird, füge dem angreifenden Pokémon 30 Schadenspunkte zu.

During your opponent's next turn, if thi.es: Durante el próximo turno de tu rival, si este Pokémon es dañado por un ataque, haz 30 puntos de daño al Pokémon atacante.

Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.en:
Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown
away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.
Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.zh-tw:
縱然無助，氣體可吹
微風吹過，它似乎並不在意。
Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.es:

lejos por la más mínima brisa, no parece importarle.
Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.fr:

Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.pt-br:

Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.it:

Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.de:

In battle, it flaps its wings at great s.en:

It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each.en:
It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one

It creates throwing stars out of compres.en:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.
It creates throwing stars out of compres.zh-tw:
它用壓縮水製造出飛濺的星星。

It creates throwing stars out of compres.es:

Estas estrellas pueden dividir el metal en dos.

Quand il les fait tourner et les lance à grande vitesse,

It crushes its foe under its heavy body.en:
It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause
fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

It doesn't like to be taken care of. It'.en:
It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to
bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
It doesn't like to be taken care of. It'.zh-tw:

It has a preference for hot things. When.en:
It has a preference for hot things. When it rains,

It has a preference for hot things. When.zh-tw:
它對熱的東西有偏愛。下雨的時候，
據說蒸汽從它的尾尖噴出。

Tiene preferencia por las cosas calientes. Cuando llueve,
Se dice que sale vapor de la punta de su cola.
It has a preference for hot things. When.fr:

It has a preference for hot things. When.pt-br:

It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds

It is not satisfied unless it eats over.zh-tw:

每天的食物。當牠吃完後，

It is said that happiness will come to t.en:
It is said that happiness will come to those who
see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a

It is said that happiness will come to t.zh-tw:

滿月。

It is said that happiness will come to t.fr:

It is said that happiness will come to t.pt-br:

It likes to lurk in the dark and tap sho.en:
It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders
with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless
shuddering.

Le gusta acechar en la oscuridad y tocar los hombros.

Il aime se cacher dans le noir et taper sur les épaules

Gli piace nascondersi nell'oscurità e toccare le spalle

bolsas en las mejillas. Dispara cargas desde su cola.
