They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate.
The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.
They smack beaks with others of their ki.zh-tw:
它們用喙與同類進行交流。
攻擊的強度和次數可以告訴對方他們的感受。

This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of.en: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.
This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of.zh-tw: 這次攻擊還會對你的 1 只神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害。

This attack also does 20 damage to each.en: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
This attack also does 20 damage to each.zh-tw: 這次攻擊還會對對手的後備神奇寶貝各造成 20 點傷害。

This attack does 40 damage for each time.en: This attack does 40 damage for each time your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during this game.
This attack does 40 damage for each time.zh-tw: 在此遊戲中，您的神奇寶貝每次使用糖果接力時，此攻擊都會造成 40 點傷害。
This attack does 40 damage for each time.fr: Cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts à chaque fois que votre Pokémon a utilisé Sweets Relay pendant cette partie.
This attack does 40 damage for each time.pt-br: Este ataque causa 40 de dano cada vez que seu Pokémon usou Sweets Relay durante o jogo.
This attack does 40 damage for each time.it: Questo attacco infligge 40 danni per ogni volta che i tuoi Pokémon hanno utilizzato Sweets Relay durante questo gioco.
This attack does 40 damage for each time.de: Dieser Angriff fügt 40 Schadenspunkte für jedes Mal zu, wenn Ihr Pokémon in diesem Spiel „Sweet Relay“ verwendet hat.
This attack does 40 damage for each time.es: Este ataque hace 40 daños por cada vez que tu Pokémon usó Sweets Relay durante este juego.

This is its form while it is devouring t.en:
This is its form while it is devouring the light of
Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes
them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
This is its form while it is devouring t.zh-tw:
這是它吞噬光芒時的形態
索爾迦雷歐。它會撲向敵人，然後進行砍擊
它們的四肢和背部都有爪子。
This is its form while it is devouring t.fr:
C'est sa forme alors qu'il dévore la lumière de
Solgaléo. Il se jette sur les ennemis puis les tranche
avec les griffes sur ses quatre membres et son dos.
This is its form while it is devouring t.it:
Questa è la sua forma mentre divora la luce dell'
Solgaleo. Si avventa sui nemici e poi colpisce
loro con gli artigli sui quattro arti e sulla schiena.
This is its form while it is devouring t.pt-br:
Esta é a sua forma enquanto devora a luz do
Solgaleo. Ele ataca os inimigos e depois corta
eles com as garras em seus quatro membros e nas costas.
This is its form while it is devouring t.de:
Dies ist seine Form, während es das Licht verschlingt
Solgaleo. Es stürzt sich auf Feinde und schlägt dann zu
sie mit den Krallen an seinen vier Gliedmaßen und am Rücken.

This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itse.en: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.
This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itse.pt-br: Este Pokémon também causa 70 de dano a si mesmo.
This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itse.it: Questo Pokémon infligge anche 70 danni a se stesso.
This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itse.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝也會對自身造成 70 點傷害。
This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itse.de: Dieses Pokémon fügt sich selbst außerdem 70 Schadenspunkte zu.
This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itse.es: Este Pokémon también se hace 70 puntos de daño a sí mismo.

This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.en:
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers,
Audino can gauge other creatures' feelings and physical conditions.
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.fr:
Ce Pokémon a un bon cœur. En touchant avec ses palpeurs,
Audino peut évaluer les sentiments et les conditions physiques des autres créatures.
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.it:
Questo Pokémon ha un cuore gentile. Toccando con le sue antenne,
Audino può valutare i sentimenti e le condizioni fisiche delle altre creature.
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.pt-br:
Este Pokémon tem um coração bondoso. Ao tocar com seus sensores,
Audino pode avaliar os sentimentos e condições físicas de outras criaturas.
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝有一顆善良的心。通過用觸角觸碰，
奧迪諾可以測量其他生物的感受和身體狀況。
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.de:
Dieses Pokémon hat ein freundliches Herz. Durch das Berühren mit seinen Fühlern,
Audino kann die Gefühle und den körperlichen Zustand anderer Lebewesen einschätzen.
This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touchi.es:
Este Pokémon tiene un corazón bondadoso. Al tocar con sus antenas,
Audino puede medir los sentimientos y las condiciones físicas de otras criaturas.

This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.en:
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouched by
sunlight. When it appears before humans, it hides
itself under a cloth that resembles a Pikachu.
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝生活在未受污染的黑暗地方
陽光。當它出現在人類面前時，它卻隱藏起來
自己被包裹在一塊類似皮卡丘的布下。
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.pt-br:
Este Pokémon vive em locais escuros, intocados por
luz solar. Quando aparece diante dos humanos, esconde
-se sob um pano que lembra um Pikachu.
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.es:
Este Pokémon vive en lugares oscuros que no han sido tocados por
luz del sol. Cuando aparece ante los humanos, se esconde.
debajo de una tela que se asemeja a un Pikachu.
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.it:
Questo Pokémon vive in luoghi oscuri non toccati
luce solare. Quando appare davanti agli umani, si nasconde
sotto un panno che ricorda un Pikachu.
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.fr:
Ce Pokémon vit dans des endroits sombres, épargnés par
la lumière du soleil. Lorsqu'il apparaît devant les humains, il se cache
lui-même sous un tissu qui ressemble à un Pikachu.
This Pokémon lives in dark places untouc.de:
Dieses Pokémon lebt an dunklen, unberührten Orten
Sonnenlicht. Wenn es vor den Menschen erscheint, versteckt es sich
selbst unter einem Tuch, das einem Pikachu ähnelt.

This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.en:
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping
them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.pt-br:
Este Pokémon foge com montes de frutas caídas embrulhando-as
em sua cauda, que tem aproximadamente o dobro do comprimento de seu corpo.
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.fr:
Ce Pokémon s'enfuit avec des tas de baies tombées en les enveloppant
les dans sa queue, qui fait environ deux fois la longueur de son corps.
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.it:
Questo Pokémon scappa con un mucchio di bacche cadute avvolgendole
nella sua coda, che è circa il doppio della lunghezza del suo corpo.
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.de:
Dieses Pokémon macht sich mit haufenweise heruntergefallenen Beeren davon, indem es es einwickelt
sie in seinem Schwanz, der ungefähr doppelt so lang wie sein Körper ist.
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝通過包裹掉落的漿果堆逃跑
它們在它的尾巴上，尾巴的長度大約是它身體的兩倍。
This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fal.es:
Este Pokémon se lleva un montón de bayas caídas envolviéndolas
en su cola, que mide aproximadamente el doble de la longitud de su cuerpo.

This Pokémon normally is slow to react,.en:
This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once
it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies
with lightning-fast movements.
This Pokémon normally is slow to react,.zh-tw:
這種神奇寶貝通常反應遲緩，但一旦
它進入戰鬥，它將擊倒敵人
以閃電般的動作。

This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.en:
This Pokémon punches trees and eats
the berries that drop down, training itself
and getting food at the same time.
This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝會打樹並吃東西
掉落下來的漿果，自我訓練
並同時獲取食物。
This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.es:
Este Pokémon golpea árboles y come
las bayas que caen, entrenándose
y conseguir comida al mismo tiempo.
This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.de:
Dieses Pokémon schlägt Bäume und frisst
die Beeren, die herunterfallen und sich trainieren
und gleichzeitig Essen bekommen.
This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.fr:
Ce Pokémon frappe les arbres et mange
les baies qui tombent, s'entraînent
et obtenir de la nourriture en même temps.
This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.pt-br:
Este Pokémon soca árvores e come
as bagas que caem, treinando-se
e conseguir comida ao mesmo tempo.
This Pokémon punches trees and eats\nthe.it:
Questo Pokémon prende a pugni gli alberi e mangia
le bacche che cadono formandosi
e procurarsi il cibo allo stesso tempo.

This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attac.en: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from {F} Pokémon.
This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attac.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝因 {F} 神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到 -30 點傷害。

This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.en:
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be
chosen as a first partner in its own world.
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.it:
Questa Ultracreatura piace abbastanza da essere
scelto come primo partner nel proprio mondo.
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.fr:
Cette Ultra Beast est assez appréciée pour être
choisi comme premier partenaire dans son propre monde.
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.zh-tw:
這個終極野獸很受歡迎
被選為自己世界中的第一個合作夥伴。
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.de:
Dieses Ultra-Biest ist durchaus beliebt
als erster Partner in seiner eigenen Welt ausgewählt.
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.pt-br:
Esta Ultra Besta é bastante apreciada para ser
escolhido como primeiro parceiro no seu próprio mundo.
This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to.es:
Esta Ultra Bestia es bastante apreciada como para ser
elegido como primer socio en su propio mundo.

This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.en:
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thin
as paper, is like a sharpened sword.
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.de:
Der Körper dieses Ultra-Biests ist genauso dünn
wie Papier, ist wie ein geschärftes Schwert.
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.zh-tw:
這究極異獸的身體，也是如此纖細
如紙，如鋒利的劍。
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.fr:
Le corps de cette Ultra Beast, qui est aussi mince
comme le papier, c'est comme une épée aiguisée.
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.it:
Il corpo di questa Ultracreatura, che è altrettanto magro
come la carta, è come una spada affilata.
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.pt-br:
O corpo desta Ultra Besta, que é tão fino
como papel, é como uma espada afiada.
This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thi.es:
El cuerpo de esta Ultra Bestia, que es tan delgado
como el papel, es como una espada afilada.

Though it may look like it's just a bunc.en:
Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs,
it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates
with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.zh-tw:
雖然看起來只是一堆雞蛋，
這是一隻真正的神奇寶貝。 Exeggcute 溝通
顯然，是通過心靈感應與其他同類進行交流。
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.es:
Aunque parezca que son sólo un montón de huevos,
es un Pokémon apropiado. Exeggcute se comunica
aparentemente con otros de su tipo a través de la telepatía.
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.it:
Anche se può sembrare solo un mucchio di uova,
è un vero Pokémon. Exeggcute comunica
con altri della sua specie tramite telepatia, a quanto pare.
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.de:
Auch wenn es vielleicht so aussieht, als wäre es nur ein Haufen Eier,
Es ist ein richtiges Pokémon. Exeggcute kommuniziert
mit anderen seiner Art offenbar über Telepathie.
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.pt-br:
Embora possa parecer apenas um monte de ovos,
é um Pokémon adequado. Exeggcute se comunica
com outros de sua espécie via telepatia, aparentemente.
Though it may look like it's just a bunc.fr:
Même si on dirait qu'il ne s'agit que d'un tas d'œufs,
c'est un vrai Pokémon. Exeggcute communique
avec d'autres de son espèce par télépathie, apparemment.

Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.en:
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself
comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to
cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.fr:
Incapable de survivre dans les zones chaudes, il se crée
confortable en expirant de l'air suffisamment froid pour
provoquer de la neige. Il s'enfouit dans la neige pour dormir.
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.pt-br:
Incapaz de sobreviver em áreas quentes, torna-se
confortável expirando ar frio o suficiente para
causar neve. Ele se enterra na neve para dormir.
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.it:
Incapace di sopravvivere nelle zone calde, si crea da sola
confortevole espirando aria abbastanza fredda da
causare la neve. Si nasconde nella neve per dormire.
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.zh-tw:
無法在炎熱地區生存，它使自己
通過呼吸足夠冷的空氣來舒適
導致下雪。它鑽進雪裡睡覺。
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.de:
Da es in heißen Gegenden nicht überlebensfähig ist, macht es sich selbst
angenehm, indem Sie Luft ausatmen, die kalt genug ist
Schnee verursachen. Es vergräbt sich im Schnee, um zu schlafen.
Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes.es:
Incapaz de sobrevivir en zonas cálidas, se hace
sentirse cómodo respirando aire lo suficientemente frío como para
provocar nieve. Se esconde en la nieve para dormir.

When it is angered, it immediately disch.en:
When it is angered, it immediately discharges the
energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.
When it is angered, it immediately disch.zh-tw:
當它被激怒時，它會立即釋放
能量儲存在臉頰的眼袋裡。
When it is angered, it immediately disch.fr:
Lorsqu'il est en colère, il décharge immédiatement le
énergie stockée dans les poches de ses joues.
When it is angered, it immediately disch.es:
Cuando se enoja, inmediatamente descarga la
energía almacenada en las bolsas de sus mejillas.
When it is angered, it immediately disch.pt-br:
Quando está irritado, ele imediatamente descarrega o
energia armazenada nas bolsas em suas bochechas.
When it is angered, it immediately disch.it:
Quando è arrabbiato, scarica immediatamente il
energia immagazzinata nelle sacche delle sue guance.
When it is angered, it immediately disch.de:
Wenn es verärgert ist, entlädt es sich sofort
Energie, die in den Beuteln in seinen Wangen gespeichert ist.

When it retracts its long neck into its.en:
When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it
squirts out water with vigorous force.
When it retracts its long neck into its.zh-tw:
當它把長脖子縮進殼裡時
用強力噴出水。
When it retracts its long neck into its.fr:
Lorsqu'il rentre son long cou dans sa coquille, il
projette de l'eau avec une force vigoureuse.
When it retracts its long neck into its.es:
Cuando retrae su largo cuello dentro de su caparazón,
Lanza agua con fuerza vigorosa.
When it retracts its long neck into its.it:
Quando ritrae il lungo collo nel guscio,
schizza acqua con forza vigorosa.
When it retracts its long neck into its.pt-br:
Quando ele retrai o longo pescoço para dentro da concha, ele
esguicha água com força vigorosa.
When it retracts its long neck into its.de:
Wenn es seinen langen Hals in seinen Panzer zurückzieht, ist es
spritzt Wasser mit kräftiger Kraft heraus.

When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.en:
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them
to berries it's decorated with cream.
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.fr:
Quand il fait confiance à un Dresseur, il le traite
aux baies, il est décoré de crème.
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.it:
Quando si fida di un Allenatore, lo tratterà
ai frutti di bosco si decora con panna.
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.pt-br:
Quando confia em um Treinador, ele irá tratá-lo
para frutas vermelhas é decorado com creme.
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.de:
Wenn es einem Trainer vertraut, wird es ihn behandeln
Zu den Beeren wird es mit Sahne dekoriert.
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.zh-tw:
當它信任訓練師時，它會對待他們
漿果則用奶油裝飾。
When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat.es:
Cuando confía en un Entrenador, lo tratará
a las bayas se le adorna con crema.

When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.en:
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously
soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.zh-tw:
當它巨大的眼睛擺動時，它會唱出神秘的歌聲
舒緩的旋律可以讓敵人入睡。
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.es:
Cuando sus enormes ojos vacilan, canta misteriosamente
Melodía relajante que adormece a sus enemigos.
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.fr:
Quand ses yeux immenses vacillent, il chante mystérieusement
mélodie apaisante qui endort ses ennemis.
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.pt-br:
Quando seus enormes olhos vacilam, ele canta misteriosamente
melodia suave que acalma seus inimigos para dormir.
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.de:
Wenn seine großen Augen zittern, singt es geheimnisvoll
beruhigende Melodie, die ihre Feinde in den Schlaf wiegt.
When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mys.it:
Quando i suoi enormi occhi tremano, canta misteriosamente
melodia rilassante che fa addormentare i suoi nemici.

When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, the.en:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave
the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, the.zh-tw:
當 Staravia 進化成 Staraptor 時，他們就離開了
羊群獨自生活。它們有堅固的翅膀。

Whenever you attach a {P} Energy from yo.en: Whenever you attach a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.
Whenever you attach a {P} Energy from yo.zh-tw: 每當你將能量區中的 {P} 能量附加到該神奇寶貝上時，該神奇寶貝就會治療 20 點傷害。

With its flotation sac inflated, it can.en:
With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people
on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.
With its flotation sac inflated, it can.zh-tw:
浮囊充氣後可載人
在它的背上。它在潛水前將囊放氣。

With the long hairs on its back, this Po.en:
With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon
takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon.
It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.de:
Mit den langen Haaren auf dem Rücken, dieses Pokémon
nimmt Strom von anderen elektrischen Pokémon auf.
Es speichert das, was es aufnimmt, in einem elektrischen Beutel.
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.it:
Con i lunghi peli sulla schiena, questo Pokémon
assorbe l'elettricità da altri Pokémon elettrici.
Conserva ciò che assorbe in una sacca elettrica.
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.zh-tw:
背上有長毛的神奇寶貝
從其他電力神奇寶貝身上獲取電力。
它將吸收的東西儲存在電囊中。
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.fr:
Avec ses longs poils sur le dos, ce Pokémon
absorbe l'électricité d'autres Pokémon électriques.
Il stocke ce qu'il absorbe dans un sac électrique.
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.pt-br:
Com longos pelos nas costas, este Pokémon
absorve eletricidade de outros Pokémon elétricos.
Ele armazena o que absorve em um saco elétrico.
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.es:
Con los largos pelos de su espalda, este Pokémon
Toma electricidad de otros Pokémon eléctricos.
Almacena lo que absorbe en un saco eléctrico.

Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.en: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws 3 cards.
Your opponent shuffles their hand into t.zh-tw: 你的對手將手牌洗入牌庫並抓 3 張牌。

After a piece of seaweed merged with deb.en: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.
After a piece of seaweed merged with deb.zh-tw: 一片海藻與沈船殘骸融合後，它重生為這只幽靈神奇寶貝。

As often as you like during your turn, y.en: As often as you like during your turn, you may move a {W} Energy from 1 of your Benched {W} Pokémon to your Active {W} Pokémon.
As often as you like during your turn, y.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以多次將 {W} 能量從你的 1 個後備 {W} 神奇寶貝轉移到你的活躍 {W} 神奇寶貝上。
As often as you like during your turn, y.fr: Aussi souvent que vous le souhaitez pendant votre tour, vous pouvez déplacer une Énergie {W} de l'un de vos Pokémon {W} de Banc vers votre Pokémon Actif {W}.
As often as you like during your turn, y.es: Tan seguido como quieras durante tu turno, puedes mover una Energía {W} de 1 de tus Pokémon {W} en Banca a tu Pokémon {W} Activo.
As often as you like during your turn, y.de: So oft du möchtest, kannst du während deines Zuges eine {W}-Energie von einem deiner {W}-Pokémon auf deiner Bank auf dein aktives {W}-Pokémon verschieben.
As often as you like during your turn, y.pt-br: Quantas vezes quiser durante o seu turno, você pode mover uma Energia {W} de 1 dos seus Pokémon {W} no Banco para os seus Pokémon {W} Ativos.
As often as you like during your turn, y.it: Tutte le volte che vuoi durante il tuo turno, puoi spostare un'Energia {W} da 1 dei tuoi Pokémon {W} in panchina al tuo Pokémon {W} attivo.

Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.en: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.
Being exposed to sunlight makes its move.zh-tw: 暴露在陽光下使它的動作更快。它比雙手更擅長使用藤蔓。

By taking in a person's scent, it can sn.en: By taking in a person's scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It's hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.
By taking in a person's scent, it can sn.zh-tw: 通過吸收一個人的氣味，它可以嗅出他的精神和身體狀況。希望這項技能能有許多醫學應用。

Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.en: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.zh-tw: 選擇對手的1只活躍神奇寶貝的攻擊並將其用作這次攻擊。
Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.it: Scegli 1 degli attacchi del Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario e usalo come questo attacco.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.fr: Choisissez 1 des attaques du Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire et utilisez-la comme cette attaque.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.es: Elige 1 de los ataques del Pokémon Activo de tu rival y úsalo como este ataque.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.pt-br: Escolha 1 dos ataques do Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente e use-o como este ataque.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokém.de: Wähle 1 Angriff des Aktiven Pokémon deines Gegners und verwende ihn als diesen Angriff.

Don't be fooled by its gorgeous fur and.en: Don't be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.
Don't be fooled by its gorgeous fur and.zh-tw: 不要被它華麗的皮毛和優雅的身材所迷惑。這是一隻喜怒無常且兇​​惡的神奇寶貝。

Druddigon lives in caves, but it never s.en: Druddigon lives in caves, but it never skips sunbathing—it won't be able to move if its body gets too cold.
Druddigon lives in caves, but it never s.zh-tw: 德魯迪貢生活在洞穴裡，但它從不跳過日光浴——如果它的身體太冷，它就無法移動。

During this turn, the Retreat Cost of yo.en: During this turn, the Retreat Cost of your Active Pokémon is 2 less.
During this turn, the Retreat Cost of yo.zh-tw: 在這個回合中，你的活躍寶可夢的撤退費用減少 2 點。

During this turn, the Retreat Cost of yo.de: Während dieser Runde sind die Rückzugskosten deines aktiven Pokémon um 2 geringer.

During your opponent's next turn, all of.en: During your opponent's next turn, all of your Pokémon take −10 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, all of.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，您所有的神奇寶貝因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而受到−10點傷害。

Each {G} Energy attached to your {G} Pok.it: Ogni Energia {G} assegnata ai tuoi Pokémon {G} fornisce 2 Energia {G}. Questo effetto non è cumulabile.

Flip a coin for each Energy attached to.en: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin for each Energy attached to.zh-tw: 為該神奇寶貝所附加的每個能量拋一枚硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 50 點傷害。

Flip a coin for each Energy attached to.fr: Lancez une pièce pour chaque Énergie attachée à ce Pokémon. Cette attaque inflige 50 dégâts pour chaque tête.
Flip a coin for each Energy attached to.de: Wirf eine Münze für jede an dieses Pokémon angelegte Energie. Dieser Angriff verursacht 50 Schaden pro Kopf.

Flip a coin for each Energy attached to.it: Lancia una moneta per ogni Energia assegnata a questo Pokémon. Questo attacco infligge 50 danni per ogni testa.

Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.en: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin until you get tails. This at.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣，直到出現反面。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 20 點傷害。

If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.en: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.
If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.zh-tw: 如果你的任何一隻神奇寶貝在對手的最後回合中因攻擊而被擊倒，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。
If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.es: Si alguno de tus Pokémon quedó fuera de combate por el daño de un ataque durante el último turno de tu rival, este ataque hace 60 puntos de daño más.
If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.de: Wenn eines deiner Pokémon im letzten Zug deines Gegners durch Schaden durch einen Angriff kampfunfähig gemacht wurde, fügt dieser Angriff 60 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.
If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.fr: Si l'un de vos Pokémon a été mis KO par les dégâts d'une attaque lors du dernier tour de votre adversaire, cette attaque inflige 60 dégâts supplémentaires.
If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.it: Se uno qualsiasi dei tuoi Pokémon è stato messo KO dai danni di un attacco durante l'ultimo turno del tuo avversario, questo attacco infligge 60 danni in più.
If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out.pt-br: Se algum dos seus Pokémon foi nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque durante o último turno do seu oponente, esse ataque causará 60 de dano a mais.

If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {G}.en: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {G} Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.
If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra {G}.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝附加了至少 3 個額外的 {G} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 70 點。

If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strang.en: If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery will appear on the screen. That scenery is said to be from its home.
If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strang.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝站在電視附近，屏幕上就會出現奇怪的風景。據說那風景是來自它的家鄉。

If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is a P.en: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is a Pokémon {ex}, this attack does 80 more damage.
If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is a P.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍神奇寶貝是神奇寶貝 {ex}，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 80 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poi.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢中毒，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 40 點。

It eats its own weight in sugar every da.en: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn't get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
It eats its own weight in sugar every da.zh-tw: 它每天吃掉與自身重量相同的糖。如果它沒有得到足夠的糖，它就會變得非常暴躁。

It launches electrified fur from its abd.en: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.
It launches electrified fur from its abd.zh-tw: 它從腹部發射帶電的毛皮作為攻擊手段。被毛皮擊中的對手可能會陷入三天三夜的癱瘓狀態。

It moves along the ground as if sliding..en: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
It moves along the ground as if sliding..zh-tw: 它沿著地面移動，就像滑動一樣。它敏捷的動作迷惑了敵人，然後用藤鞭攻擊。

It only gives its all against strong opp.en: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior's noble eyes.
It only gives its all against strong opp.zh-tw: 它只會在面對強大的對手時全力以赴，而這些對手不會被蛇皮里奧高貴的目光所困擾。

It slips into the shadows of others and.en: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.
It slips into the shadows of others and.zh-tw: 它會潛入他人的陰影中並模仿他們的力量和動作。隨著它的改進，它會變得比它模仿的產品更強大。

It steals things from people just to amu.en: It steals things from people just to amuse itself with their frustration. A rivalry exists between this Pokémon and Nickit.
It steals things from people just to amu.zh-tw: 它從人們那裡偷東西只是為了取樂他們的挫敗感。該神奇寶貝和尼基特之間存在競爭。

It's small and its electricity-generatin.en: It's small and its electricity-generating organ is not fully developed, so it uses its tail to absorb electricity from people's homes and charge itself.
It's small and its electricity-generatin.zh-tw: 它體型小，發電器官還沒有發育完全，所以它用尾巴從人們家中吸取電力，給自己充電。

It's so strong that it can knock out som.en: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.
It's so strong that it can knock out som.zh-tw: 它是如此強大，以至於它可以一擊擊倒一些對手，但它也可能會在戰鬥中忘記自己正在戰鬥的是什麼。

Its burning body causes it to be unpopul.en: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.
Its burning body causes it to be unpopul.zh-tw: 它燃燒的身體使其在世界炎熱的地區不受歡迎，但在寒冷的地區，沃爾卡羅納被尊為太陽的化身。

Its flickering spores lure in prey and p.en: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
Its flickering spores lure in prey and p.zh-tw: 它閃爍的孢子引誘獵物並使它們入睡。一旦這只神奇寶貝讓獵物打瞌睡，它就會用指尖吸取獵物的活力。

Its large front tooth is still growing i.en: Its large front tooth is still growing in. When the tooth itches, this Pokémon will bite another Chewtle's horn, and the two Pokémon will tussle.
Its large front tooth is still growing i.zh-tw: 它的大門牙仍在長出。當牙齒發癢時，這只神奇寶貝會咬住另一隻咀嚼的角，兩隻神奇寶貝就會打鬥。

Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a bo.en: Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a boulder in a single bite. This Pokémon has an extremely vicious disposition.
Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a bo.zh-tw: 它巨大的鋸齒狀牙齒一口就能咬碎一塊巨石。該寶可夢的性情極其惡毒。

Joltik can be found clinging to other Po.en: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It's soaking up static electricity because it can't produce a charge on its own.
Joltik can be found clinging to other Po.zh-tw: 喬提克被發現粘在其他神奇寶貝身上。它會吸收靜電，因為它本身無法產生電荷。

Look at the top card of your deck. If th.en: Look at the top card of your deck. If that card is a {P} Pokémon, put it into your hand. If it is not a {P} Pokémon, put it on the bottom of your deck.
Look at the top card of your deck. If th.zh-tw: 查看你牌組頂牌。如果那張卡是{P}神奇寶貝，將其加入你的手牌。如果它不是{P}神奇寶貝，請將其放在你的牌組底部。

Pokémon living in the forest eat the del.en: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull's head. The caps regrow overnight.
Pokémon living in the forest eat the del.zh-tw: 生活在森林裡的神奇寶貝會吃莫雷魯爾頭上美味的帽子。帽子在一夜之間重新生長。

Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fl.en: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians' emissaries.
Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fl.zh-tw: 精神力量使這些神奇寶貝能夠飛行。有人說他們是一座古城的守護者。其他人則說他們是監護人的使者。

Put 1 random Koffing from your deck onto.en: Put 1 random Koffing from your deck onto your Bench.
Put 1 random Koffing from your deck onto.zh-tw: 從你的牌組中隨機將 1 只 Koffing 放到你的替補席上。

Put a Basic Pokémon from your opponent's.en: Put a Basic Pokémon from your opponent's discard pile onto their Bench.
Put a Basic Pokémon from your opponent's.zh-tw: 將對手棄牌堆中的一隻基本寶可夢放到他們的替補席上。

Put your Mew ex in the Active Spot into.en: Put your Mew ex in the Active Spot into your hand.
Put your Mew ex in the Active Spot into.zh-tw: 將活躍點中的 Mew ex 放入你的手牌中。

Scolipede latches on to its prey with th.en: Scolipede latches on to its prey with the claws on its neck before slamming them into the ground and jabbing them with its claws' toxic spikes.
Scolipede latches on to its prey with th.zh-tw: 蜈蚣用脖子上的爪子抓住獵物，然後將它們猛烈地摔到地上，並用爪子上的有毒尖刺刺痛它們。

The elemental composition of the rocks t.en: The elemental composition of the rocks that form its body were found to match the bedrock of a land far away from this Pokémon's habitat.
The elemental composition of the rocks t.zh-tw: 形成其身體的岩石的元素成分被發現與遠離該神奇寶貝棲息地的土地的基岩相匹配。

This Pokémon can draw forth the power hi.en: This Pokémon can draw forth the power hidden within blooming wild flowers. It is particularly fond of red flowers.

This Pokémon creates an impressive flowe.en: This Pokémon creates an impressive flower garden in its territory. It draws forth the power of the red flowers around its neck.

This Pokémon draws forth what power is l.en: This Pokémon draws forth what power is left in withered flowers to make them healthy again. It holds a red flower.

This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and ch.en: This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.

This Pokémon was called the Larva That S.en: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.

Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar spec.en: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.
Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar spec.zh-tw: 斑足蟲和西足足蟲是相似的物種，但當兩者相遇時，就會發生一場激烈的戰鬥。

Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dub.en: Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dubwool mysteriously disappears.
Whenever a Beheeyem visits a farm, a Dub.zh-tw: 每當巨獸造訪農場時，杜布羊毛就會神秘消失。

Your opponent can't play any Pokémon fro.en: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from their hand to evolve their Active Pokémon.
Your opponent can't play any Pokémon fro.zh-tw: 你的對手不能使用手中的任何神奇寶貝來進化他們的活躍神奇寶貝。

Your opponent can't play any Pokémon fro.pt-br: Seu oponente não pode jogar nenhum Pokémon da mão dele para evoluir seu Pokémon Ativo.

A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely see.en:
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will
run and hide the moment it senses people.

Un Pokémon Fée timide que l'on voit rarement, il le fera

Un Pokémon hada tímido que rara vez se ve.
corre y se esconde en el momento en que detecta gente.

After clamping down with its powerful jaws, it
twists its body around to rip its prey in half.

Gira su cuerpo para partir a su presa por la mitad.

thick iron sheets. Derriba a sus oponentes por

As soon as it catches the scent of prey,.en:

If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached.en: If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move 2 {L} Energy from that Pokémon and attach 1 Energy each to 2 of your Benched Pokémon.

If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached.es: Si el Pokémon {L} al que está unida esta carta está en el Punto Activo y queda Fuera de Combate por el daño de un ataque del Pokémon de tu rival, mueve 2 Energías {L} de ese Pokémon y une 1 Energía cada uno a 2 de tus Pokémon en Banca.
If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached.it: Se il Pokémon {L} a cui è assegnata questa carta è in posizione attiva e viene messo KO dai danni di un attacco dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, sposta 2 Energia {L} da quel Pokémon e assegna 1 Energia ciascuno a 2 dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina.
If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached.zh-tw: 這張卡所附著的 {L} 只寶可夢位於活躍位置，並且因對方寶可夢的攻擊而被擊倒的場合，移動該寶可夢 2 點 {L} 能量，並為你後備的 2 只寶可夢各附加 1 點能量。
If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached.pt-br: Se o Pokémon {L} ao qual este card está ligado estiver no Ponto Ativo e for Nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque dos Pokémon do seu oponente, mova 2 {L} Energias desse Pokémon e ligue 1 Energia cada a 2 dos seus Pokémon no Banco.
If the {L} Pokémon this card is attached.de: Wenn sich das {L}-Pokémon, an das diese Karte angelegt ist, an der aktiven Stelle befindet und durch Schaden durch einen Angriff des Pokémon deines Gegners kampfunfähig gemacht wird, bewege 2 {L}-Energie von diesem Pokémon und lege jeweils 1 Energie an 2 deiner Pokémon auf deiner Bank an.

para construir la armadura de acero que protege su cuerpo.

per costruire l'armatura d'acciaio che protegge il suo corpo.

Tira de la enredadera sobre su cabeza para mejorar su enfoque.

It submerges itself in sand and moves as.en:
It submerges itself in sand and moves as if
swimming. This wise behavior keeps its enemies
from finding it and maintains its temperature.
It submerges itself in sand and moves as.es:
Se sumerge en la arena y se mueve como si
nadando. Este sabio comportamiento mantiene a sus enemigos
de encontrarlo y mantiene su temperatura.
It submerges itself in sand and moves as.fr:
Il s'immerge dans le sable et se déplace comme s'il
nager. Ce comportement sage garde ses ennemis
de le trouver et maintient sa température.
It submerges itself in sand and moves as.pt-br:

natação. Este comportamento sábio mantém seus inimigos
de encontrá-lo e mantém sua temperatura.

It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.en:
It won't attack while it's alone—not even if it
spots prey. Instead, it waits for other Carvanha to
join it, and then the Pokémon attack as a group.
It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.es:
No atacará mientras esté solo, ni siquiera si
detecta presas. En cambio, espera a que otros Carvanha
únete a él y luego los Pokémon atacan como grupo.
It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.fr:
Il n'attaquera pas tant qu'il est seul, même s'il
repère des proies. Au lieu de cela, il attend que d'autres Carvanha
rejoignez-le, puis les Pokémon attaquent en groupe.
It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.it:
Non attaccherà mentre è da solo, nemmeno se lo fosse

It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.zh-tw:

It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.pt-br:
Ele não atacará enquanto estiver sozinho – nem mesmo se

junte-se a ele e então os Pokémon atacam como um grupo.
It won't attack while it's alone—not eve.de:
Es greift nicht an, solange es alleine ist – nicht einmal wenn es so ist
entdeckt Beute. Stattdessen wartet es darauf, dass andere Carvanha es tun
Schließen Sie sich ihm an und dann greifen die Pokémon als Gruppe an.

It's accustomed to luxury because it\nus.en:
It's accustomed to luxury because it
used to live with Alolan royalty. As a
result, it's very picky about food.
It's accustomed to luxury because it\nus.es:
Está acostumbrado al lujo porque
Solía vivir con la realeza de Alola. como un
Como resultado, es muy exigente con la comida.

It's accustomed to luxury because it\nus.de:

It's accustomed to luxury because it\nus.pt-br:

costumava viver com a realeza de Alola. Como um

Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to
sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing,
it drains their vitality with its fingertips.
Its flickering spores lure in prey and p.fr:
Ses spores vacillantes attirent les proies et les mettent en danger.
dormir. Une fois que ce Pokémon a fait dormir sa proie,
il draine leur vitalité du bout des doigts.

Sus esporas parpadeantes atraen a sus presas y las ponen en peligro.
dormir. Una vez que este Pokémon tenga a su presa dormitando,
les drena la vitalidad con las yemas de los dedos.

Its flickering spores lure in prey and p.zh-tw:
它閃爍的孢子引誘獵物並將其置於死地

Once during your turn, you may put a ran.en: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.
Once during your turn, you may put a ran.es: Una vez durante tu turno, puedes poner un Pokémon aleatorio de tu mazo en tu mano.
Once during your turn, you may put a ran.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, vous pouvez mettre un Pokémon aléatoire de votre deck dans votre main.
Once during your turn, you may put a ran.de: Einmal während deines Zuges darfst du ein zufälliges Pokémon aus deinem Deck auf deine Hand nehmen.
Once during your turn, you may put a ran.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以從你的牌組中隨機將一隻神奇寶貝放入你的手牌。
Once during your turn, you may put a ran.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, você pode colocar um Pokémon aleatório do seu baralho na sua mão.
Once during your turn, you may put a ran.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, puoi mettere nella tua mano un Pokémon casuale dal tuo mazzo.

Once during your turn, you may switch yo.de: Einmal während deines Zuges darfst du dein aktives Ultrabestie gegen eines deiner Ultrabestien auf der Bank austauschen.
Once during your turn, you may switch yo.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以將你的活躍究極異獸與你的1只後備究極異獸交換。

Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.en:
Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show
its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is
dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.
Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.es:
Una vez que te acepta como amigo, intenta mostrarte
su cariño con un abrazo. Dejarlo hacer eso es
peligroso: fácilmente podría destrozarle los huesos.
Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.fr:
Une fois qu'il vous accepte comme ami, il essaie de vous montrer
son affection avec un câlin. Le laisser faire, c'est
dangereux – cela pourrait facilement briser vos os.
Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.zh-tw:
一旦它接受你為朋友，它就會試圖表現出
它的愛是一個擁抱。讓它這樣做就是
危險——它很容易打碎你的骨頭。
Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.it:
Una volta che ti accetta come amico, cerca di mostrarlo

Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.de:

Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.pt-br:
Depois de aceitar você como amigo, ele tenta mostrar
seu carinho com um abraço. Deixar fazer isso é
perigoso - pode facilmente quebrar seus ossos.

People fear it due to a belief that it devours any
who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the

La gente le teme porque cree que devora cualquier
que intentan talar árboles en su bosque, pero a la

Les gens le craignent parce qu’ils croient qu’il dévore tout

他們試圖砍伐森林中的樹木，但

As pessoas o temem devido à crença de que devora qualquer

People fear it due to a belief that it d.de:
Die Menschen haben Angst davor, weil sie glauben, dass es jeden verschlingt
die versuchen, Bäume in ihrem Wald zu fällen, aber zum
Das Pokémon, mit dem es seinen Wald teilt, ist nett.
People fear it due to a belief that it d.it:
Le persone lo temono perché credono che divori qualsiasi cosa
che cercano di abbattere gli alberi nella sua foresta, ma al
Pokémon con cui condivide i boschi, è gentile.

Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).en: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be healed.
Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).es: Los Pokémon (tanto tuyos como de tu oponente) no se pueden curar.
Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).pt-br: Pokémon (seus e do seu oponente) não podem ser curados.
Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).zh-tw: 神奇寶貝（你的和你對手的）無法被治愈。
Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).fr: Les Pokémon (le vôtre et celui de votre adversaire) ne peuvent pas être soignés.
Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).it: I Pokémon (sia i tuoi che quelli del tuo avversario) non possono essere curati.
Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).de: Pokémon (sowohl deine als auch die deines Gegners) können nicht geheilt werden.

Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.en:
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes can see
even in the dead of night. They live in groups of
a few individuals.
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.es:
Protegidos por finas membranas, sus ojos pueden ver.
incluso en plena noche. Viven en grupos de
algunos individuos.
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.fr:
Protégés par de fines membranes, leurs yeux peuvent voir
même en pleine nuit. Ils vivent en groupes de
quelques individus.
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.it:
Protetti da sottili membrane, i loro occhi possono vedere
anche nel cuore della notte. Vivono in gruppi di
alcuni individui.
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.zh-tw:
它們的眼睛受到薄膜的保護，可以看到東西
即使是在夜深人靜的時候。他們成群結隊地生活
幾個人。
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.pt-br:
Protegidos por membranas finas, seus olhos podem ver
mesmo na calada da noite. Eles vivem em grupos de
alguns indivíduos.
Protected by thin membranes, their eyes.de:
Geschützt durch dünne Membranen können ihre Augen sehen
sogar mitten in der Nacht. Sie leben in Gruppen von
ein paar Einzelpersonen.

Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from.en: Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from your deck into your hand.
Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from.fr: Mettez 1 Type aléatoire : Null ou Silvallly depuis votre deck dans votre main.
Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from.es: Pon 1 tipo aleatorio: Nulo o Silvally de tu mazo en tu mano.

Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from.it: Metti 1 Tipo casuale: Null o Silvally dal tuo mazzo nella tua mano.

Strong electricity courses through the t.en:
Strong electricity courses through the tips of
its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting
in foes.
Strong electricity courses through the t.es:
Fuertes cursos de electricidad a través de las puntas de
sus afiladas garras. Un ligero rasguño provoca desmayos.
en enemigos.
Strong electricity courses through the t.fr:
Des cours d'électricité forte à travers les astuces de
ses griffes acérées. Une légère égratignure provoque un évanouissement
chez les ennemis.
Strong electricity courses through the t.pt-br:
Fortes cursos de eletricidade através das dicas de
suas garras afiadas. Um leve arranhão causa desmaio
em inimigos.
Strong electricity courses through the t.it:
Forti corsi di elettricità attraverso le punte di
i suoi artigli affilati. Un leggero graffio provoca svenimento
nei nemici.
Strong electricity courses through the t.zh-tw:
強電課程通過技巧
它鋒利的爪子。輕微的抓傷會導致昏厥
在敵人中。
Strong electricity courses through the t.de:
Starke Stromverläufe durch die Spitzen von
seine scharfen Krallen. Ein leichter Kratzer verursacht Ohnmacht
bei Feinden.

Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.en: Switch out your opponent's Active Basic Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)
Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.es: Cambia el Pokémon Activo Básico de tu rival a la Banca. (Tu oponente elige el nuevo Pokémon Activo).
Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.fr: Remplacez le Pokémon Actif de Base de votre adversaire par le Banc. (Votre adversaire choisit le nouveau Pokémon Actif.)
Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.pt-br: Troque os Pokémon Básicos Ativos do seu oponente para o Banco. (Seu oponente escolhe o novo Pokémon Ativo.)
Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.it: Metti in panchina il Pokémon Base attivo del tuo avversario. (Il tuo avversario sceglie il nuovo Pokémon attivo.)
Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.de: Tauschen Sie das aktive Basis-Pokémon Ihres Gegners auf die Bank aus. (Dein Gegner wählt das neue Aktive Pokémon.)
Switch out your opponent's Active Basic.zh-tw: 將對手的活躍基礎寶可夢移至替補席。 （你的對手選擇新的活躍神奇寶貝。）

The claws on its feet are well developed.en:
The claws on its feet are well developed.
It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute
to its nest over 60 miles away.
The claws on its feet are well developed.fr:
Les griffes de ses pattes sont bien développées.
Il peut transporter des proies comme un Exeggcute
à son nid à plus de 60 miles de distance.
The claws on its feet are well developed.es:
Las garras de sus patas están bien desarrolladas.
Puede transportar presas como un Exeggcute.
a su nido a más de 60 millas de distancia.
The claws on its feet are well developed.pt-br:
As garras dos pés são bem desenvolvidas.
Pode carregar presas como um Exeggcute
ao seu ninho a mais de 60 milhas de distância.
The claws on its feet are well developed.zh-tw:
它腳上的爪子很發達。
它可以攜帶獵物，例如Exeggcute
到60多英里外的巢穴。
The claws on its feet are well developed.it:
Gli artigli sui piedi sono ben sviluppati.
Può trasportare prede come un Exeggcute
al suo nido a oltre 60 miglia di distanza.
The claws on its feet are well developed.de:
Die Krallen an den Füßen sind gut entwickelt.
Es kann Beute wie einen Exeggcute tragen
zu seinem über 60 Meilen entfernten Nest.

The extension and contraction of its mus.en:
The extension and contraction of its muscles
generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
The extension and contraction of its mus.it:
L'estensione e la contrazione dei suoi muscoli
genera elettricità. Si illumina quando è nei guai.
The extension and contraction of its mus.fr:
L'extension et la contraction de ses muscles
produit de l’électricité. Il brille en cas de problème.
The extension and contraction of its mus.es:
La extensión y contracción de sus músculos.
genera electricidad. Brilla cuando está en problemas.
The extension and contraction of its mus.zh-tw:
肌肉的伸展和收縮
發電。當遇到困難時它會發光。
The extension and contraction of its mus.de:
Die Dehnung und Kontraktion seiner Muskeln
erzeugt Strom. Es leuchtet, wenn es in Schwierigkeiten ist.
The extension and contraction of its mus.pt-br:
A extensão e contração de seus músculos
gera eletricidade. Ele brilha quando está em apuros.

The fragrance of the garland on its head.en:
The fragrance of the garland on its head has
a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very
difficult.
The fragrance of the garland on its head.fr:
Le parfum de la guirlande sur sa tête a
un effet relaxant, mais en prendre soin est très
difficile.
The fragrance of the garland on its head.es:
La fragancia de la guirnalda sobre su cabeza ha
un efecto relajante, pero cuidarlo es muy
difícil.
The fragrance of the garland on its head.zh-tw:
它頭上的花環有香味
有放鬆的效果，但是照顧它很重要
困難。
The fragrance of the garland on its head.it:
Ha il profumo della ghirlanda sul capo
un effetto rilassante, ma prendersene cura è molto
difficile.
The fragrance of the garland on its head.de:
Der Duft der Girlande auf seinem Kopf hat
eine entspannende Wirkung, aber es ist sehr wichtig, sich darum zu kümmern
schwierig.
The fragrance of the garland on its head.pt-br:
A fragrância da guirlanda em sua cabeça tem
um efeito relaxante, mas cuidar dele é muito
difícil.

The leaves on its head grow right back e.en:
The leaves on its head grow right back even if
they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those
who eat them.
The leaves on its head grow right back e.fr:
Les feuilles sur sa tête repoussent même si
ils tombent. Ces feuilles amères rafraîchissent ceux
qui les mange.
The leaves on its head grow right back e.es:
Las hojas de su cabeza vuelven a crecer incluso si
se caen. Estas hojas amargas refrescan aquellos
quienes los comen.
The leaves on its head grow right back e.de:
Die Blätter auf seinem Kopf wachsen gleich wieder nach, auch wenn
sie fallen heraus. Diese bitteren Blätter erfrischen diese
wer sie isst.
The leaves on its head grow right back e.it:
Le foglie sulla sua testa ricrescono anche se
cadono. Queste foglie amare li rinfrescano
che li mangiano.
The leaves on its head grow right back e.zh-tw:
即使它頭上的葉子馬上又長出來
他們會掉下來。這些苦澀的葉子使那些
誰吃它們。
The leaves on its head grow right back e.pt-br:
As folhas em sua cabeça voltam a crescer, mesmo que
eles caem. Estas folhas amargas refrescam aqueles
quem os come.

The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.en:
The round face of Alolan Persian is considered
to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region,
so these Pokémon are very well cared for.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.es:
La cara redonda del persa de Alola se considera
ser un símbolo de prosperidad en la región de Alola,
por lo que estos Pokémon están muy bien cuidados.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.fr:
Le visage rond d'Alolan Persan est considéré
être un symbole de prospérité dans la région d'Alola,
donc ces Pokémon sont très bien soignés.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.de:
Das runde Gesicht des Alola-Perser wird berücksichtigt
ein Symbol des Wohlstands in der Alola-Region zu sein,
Daher sind diese Pokémon sehr gut aufgehoben.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.pt-br:
A face redonda do Alolan Persian é considerada
ser um símbolo de prosperidade na região de Alola,
então esses Pokémon são muito bem cuidados.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.it:
Viene considerata la faccia rotonda del persiano di Alola
essere un simbolo di prosperità nella regione di Alola,
quindi questi Pokémon sono molto ben curati.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.zh-tw:
阿羅拉波斯人的圓臉被認為是
成為阿羅拉地區繁榮的象徵，
所以這些神奇寶貝都得到了很好的照顧。

The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.en:
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller Pokémon
into its sandy body. Once its victims are trapped,
it drains them of their vitality whenever it pleases.
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.fr:
Le terrifiant Palossand entraîne des Pokémon plus petits
dans son corps sableux. Une fois ses victimes piégées,
cela les vide de leur vitalité quand bon lui semble.
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.es:
El aterrador Palossand arrastra Pokémon más pequeños
en su cuerpo arenoso. Una vez que sus víctimas quedan atrapadas,
les quita su vitalidad cuando le place.
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.it:
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller Pokémon
nel suo corpo sabbioso. Once its victims are trapped,
li prosciuga della loro vitalità ogni volta che vuole.
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.zh-tw:
可怕的帕羅沙拖曳著較小的神奇寶貝
進入它的沙質身體。一旦受害者被困，
它隨時都會耗盡他們的活力。
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.de:
Der furchteinflößende Palossand schleppt kleinere Pokémon mit sich
in seinen sandigen Körper. Sobald seine Opfer gefangen sind,
es entzieht ihnen ihre Vitalität, wann immer es ihnen gefällt.
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.pt-br:
O aterrorizante Palossand arrasta Pokémon menores
em seu corpo arenoso. Uma vez que suas vítimas estão presas,
isso drena sua vitalidade sempre que lhe agrada.

These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.en:
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans.
Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up
to people in about three days.
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.fr:
Ces Pokémon semblent aimer vivre avec les humains.
Même un Stoutland pris dans la nature se réchauffera
aux gens en trois jours environ.
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.es:
Estos Pokémon parecen disfrutar de vivir con humanos.
Incluso un Stoutland atrapado en la naturaleza se calentará
a la gente en unos tres días.
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.it:
Sembra che a questi Pokémon piaccia vivere con gli umani.
Anche uno Stoutland catturato in natura si riscalderà
alle persone in circa tre giorni.
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.zh-tw:
這些神奇寶貝似乎很喜歡與人類一起生活。
即使是在野外捕獲的斯托特蘭也會變暖
大約三天后傳給人們。
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.de:
Diese Pokémon scheinen das Zusammenleben mit Menschen zu genießen.
Sogar ein in der Wildnis gefangenes Stoutland wird warm
an die Menschen in etwa drei Tagen.
These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with.pt-br:
Esses Pokémon parecem gostar de viver com humanos.
Até um Stoutland capturado na natureza vai se aquecer
para as pessoas em cerca de três dias.

This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.en: This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.fr: Cette attaque inflige 70 dégâts à 1 des Pokémon de votre adversaire.
This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.es: Este ataque hace 70 puntos de daño a 1 de los Pokémon de tu rival.
This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.de: Dieser Angriff fügt 1 Pokémon deines Gegners 70 Schadenspunkte zu.
This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.zh-tw: 這次攻擊對對手的 1 只神奇寶貝造成 70 點傷害。
This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.pt-br: Este ataque causa 70 pontos de dano a 1 dos Pokémon do seu oponente.
This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your.it: Questo attacco infligge 70 danni a 1 dei Pokémon del tuo avversario.

This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.en:
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times.
Apparently even modern technology is incapable
of producing a perfectly restored specimen.
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.fr:
C'est un Pokémon féroce des temps anciens.
Apparemment, même la technologie moderne est incapable
de produire un exemplaire parfaitement restauré.
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.es:
Este es un Pokémon feroz de la antigüedad.
Al parecer, ni siquiera la tecnología moderna es capaz
de producir un ejemplar perfectamente restaurado.
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.de:
Dies ist ein wildes Pokémon aus der Antike.
Offenbar ist selbst die moderne Technologie dazu nicht in der Lage
ein perfekt restauriertes Exemplar herzustellen.
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.zh-tw:
這是自古以來兇猛的寶可夢。
顯然現代科技也無能為力
製作完美修復的標本。
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.pt-br:
Este é um Pokémon feroz dos tempos antigos.
Aparentemente, mesmo a tecnologia moderna é incapaz
de produzir um espécime perfeitamente restaurado.
This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient.it:
Questo è un Pokémon feroce dei tempi antichi.
Apparentemente anche la tecnologia moderna è incapace
di produrre un esemplare perfettamente restaurato.

This is its form once it has awakened an.en:
This is its form once it has awakened and
evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is
greatly increased.
This is its form once it has awakened an.es:
Esta es su forma una vez que ha despertado y
evolucionado. Liberado de su pesada máscara, su velocidad es
aumentó mucho.
This is its form once it has awakened an.fr:
C'est sa forme une fois qu'il s'est réveillé et
évolué. Libérée de son lourd masque, sa vitesse est
fortement augmenté.
This is its form once it has awakened an.it:
Questa è la sua forma una volta che si è risvegliato e
evoluto. Liberata dalla sua pesante maschera, la sua velocità è
notevolmente aumentato.
This is its form once it has awakened an.de:
Dies ist seine Form, sobald es erwacht ist und
weiterentwickelt. Von seiner schweren Maske befreit, ist seine Geschwindigkeit
stark erhöht.
This is its form once it has awakened an.zh-tw:
這是它覺醒後的形態
進化了。擺脫了沉重的面具，它的速度是
大大增加。
This is its form once it has awakened an.pt-br:
Esta é a sua forma, uma vez que ele despertou e
evoluiu. Livre de sua máscara pesada, sua velocidade é
aumentou muito.

This mysterious Pokémon started life as.en:
This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient
clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
This mysterious Pokémon started life as.fr:
Ce mystérieux Pokémon a commencé sa vie comme un ancien
figurine en argile fabriquée il y a plus de 20 000 ans.
This mysterious Pokémon started life as.es:
Este misterioso Pokémon comenzó su vida como un antiguo
Figurilla de arcilla realizada hace más de 20.000 años.
This mysterious Pokémon started life as.de:
Dieses mysteriöse Pokémon begann sein Leben als Urmensch
Tonfigur, hergestellt vor über 20.000 Jahren.
This mysterious Pokémon started life as.zh-tw:
這個神秘的神奇寶貝最初是一個古老的生物
兩萬多年前製作的泥人。
This mysterious Pokémon started life as.it:
Questo Pokémon misterioso ha iniziato la sua vita da antico
statuina in argilla realizzata oltre 20.000 anni fa.
This mysterious Pokémon started life as.pt-br:
Este misterioso Pokémon começou a vida como um antigo
estatueta de barro feita há mais de 20.000 anos.

This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.en:
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard berries.
It won't obey a Trainer who throws Poké Balls
without skill.
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.es:
Este Pokémon lucha lanzando bayas duras.
No obedecerá a un Entrenador que lance Poké Balls.
sin habilidad.
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.fr:
Ce Pokémon se bat en lançant des baies dures.
Il n'obéira pas à un dresseur qui lance des Poké Balls
sans compétence.
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.de:
Dieses Pokémon kämpft, indem es harte Beeren wirft.
Es wird einem Trainer nicht gehorchen, der Pokébälle wirft
ohne Geschick.
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.it:
Questo Pokémon combatte lanciando bacche dure.
Non obbedirà ad un Allenatore che lancia Poké Ball
senza abilità.
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝通過投擲堅硬的漿果進行戰鬥。
它不會服從扔精靈球的訓練家
沒有技巧。
This Pokémon battles by throwing hard be.pt-br:
Este Pokémon luta jogando frutas duras.
Não obedecerá a um treinador que joga Pokébolas

This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.en:
This Pokémon is courageous but also cautious.
It uses the soft fur covering its face to collect
information about its surroundings.
This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.es:
Este Pokémon es valiente pero también cauteloso.
Utiliza el suave pelaje que cubre su cara para recolectar
información sobre su entorno.
This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.fr:
Ce Pokémon est courageux mais aussi prudent.
Il utilise la douce fourrure qui recouvre son visage pour recueillir
des informations sur ses environs.
This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝很勇敢，但也很謹慎。
它利用覆蓋其面部的柔軟皮毛來收集
有關其周圍環境的信息。
This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.it:
Questo Pokémon è coraggioso ma anche cauto.
Utilizza la morbida pelliccia che gli ricopre il viso per collezionare
informazioni sui suoi dintorni.
This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.pt-br:
Este Pokémon é corajoso, mas também cauteloso.
Ele usa o pelo macio que cobre seu rosto para coletar
informações sobre seu entorno.
This Pokémon is courageous but also caut.de:
Dieses Pokémon ist mutig, aber auch vorsichtig.
Zum Sammeln nutzt es das weiche Fell, das sein Gesicht bedeckt
Informationen über die Umgebung.

This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.en:
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across rocks,
and then uses the tips of its feelers to absorb
the nutrients it finds within the stone.
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.pt-br:
Este Pokémon raspa seus espinhos nas rochas,
e então usa as pontas de suas antenas para absorver
os nutrientes que encontra dentro da pedra.
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.fr:
Ce Pokémon gratte ses pointes sur les rochers,
puis utilise les pointes de ses palpeurs pour absorber
les nutriments qu'il trouve dans la pierre.
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.es:
Este Pokémon raspa las rocas con sus púas.
y luego usa las puntas de sus antenas para absorber
los nutrientes que encuentra dentro de la piedra.
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.de:
Dieses Pokémon kratzt mit seinen Stacheln über Steine,
und nutzt dann die Spitzen seiner Fühler zum Absorbieren
die Nährstoffe, die es im Stein findet.
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.zh-tw:
這只神奇寶貝用尖刺刮過岩石，
然後用觸角的尖端吸收
它在石頭中發現的營養物質。
This Pokémon scrapes its spikes across r.it:
Questo Pokémon graffia le rocce con i suoi aculei.
e poi usa le punte delle sue antenne per assorbire
le sostanze nutritive che trova all'interno della pietra.

Through yoga training, it gained the psy.en:
Through yoga training, it gained the psychic
power to predict its foe's next move.
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.fr:
Grâce à une formation de yoga, il a acquis le psychisme
pouvoir de prédire le prochain mouvement de son ennemi.
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.pt-br:
Através do treinamento de yoga, ganhou o psíquico
poder de prever o próximo movimento de seu inimigo.
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.de:
Durch Yoga-Training erlangte es das Hellseher
Macht, den nächsten Schritt seines Gegners vorherzusagen.
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.es:
A través del entrenamiento de yoga, obtuvo el poder psíquico.
poder para predecir el próximo movimiento de su enemigo.
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.zh-tw:
通過瑜伽訓練，獲得了通靈的能力
擁有預測敵人下一步行動的能力。
Through yoga training, it gained the psy.it:
Attraverso l'allenamento yoga, ha acquisito la sensitività
potere di prevedere la prossima mossa del suo nemico.

When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.en:
When hunting, it skims the surface of water
at high speed to pick off unwary prey such
as Magikarp.
When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.fr:
Lors de la chasse, il effleure la surface de l'eau
à grande vitesse pour éliminer des proies imprudentes telles que
comme Magikarpe.
When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.es:
Cuando caza, roza la superficie del agua.
a gran velocidad para atrapar presas desprevenidas como
como Magikarp.
When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.zh-tw:
狩獵時，它會掠過水面
高速捕捉粗心的獵物
作為鯉魚王。
When hunting, it skims the surface of wa.de:
Bei der Jagd gleitet es über die Wasseroberfläche
