aux larmes, ses cris résonnent tristement dans le
crâne qu'il porte sur la tête.
When the memory of its departed mother b.pt-br:
Quando a memória de sua falecida mãe traz
até as lágrimas, seus gritos ecoam tristemente dentro do
caveira que usa na cabeça.
When the memory of its departed mother b.it:
Quando porta il ricordo della madre defunta
fino alle lacrime, le sue grida echeggiano tristemente all'interno
teschio che porta sulla testa.
When the memory of its departed mother b.zh-tw:
當對已故母親的記憶帶來
它流淚，它的哭聲在天地裡悲哀地迴響
它頭上戴著的頭骨。
When the memory of its departed mother b.de:
Wenn die Erinnerung an seine verstorbene Mutter weckt
es zu Tränen, seine Schreie hallen traurig im Inneren wider
Totenkopf, den es auf dem Kopf trägt.

After a lost child perished in the fores.en: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit's rebirth as this Pokémon.
After a lost child perished in the fores.zh-tw: 一個迷失的孩子在森林中喪生後，他們的靈魂附身在一個樹樁上，導致靈魂重生為這只神奇寶貝。

After long years in the ever-snowcapped.en: After long years in the ever-snowcapped mountains of Alola, this Vulpix has gained power over ice.
After long years in the ever-snowcapped.zh-tw: 在阿羅拉白雪皚皚的山脈中度過了漫長的歲月後，這只六尾已經獲得了駕馭冰雪的力量。

Although it's called a guardian deity, i.en: Although it's called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.
Although it's called a guardian deity, i.zh-tw: 雖然被稱為守護神，但如果人或寶可夢心情不好的話，就會變成惡神並發起攻擊。

Although it's called a guardian deity, i.en: Although it's called a guardian deity, it's violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.
Although it's called a guardian deity, i.zh-tw: 儘管被稱為守護神，但它的暴力足以粉碎任何被它視為敵人的人。

As long as this Pokémon is in the Active.en: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to it, it is now Asleep.
As long as this Pokémon is in the Active.zh-tw: 只要該神奇寶貝位於活動點，每當您從能量區向其附加能量時，它就會處於睡眠狀態。

Blazing sunlight has brought out the tru.en: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokémon.
Blazing sunlight has brought out the tru.zh-tw: 熾熱的陽光展現了這只神奇寶貝的真實形態和力量。

By masquerading as a bug Pokémon, it low.en: By masquerading as a bug Pokémon, it lowers the guard of actual bug Pokémon lured in by a scent of sweet flowers. Its sickles bring them down.
By masquerading as a bug Pokémon, it low.zh-tw: 通過偽裝成蟲子寶可夢，它會降低被甜美花香引誘的真正蟲子寶可夢的警惕性。它的鐮刀將他們打倒。

Choose 1 of your Alolan Marowak or Turto.en: Choose 1 of your Alolan Marowak or Turtonator. Take 2 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon. Your turn ends.
Choose 1 of your Alolan Marowak or Turto.zh-tw: 選擇 1 個 Alolan Marowak 或 Turtonator。從你的能量區取出 2 個 {R} 能量並將其附加到該神奇寶貝身上。你的回合結束。

Choose 1 of your Palossand or Mimikyu th.en: Choose 1 of your Palossand or Mimikyu that has damage on it, and move 40 of its damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Choose 1 of your Palossand or Mimikyu th.zh-tw: 選擇自己的1只受到傷害的帕羅沙或秘擬獸，將其傷害的40點轉移到對手的活躍寶可夢身上。

Comfey picks flowers with its vine and d.en: Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates itself with them. For some reason, flowers won't wither once they're attached to a Comfey.
Comfey picks flowers with its vine and d.zh-tw: 康菲用藤蔓採摘花朵，並用它們裝飾自己。出於某種原因，花朵一旦附著在紫草上就不會枯萎。

Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much mor.en: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much mor.zh-tw: 即使兩種材料的成分相同，Conkeldurr 混合的混凝土也比普通混凝土更耐用。

Discard 2 {L} Energy from this Pokémon..zh-tw: 丟棄該神奇寶貝的 2 {L} 點能量。

Discard a random Energy from both Active.en: Discard a random Energy from both Active Pokémon.
Discard a random Energy from both Active.zh-tw: 丟棄兩隻活躍神奇寶貝的隨機能量。

Discard a random Item card from your opp.en: Discard a random Item card from your opponent's hand.
Discard a random Item card from your opp.zh-tw: 從對手的手上隨機丟棄一張物品卡。

Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached.en: Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.
Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached.zh-tw: 丟棄對手每隻神奇寶貝上附著的所有神奇寶貝工具卡。

During this turn, attacks used by your A.en: During this turn, attacks used by your Alolan Golem, Vikavolt, or Togedemaru do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
During this turn, attacks used by your A.zh-tw: 這個回合中，你的阿羅拉傀儡、維卡伏特或託格德瑪魯使用的攻擊對對手的活躍寶可夢造成 +30 點傷害。

During your first turn, this Pokémon has.en: During your first turn, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
During your first turn, this Pokémon has.zh-tw: 在你的第一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝沒有撤退費用。

During your next turn, this Pokémon's In.en: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Insatiable Striking attack does +40 damage.
During your next turn, this Pokémon's In.zh-tw: 在你的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝的貪得無厭攻擊造成+40點傷害。

During your opponent's next turn, attack.en: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon cost 1 {C} more, and its Retreat Cost is 1 {C} more.
During your opponent's next turn, attack.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，防御寶可夢的攻擊費用增加 1 {C}，並且其撤退費用增加 1 {C}。

During your opponent's next turn, if thi.en: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, do 40 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, if thi.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，如果這只神奇寶貝因攻擊而受到傷害，則對攻擊的神奇寶貝造成 40 點傷害。

During your opponent's next turn, they c.en: During your opponent's next turn, they can't take any Energy from their Energy Zone to attach to their Active Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, they c.zh-tw: 在你的對手的下一個回合中，他們不能從能量區獲取任何能量來附加到他們的活躍神奇寶貝上。

During your opponent's next turn, this P.en: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes +30 damage from attacks.
During your opponent's next turn, this P.zh-tw: 在對手的下一個回合中，這只神奇寶貝受到的攻擊傷害+30。

Each of your Pokémon that has any {P} En.en: Each of your Pokémon that has any {P} Energy attached recovers from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
Each of your Pokémon that has any {P} En.zh-tw: 你的每隻附有 {P} 能量的神奇寶貝都會從所有特殊狀況中恢復，並且不會受到任何特殊狀況的影響。

Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.en: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.
Even though its helpless, gaseous body c.zh-tw: 儘管它無能為力，氣態的身體只要微風一吹就會被吹走，但它卻似乎並不在意。

Explosive substances coat the shell on i.en: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.
Explosive substances coat the shell on i.zh-tw: 爆炸性物質覆蓋在其背部的外殼上。膽敢攻擊它的敵人會被巨大的爆炸炸飛。

Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.en: Fletchinder scatters embers in tall grass where bug Pokémon might be hiding and then catches them as they come leaping out.
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.zh-tw: 弗萊欽德將餘燼撒在蟲子神奇寶貝可能藏身的高草叢中，然後在它們跳出來時抓住它們。

Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage for each heads. If at least 1 of them is heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 2 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 70 點傷害。如果其中至少有 1 個為正面，則對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在被燒毀。

Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage.en: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage.zh-tw: 翻轉 3 個硬幣。這次攻擊對每個頭造成 50 點傷害。

Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon also.en: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.
Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon also.zh-tw: 拋一枚硬幣。如果是反面，這只神奇寶貝也會對自己造成 20 點傷害。

Fomantis hates having its naps interrupt.en: Fomantis hates having its naps interrupted. It fires off beams using energy it gathers by bathing in the sun.
Fomantis hates having its naps interrupt.zh-tw: Fomantis 討厭小睡被打擾。它利用沐浴在陽光下收集的能量發射光束。

Heal 10 damage and remove a random Speci.en: Heal 10 damage and remove a random Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.
Heal 10 damage and remove a random Speci.zh-tw: 治療 10 點傷害並從你的活躍神奇寶貝中移除隨機的特殊狀態。

Heal all damage from 1 of your Shiinotic.en: Heal all damage from 1 of your Shiinotic or Tsareena. If you do, discard all Energy from that Pokémon.
Heal all damage from 1 of your Shiinotic.zh-tw: 治療 1 名 Shiinotic 或 Tsareena 造成的所有傷害。如果這樣做，則丟棄該神奇寶貝的所有能量。

If any of your Benched Pokémon have dama.en: If any of your Benched Pokémon have damage on them, this attack does 50 more damage.
If any of your Benched Pokémon have dama.zh-tw: 如果你的任何後備神奇寶貝受到傷害，則此攻擊會造成 50 點額外傷害。

If it loses its shovel, it will stick so.en: If it loses its shovel, it will stick something else—like a branch—in its head to make do until it finds another shovel.
If it loses its shovel, it will stick so.zh-tw: 如果它丟了鏟子，它就會把別的東西——比如樹枝——插在自己的頭上湊合，直到找到另一把鏟子。

If the Pokémon this card is attached to.en: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.
If the Pokémon this card is attached to.zh-tw: 如果這張卡所附著的神奇寶貝是你的主動神奇寶貝並且被對手神奇寶貝的攻擊傷害，那麼攻擊的神奇寶貝現在會中毒。

If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.en: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 50 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.zh-tw: 如果該寶可夢位於活動區域並因對方寶可夢的攻擊而被擊倒，則對攻擊的寶可夢造成 50 點傷害。
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.fr: Si ce Pokémon est dans le Point Actif et est mis KO par les dégâts d'une attaque du Pokémon de votre adversaire, infligez 50 dégâts au Pokémon attaquant.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.es: Si este Pokémon está en el Punto Activo y queda fuera de combate por el daño de un ataque del Pokémon de tu rival, haz 50 puntos de daño al Pokémon atacante.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.it: Se questo Pokémon è in posizione attiva e viene messo KO dai danni di un attacco dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, infliggi 50 danni al Pokémon attaccante.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.de: Wenn sich dieses Pokémon an der aktiven Stelle befindet und durch den Schaden eines Angriffs des Pokémon deines Gegners kampfunfähig gemacht wird, füge dem angreifenden Pokémon 50 Schadenspunkte zu.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.pt-br: Se este Pokémon estiver no Ponto Ativo e for Nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque do Pokémon do seu oponente, cause 50 de dano ao Pokémon Atacante.

If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to.en: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 60 more damage.
If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to.zh-tw: 如果本回合這只神奇寶貝從你的替補席移動到活躍位置，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。

If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by.en: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.
If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝因攻擊造成的傷害而被擊倒，則擲硬幣。如果正面，則該寶可夢不會被擊倒，其剩餘 HP 變為 10。

If you mistake it for a rock and step on.en: If you mistake it for a rock and step on it, it will headbutt you in anger. In addition to the pain, it will also zap you with a shock.
If you mistake it for a rock and step on.zh-tw: 如果你誤認為它是一塊石頭並踩到它，它會憤怒地用頭撞你。除了疼痛之外，它還會給你帶來電擊。

If you try too hard to get close to it,.en: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won't open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.
If you try too hard to get close to it,.zh-tw: 如果你太努力地想要接近它，它就不會向你敞開。即使你們確實變得親密，給予它太多的感情仍然是禁忌。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon has mo.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has more remaining HP than this Pokémon, this attack does 50 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon has mo.zh-tw: 如果對手的現役寶可夢的剩餘生命值比這只寶可夢多，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 50 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {D} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍神奇寶貝是{D}神奇寶貝，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 30 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a B.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a B.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢是基礎寶可夢，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is aff.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is aff.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍神奇寶貝受到特殊狀態的影響，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。

Individually, they're incredibly weak. I.en: Individually, they're incredibly weak. It's by gathering up into schools that they're able to confront opponents.
Individually, they're incredibly weak. I.zh-tw: 就個人而言，他們非常弱。他們通過聚集到學校來對抗對手。

It brings its claws together and whirls.en: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.
It brings its claws together and whirls.zh-tw: 它會張開爪子，高速旋轉，然後沖向獵物。

It builds up electricity in its abdomen,.en: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.
It builds up electricity in its abdomen,.zh-tw: 它在腹部積聚電流，通過下巴將其聚焦，然後將電流集中發射出去。

It can bend the tip of its beak to produ.en: It can bend the tip of its beak to produce over a hundred different cries at will.
It can bend the tip of its beak to produ.zh-tw: 它可以彎曲喙尖，隨意發出一百多種不同的叫聲。

It can perform odd dance steps to influe.en: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.
It can perform odd dance steps to influe.zh-tw: 它可以表演奇怪的舞步來影響敵人。它的舞蹈風格在海外非常流行。

It can't stop itself from chasing moving.en: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
It can't stop itself from chasing moving.zh-tw: 它無法阻止自己追逐移動的東西，它繞著圈跑，追著自己的尾巴。

It clatters its tail scales to unnerve o.en: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.
It clatters its tail scales to unnerve o.zh-tw: 它會敲打尾部鱗片來​​震懾對手。這只神奇寶貝只會與那些在這場展示面前堅定不移的人戰鬥。

It dislikes dirty places. It often searc.en: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
It dislikes dirty places. It often searc.zh-tw: 它不喜歡骯髒的地方。它經常尋找一個舒適的地方來梳理自己。

It dwells in the darkness of caves. It u.en: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
It dwells in the darkness of caves. It u.zh-tw: 它居住在黑暗的洞穴中。它用鋒利的爪子挖掘寶石來滋養自己。

It flaps its four wings to hover and fly.en: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction—to and fro and sideways.
It flaps its four wings to hover and fly.zh-tw: 它拍動四個翅膀可以懸停並在任何方向自由飛行——前後和側向。

It forms a water bubble at the rear of i.en: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.
It forms a water bubble at the rear of i.zh-tw: 它在身體後部形成一個水泡，然後用它覆蓋頭部。遇見另一個露皮德意味著比較水泡的大小。

It gets excited when it sees a dance it.en: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn't know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.
It gets excited when it sees a dance it.zh-tw: 當它看到不認識的舞蹈時，它會變得興奮。這位勤奮的工人刻苦練習，直到學會那種舞蹈。

It grows stronger by enduring harsh trai.en: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.
It grows stronger by enduring harsh trai.zh-tw: 通過忍受嚴酷的訓練，它會變得更加強大。是能夠抵禦任何攻擊的勇敢寶可夢。

It has an incredibly greedy personality..en: It has an incredibly greedy personality. Its nest is filled with so much food gathered by Rattata at its direction, it can't possibly eat it all.
It has an incredibly greedy personality..zh-tw: 它具有極其貪婪的性格。它的巢裡裝滿了拉達按照它的指示收集的食物，它不可能把它全部吃完。

It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.en: It has top-notch flying capabilities. It flies around easily, even while carrying prey that weighs more than 220 lbs.
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.zh-tw: 它具有一流的飛行能力。即使攜帶重量超過 220 磅的獵物，它也能輕鬆飛行。

It heals the wounds of people and Pokémo.en: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.
It heals the wounds of people and Pokémo.zh-tw: 用閃閃發光的鱗片灑在人和寶可夢身上，治愈他們的傷口。阿卡拉崇拜這位守護神。

It launches water bubbles with its legs,.en: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.
It launches water bubbles with its legs,.zh-tw: 它用腿發射水泡，將獵物淹沒在氣泡中。然後這只神奇寶貝就可以慢慢地品嚐它的食物了。

It looks somehow pained as it rages arou.en: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.
It looks somehow pained as it rages arou.zh-tw: 當它四處尋找光作為它的能量時，它看上去有些痛苦。顯然是來自另一個世界。

It loves challenging others to tests of.en: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.
It loves challenging others to tests of.zh-tw: 牠喜歡挑戰別人來考驗力量。它具有一巴掌就能讓火車停下來的力量。

It loves helping out with construction p.en: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.
It loves helping out with construction p.zh-tw: 牠喜歡幫助建築項目。它非常喜歡它，如果下雨導致工作停止，它就會搖晃圓木並發脾氣。

It loves to feed on feelings like envy a.en: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.
It loves to feed on feelings like envy a.zh-tw: 牠喜歡以嫉妒和惡意等感情為食。它直立的角抓住了人們的情緒。

It makes pollen puffs from pollen and ne.en: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs' effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.
It makes pollen puffs from pollen and ne.zh-tw: 它用花粉和花蜜製成花粉泡。泡芙的效果取決於成分的類型以及每種成分的用量。

It pecks at trees with its hard beak. Yo.en: It pecks at trees with its hard beak. You can get some idea of its mood or condition from the rhythm of its pecking.
It pecks at trees with its hard beak. Yo.zh-tw: 它用堅硬的喙啄樹。你可以從它啄食的節奏中了解它的情緒或狀況。

It sends its feathers, which are as shar.en: It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong, so its kicks are also formidable.
It sends its feathers, which are as shar.zh-tw: 飛舞著鋒利如刀刃的羽毛進行攻擊。它的腿很強壯，所以它的踢腿也很強大。

It shows no interest in anything that is.en: It shows no interest in anything that isn't fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it will help you pick out ingredients.
It shows no interest in anything that is.zh-tw: 它對任何不新鮮的東西都不感興趣。如果你帶著它去購物，它會幫助你挑選食材。

It shows off its muscles to Machoke and.en: It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.
It shows off its muscles to Machoke and.zh-tw: 它向馬喬克和其他古都人展示自己的肌肉。如果它無法與其他神奇寶貝相媲美，它會暫時處於低位。

It synchronizes its consciousness with o.en: It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.
It synchronizes its consciousness with o.zh-tw: 它將自己的意識與他人同步以理解他們的感受。這種能力使其對於照顧人很有用。

It uses large, hooked claws to cut a pat.en: It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this Sandslash is faster than any other Pokémon.
It uses large, hooked claws to cut a pat.zh-tw: 它在奔跑時用巨大的鉤狀爪子在厚厚的積雪中開出一條路。在雪山上，沙斬的速度比任何其他神奇寶貝都快。

It will do anything to win, taking advan.en: It will do anything to win, taking advantage of every opening and finishing opponents off with the small claws on its front legs.
It will do anything to win, taking advan.zh-tw: 為了獲勝，它會不惜一切代價，利用每一個機會，用前腿上的小爪子消滅對手。

It's accustomed to luxury because it use.en: It's accustomed to luxury because it used to live with Alolan royalty. As a result, it's very picky about food.
It's accustomed to luxury because it use.zh-tw: 它習慣於奢華，因為它曾經與阿羅拉皇室住在一起。因此，它對食物非常挑剔。

It's grumpy and stubborn. If you upset i.en: It's grumpy and stubborn. If you upset it, it discharges electricity from the surface of its body and growls with a voice like thunder.
It's grumpy and stubborn. If you upset i.zh-tw: 它脾氣暴躁又固執。如果你打擾它，它就會從身體表面釋放電流，並發出雷鳴般的咆哮聲。

It's nature's cleaner—it eats anything a.en: It's nature's cleaner—it eats anything and everything,  including garbage and rotten things. The ground near  its nest is always clean.
It's nature's cleaner—it eats anything a.zh-tw: 它是大自然的清潔者——牠吃任何東西，包括垃圾和腐爛的東西。它巢穴附近的地面總是乾淨的。

It's not uncommon for tunnels that appea.en: It's not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill's rampant digging.
It's not uncommon for tunnels that appea.zh-tw: 看似自然形成的隧道實際上是 Excadrill 瘋狂挖掘的結果，這種情況並不少見。

Its elegant finishing moves—performed by.en: Its elegant finishing moves—performed by nimbly leaping around using its wings—are polished in the forest where it was born and raised.
Its elegant finishing moves—performed by.zh-tw: 它優雅的終結動作——用翅膀靈活地跳躍——是在它出生和長大的森林中磨練出來的。

Its favorite places are unsanitary ones..en: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.
Its favorite places are unsanitary ones..zh-tw: 它最喜歡的地方是不衛生的地方。如果你把垃圾亂扔，你甚至可能會在你的房間裡發現這些神奇寶貝之一。

Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but.en: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.
Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but.zh-tw: 它蓬鬆的皮毛很適合撫摸，但不小心伸手觸摸這只神奇寶貝可能會導致痛苦的報復。

Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may.en: Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may flee rather than risk getting caught in its large mandibles that can snap thick tree branches.
Its natural enemies, like Rookidee, may.zh-tw: 它的天敵，比如 Rookidee，可能會逃跑，而不是冒險被它的大下頜抓住，因為它可以折斷粗樹枝。

Its stomach fills most of its torso. It.en: Its stomach fills most of its torso. It wanders the same path every day, searching for fresh food.
Its stomach fills most of its torso. It.zh-tw: 它的胃佔據了軀幹的大部分。它每天都在同一條路上徘徊，尋找新鮮的食物。

Its strange physiology reacts to electri.en: Its strange physiology reacts to electrical energy in interesting ways. The presence of a Shelmet will cause this Pokémon to evolve.
Its strange physiology reacts to electri.zh-tw: 它奇怪的生理機能以有趣的方式對電能做出反應。頭盔的存在會導致該神奇寶貝進化。

Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from.en: Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from boiled-down fruit. Because of this, Bounsweet was highly valued in the past, when sweeteners were scarce.
Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from.zh-tw: 它的汗水很甜，就像煮水果製成的糖漿一樣。正因為如此，Bounsweet 在過去甜味劑匱乏的時期受到高度重視。

Komala spends its entire life sleeping..en: Komala spends its entire life sleeping. It feeds on leaves that contain a potent poison only Komala can break down.
Komala spends its entire life sleeping..zh-tw: 科馬拉一生都在睡覺。它以葉子為食，葉子中含有隻有科馬拉才能分解的劇毒。

Life on mountains covered with deep snow.en: Life on mountains covered with deep snow has granted this Pokémon a body of ice that's as hard as steel.
Life on mountains covered with deep snow.zh-tw: 生活在厚厚積雪的山上，賦予了這款神奇寶貝堅硬如鋼的冰體。

Look at the top card of your deck. Then,.en: Look at the top card of your deck. Then, you may shuffle your deck.
Look at the top card of your deck. Then,.zh-tw: 查看你牌組頂牌。然後，你可以洗牌。

Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp.en: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.
Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp.zh-tw: 狼人用鋒利的爪子和尖牙攻擊獵物。它忠實地服從它信任的訓練師的指示。

Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare..en: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with Butterfree over food.
Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare..zh-tw: 花蜜和花粉是它最喜歡的食物。在花叢中，它與蝴蝶因食物發生小衝突。

Once during your turn, you may heal 30 d.en: Once during your turn, you may heal 30 damage from each of your {W} Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may heal 30 d.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，你可以治療每隻 {W} 神奇寶貝造成的 30 點傷害。

Once it absorbs a key's metal ions, it d.en: Once it absorbs a key's metal ions, it discards the key without a second thought. However, it will hang on to keys it favors for decades.
Once it absorbs a key's metal ions, it d.zh-tw: 一旦它吸收了鑰匙的金屬離子，它就會毫不猶豫地丟棄鑰匙。然而，它將在幾十年內保留它所青睞的鑰匙。

Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.en: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.
Once it accepts you as a friend, it trie.zh-tw: 一旦它接受你作為朋友，它就會嘗試用擁抱來表達它的愛意。讓它這麼做是很危險的——它很容易就會打碎你的骨頭。

Once it finds signs of prey, it will pat.en: Once it finds signs of prey, it will patiently stake out the location, waiting until the sun goes down.
Once it finds signs of prey, it will pat.zh-tw: 一旦發現獵物的踪跡，它就會耐心地標定位置，等到太陽下山。

People fear it due to a belief that it d.en: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it's kind.
People fear it due to a belief that it d.zh-tw: 人們害怕它，因為相信它會吞噬任何試圖在其森林中砍伐樹木的人，但對於與它共享森林的神奇寶貝來說，它是友善的。

People used to mistake Oranguru for a hu.en: People used to mistake Oranguru for a human when they saw it issue command after command to the other Pokémon of the forest.
People used to mistake Oranguru for a hu.zh-tw: 當人們看到猩猩向森林中的其他神奇寶貝發出一個又一個的命令時，他們常常將其誤認為是人類。

Places where Minior fall from the night.en: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.
Places where Minior fall from the night.zh-tw: 米尼奧爾從夜空中墜落的地方很少而且相隔很遠，阿羅拉就是其中之一。

Put 1 of your {C} Pokémon that has damag.en: Put 1 of your {C} Pokémon that has damage on it into your hand.
Put 1 of your {C} Pokémon that has damag.zh-tw: 將自己1只受到傷害的{C}寶可夢加入手牌。

Put a random Basic {W} Pokémon from your.en: Put a random Basic {W} Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.
Put a random Basic {W} Pokémon from your.zh-tw: 從你的棄牌堆中隨機將 1 只基礎 {W} 神奇寶貝置入你的手牌。

Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. Th.en: Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. The pearl on its head amplifies its psychic powers.
Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. Th.zh-tw: 如果 Spoink 停止彈跳就會死亡。它頭上的珍珠增強了它的精神力量。

Steenee spreads a sweet scent that makes.en: Steenee spreads a sweet scent that makes others feel invigorated. This same scent is popular for antiperspirants.
Steenee spreads a sweet scent that makes.zh-tw: Steenee 散發出一種甜美的香味，讓其他人感到精力充沛。同樣的氣味在止汗劑中也很受歡迎。

Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.en: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.
Swift as the wind, Absol races through f.zh-tw: 阿勃索爾疾馳如風，穿過田野和山脈。它彎曲的弓狀角對自然災害的警告信號非常敏感。

Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Bench.en: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched {L} Pokémon.
Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Bench.zh-tw: 將此神奇寶貝與你的 1 個後備 {L} 神奇寶貝交換。

Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出一個{P}能量並將其附加到該神奇寶貝上。

Take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
Take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone.zh-tw: 從你的能量區取出一個{W}能量並將其附加到這只神奇寶貝身上。

The balloons it inflates with its nose g.en: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.
The balloons it inflates with its nose g.zh-tw: 隨著它日復一日的練習，它用鼻子吹的氣球變得越來越大。

The king who ruled Alola in times of ant.en:
The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it
the “cocoon of the stars” and built an altar to worship it.
The king who ruled Alola in times of ant.zh-tw:
古代統治阿羅拉的國王稱其為
並築壇祭祀“星之繭”。

The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon's.en: The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon's habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.
The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon's.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝棲息地富含金屬的地質導致它的頭上長出了鋼須。

The mountains it calls home are nearly t.en: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
The mountains it calls home are nearly t.zh-tw: 它稱之為家的山脈高近兩英里。在極少數情況下，它會降落到下方城鎮與孩子們一起玩耍。

The phase of the moon apparently has som.en: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It's active on the night of a full moon.
The phase of the moon apparently has som.zh-tw: 月相顯然對其功率有一定影響。它在滿月之夜活躍。

The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.en: The round face of Alolan Persian is considered to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region, so these Pokémon are very well cared for.
The round face of Alolan Persian is cons.zh-tw: 阿羅拉波斯的圓臉被認為是阿羅拉地區繁榮的象徵，因此這些神奇寶貝受到了很好的照顧。

The scaleless, scarred parts of its body.en: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.
The scaleless, scarred parts of its body.zh-tw: 它身體上無鱗且傷痕累累的部分是其力量的標誌。它向被擊敗的對手展示他們。

The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.en: The terrifying Palossand drags smaller Pokémon into its sandy body. Once its victims are trapped, it drains them of their vitality whenever it pleases.
The terrifying Palossand drags smaller P.zh-tw: 可怕的帕羅沙將較小的神奇寶貝拖入其沙質身體中。一旦受害者被困，它就會隨時耗盡他們的生命力。

Their beautiful, metallic whiskers creat.en: Their beautiful, metallic whiskers create a sort of protective helmet on their heads, and they also function as highly precise sensors.
Their beautiful, metallic whiskers creat.zh-tw: 它們美麗的金屬鬍鬚在頭上形成了一種防護頭盔，而且它們還充當高精度傳感器。

There are a hundred or so of them living.en: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola's waste-disposal site. They're all hard workers who eat a lot of trash.
There are a hundred or so of them living.zh-tw: 阿羅拉的垃圾處理場裡生活著大約一百人。他們都是吃很多垃圾的勤勞工人。

There was a scientist who peeked under M.en: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu's old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
There was a scientist who peeked under M.zh-tw: 有一位科學家以研究的名義，在密擬丘的舊破布下偷看。這位科學家死於一種神秘的疾病。

They learn to fight by smashing their he.en: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.
They learn to fight by smashing their he.zh-tw: 它們通過將頭部的鱗片撞在一起來學習戰鬥。決鬥增強了他們的技能和精神。

They smack beaks with others of their ki.en: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.
They smack beaks with others of their ki.zh-tw: 它們用喙與同類進行交流。攻擊的強度和次數可以告訴對方他們的感受。

They usually live on ponds, but after an.en: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
They usually live on ponds, but after an.zh-tw: 它們通常生活在池塘里，但晚上陣雨後，它們可能會出現在城鎮的水坑里。

This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your.en: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy attached to that Pokémon.
This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your.zh-tw: 這次攻擊對對手的 1 只寶可夢造成 20 點傷害，傷害值與該寶可夢身上所附加的能量每有 1 點。

This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.en: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.
This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.zh-tw: 這次攻擊對對手的每隻神奇寶貝造成 20 點傷害。
This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.fr: Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts à chacun des Pokémon de votre adversaire.
This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.es: Este ataque hace 20 puntos de daño a cada uno de los Pokémon de tu rival.
This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.it: Questo attacco infligge 20 danni a ciascuno dei Pokémon del tuo avversario.
This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.pt-br: Este ataque causa 20 pontos de dano a cada um dos Pokémon do seu oponente.
This attack does 20 damage to each of yo.de: Dieser Angriff fügt jedem Pokémon deines Gegners 20 Schadenspunkte zu.

This attack does 40 more damage for each.en: This attack does 40 more damage for each of your Benched Wishiwashi and Wishiwashi ex.
This attack does 40 more damage for each.zh-tw: 這次攻擊對你的後備願望和願望超級每人造成 40 點以上傷害。

This form of Oricorio has sipped pink ne.en: This form of Oricorio has sipped pink nectar. It elevates its mind with the gentle steps of its dance, then unleashes its psychic energy.
This form of Oricorio has sipped pink ne.zh-tw: 這種形式的 Oricorio 正在啜飲粉紅色的花蜜。它用輕柔的舞步提升心靈，然後釋放心靈能量。

This form of Oricorio has sipped purple.en: This form of Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. It uses ethereal dance steps to call forth the spirits of the dead.
This form of Oricorio has sipped purple.zh-tw: 這種形態的奧里科里奧正在啜飲紫色花蜜。它用飄逸的舞步來召喚死者的靈魂。

This form of Oricorio has sipped red nec.en: This form of Oricorio has sipped red nectar. It whips up blazing flames as it moves to the steps of its passionate dance.
This form of Oricorio has sipped red nec.zh-tw: 這種形態的奧里科里奧正在啜飲著紅色的花蜜。當它邁著充滿激情的舞步時，它會激起熊熊的火焰。

This form of Oricorio has sipped yellow.en: This form of Oricorio has sipped yellow nectar. It uses nimble steps to approach opponents, then knocks them out with electric punches.
This form of Oricorio has sipped yellow.zh-tw: 這種形式的 Oricorio 啜飲著黃色的花蜜。它以敏捷的步伐接近對手，然後用電拳將他們擊倒。

This guardian deity of Poni Island manip.en: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
This guardian deity of Poni Island manip.zh-tw: 這位波尼島的守護神可以操縱水。因為它生活在濃霧深處，所以人們既害怕又尊敬它。

This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean fre.en: This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you don't groom it diligently, it may stop listening to you.
This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean fre.zh-tw: 這只自戀的神奇寶貝是個乾淨的怪人。如果你不勤奮地照顧它，它可能會不再聽你的。

This Pokémon also does 40 damage to itse.en: This Pokémon also does 40 damage to itself.
This Pokémon also does 40 damage to itse.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝也會對自身造成 40 點傷害。

This Pokémon covers itself in mud that i.en: This Pokémon covers itself in mud that it has regurgitated. The mud won't dry out even if it's exposed to the sun for a long time.
This Pokémon covers itself in mud that i.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝用吐出的泥土覆蓋自己。即使長時間暴露在陽光下，泥漿也不會變乾。

This Pokémon developed from an abandoned.en: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.
This Pokémon developed from an abandoned.zh-tw: 該寶可夢是由懷有怨恨的廢棄玩偶進化而來。在黑暗的小巷裡可以看到它。

This Pokémon eats trash, which turns int.en: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.
This Pokémon eats trash, which turns int.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝吃垃圾，垃圾在體內變成毒藥。毒物的主要成分取決於所吃的垃圾種類。

This Pokémon has been treasured not just.en: This Pokémon has been treasured not just for its physical labor but also because it produces high-quality mud used for making pottery.
This Pokémon has been treasured not just.zh-tw: 這種神奇寶貝不僅因其體力勞動而受到珍視，還因為它能產出用於製作陶器的優質泥漿。

This Pokémon is normally calm, but once.en: This Pokémon is normally calm, but once it enters battle, its hormonal balance changes and it becomes aggressive.
This Pokémon is normally calm, but once.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝通常很平靜，但一旦進入戰鬥，荷爾蒙平衡就會發生變化，變得具有攻擊性。

This Pokémon is now Confused..zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝現在處於混亂狀態。

This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. Ho.en: This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. However, it is said that a Tsareena will instantly become calm if someone touches the crown on its calyx.
This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. Ho.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝驕傲且具有攻擊性。然而，據說，如果有人觸摸查雷納花萼上的王冠，查雷納就會立即變得平靜。

This Pokémon is very friendly when it's.en: This Pokémon is very friendly when it's young. Its disposition becomes vicious once it matures, but it never forgets the kindness of its master.
This Pokémon is very friendly when it's.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝年輕時非常友好。長大後性情變得惡毒，但它卻永遠不會忘記主人的恩德。

This Pokémon lives within a dome made by.en: This Pokémon lives within a dome made by its own legs. Toxapex monitors its surroundings by sensing the flow of the tide through its spikes.
This Pokémon lives within a dome made by.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝生活在用自己的腿建造的圓頂內。 Toxapex 通過其尖刺感應潮汐的流動來監控周圍環境。

This Pokémon punches trees and eats the.en: This Pokémon punches trees and eats the berries that drop down, training itself and getting food at the same time.
This Pokémon punches trees and eats the.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝會擊打樹木並吃掉掉落的漿果，在訓練自己的同時獲取食物。

This Pokémon sets the bone it holds on f.en: This Pokémon sets the bone it holds on fire and dances through the night as a way to mourn its fallen allies.
This Pokémon sets the bone it holds on f.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝會點燃它所持有的骨頭，並在夜間跳舞，以哀悼死去的盟友。

This Pokémon uses its rocky mane to slas.en: This Pokémon uses its rocky mane to slash any who approach. It will even disobey its Trainer if it dislikes the orders it was given.
This Pokémon uses its rocky mane to slas.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝用它的岩石鬃毛來砍殺任何接近的人。如果它不喜歡它所收到的命令，它甚至會違背訓練師的命令。

This Pokémon wanders the seaside looking.en: This Pokémon wanders the seaside looking for food. It often gets electric shocks from broken Pincurchin spines that it tries to eat.
This Pokémon wanders the seaside looking.zh-tw: 這只神奇寶貝在海邊徘徊尋找食物。當它試圖吃掉破碎的平柯欽刺時，它經常會受到電擊。

To Primarina, every battle is a stage. I.en: To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.
To Primarina, every battle is a stage. I.zh-tw: 對於Primarina來說，每一場戰鬥都是一個舞台。它用優美的歌聲和舞蹈來捕食獵物。

Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.en: Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it once they've grown close, but it's a powerful, sharp-clawed Pokémon, so its Trainer gets covered in scratches.
Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it.zh-tw: 一旦它們變得親近，巨龍貓就會讓它的訓練師寵愛它，但它是一種強大的、利爪的神奇寶貝，所以它的訓練師身上佈滿了划痕。

Wearing the shell covering they stole fr.en: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
Wearing the shell covering they stole fr.zh-tw: 他們穿著從謝爾梅特偷來的貝殼，自衛並用兩支長矛攻擊。

When it rotates itself, it gives off lig.en: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.
When it rotates itself, it gives off lig.zh-tw: 當它自行旋轉時，它會發出類似於太陽的光，從而使敵人失明。

When two Graveler fight each other, it f.en:
When two Graveler fight each other, it fills the
surroundings with flashes of light and sound.
People call it the “fireworks of the earth.”
When two Graveler fight each other, it f.zh-tw:
當兩個 Graveler 互相爭鬥時，它會充滿
周圍閃爍著光和聲音。
人們稱其為“人間煙花”。

While its durable shell protects it from.en: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.
While its durable shell protects it from.zh-tw: 雖然它堅固的外殼可以保護它免受攻擊，但 Charjabug 會用下巴尖端釋放出的電流來攻擊敵人。

With noises that could be mistaken for t.en: With noises that could be mistaken for the rattles of maracas, it creates an upbeat rhythm, startling bird Pokémon and making them fly off in a hurry.
With noises that could be mistaken for t.zh-tw: 它發出的聲音可能會被誤認為是沙球的嘎嘎聲，它會產生一種歡快的節奏，驚動鳥類神奇寶貝並讓它們匆忙飛走。

With the long hairs on its back, this Po.en: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
With the long hairs on its back, this Po.zh-tw: 背上有長毛，這只神奇寶貝從其他電力神奇寶貝那裡獲取電力。它將吸收的東西儲存在電囊中。

You can use this card only if you have A.en: You can use this card only if you have Araquanid in play. Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.
You can use this card only if you have A.zh-tw: 只有當你場上有阿拉奎尼德時你才能使用這張卡。將對手的 1 只後備神奇寶貝切換到活動位置。

Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned and Burned.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Po.zh-tw: 你對手的活躍神奇寶貝現在中毒並燃燒。

Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.en:
Although unattractive and unpopular, this
Pokémon's marvelous vitality has made it a
subject of research.
Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.es:
Aunque poco atractivo e impopular, este
La maravillosa vitalidad de Pokémon lo ha convertido en un
tema de investigación.
Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.it:
Sebbene poco attraente e impopolare, questo
La meravigliosa vitalità dei Pokémon lo ha reso un
oggetto di ricerca.
Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.de:
Dies ist zwar unattraktiv und unbeliebt
Die wunderbare Vitalität von Pokémon hat es zu einem gemacht
Gegenstand der Forschung.
Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.fr:
Bien que peu attrayant et impopulaire, ce
La merveilleuse vitalité de Pokémon en a fait un
sujet de recherche.
Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.zh-tw:
儘管沒有吸引力且不受歡迎，但這
神奇寶貝神奇的生命力使其成為
研究課題。
Although unattractive and unpopular, thi.pt-br:
Embora pouco atraente e impopular, este
A maravilhosa vitalidade do Pokémon tornou-o um
objeto de pesquisa.

At the end of your opponent's next turn,.en: At the end of your opponent's next turn, do 90 damage to the Defending Pokémon.
At the end of your opponent's next turn,.fr: À la fin du prochain tour de votre adversaire, infligez 90 dégâts au Pokémon défenseur.
At the end of your opponent's next turn,.pt-br: No final do próximo turno do seu oponente, cause 90 de dano ao Pokémon Defensor.
At the end of your opponent's next turn,.it: Alla fine del prossimo turno del tuo avversario, infliggi 90 danni al Pokémon difensore.
At the end of your opponent's next turn,.es: Al final del siguiente turno de tu rival, haz 90 puntos de daño al Pokémon Defensor.
At the end of your opponent's next turn,.de: Füge am Ende des nächsten Zuges deines Gegners dem verteidigenden Pokémon 90 Schadenspunkte zu.
At the end of your opponent's next turn,.zh-tw: 下個對手回合結束時，對守方寶可夢造成 90 點傷害。

At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.en: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw a card.
At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.fr: A la fin de votre tour, si ce Pokémon est dans le Spot Actif, piochez une carte.
At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.pt-br: No final do seu turno, se este Pokémon estiver no Local Ativo, compre um card.
At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.es: Al final de tu turno, si este Pokémon está en el Punto Activo, roba una carta.
At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.it: Alla fine del tuo turno, se questo Pokémon è in posizione attiva, pesca una carta.
At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.de: Wenn sich dieses Pokémon am Ende deines Zuges an der aktiven Stelle befindet, ziehe eine Karte.
At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon.zh-tw: 在你的回合結束時，如果這只神奇寶貝位於活躍位置，抽一張卡。

Constant polishing makes the edge of the.en:
Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on
its tail extremely sharp. It's Zangoose's archrival.
Constant polishing makes the edge of the.fr:
Un polissage constant rend le bord de la lame plus
sa queue extrêmement pointue. C'est le grand rival de Zangoose.
Constant polishing makes the edge of the.es:
El pulido constante hace que el borde de la hoja se mantenga
su cola extremadamente afilada. Es el archirrival de Zangoose.
Constant polishing makes the edge of the.zh-tw:
不斷的拋光使刀刃鋒利
它的尾巴極其鋒利。這是Zangoose的主要競爭對手。
Constant polishing makes the edge of the.it:
La lucidatura costante rende il filo della lama affilato
la sua coda estremamente affilata. È l'arcinemico rivale di Zangoose.
Constant polishing makes the edge of the.de:
Ständiges Polieren macht die Schneide der Klinge fit
sein Schwanz ist extrem scharf. Es ist Zangooses Erzrivale.
Constant polishing makes the edge of the.pt-br:
O polimento constante faz com que o fio da lâmina fique
sua cauda extremamente afiada. É o arquirrival de Zangoose.

Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.en:
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It is said
that people and Pokémon who die on snowy
mountains are reborn into these Pokémon.
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.fr:
Les cryogonaux apparaissent pendant les saisons froides. On dit
que les gens et les Pokémon qui meurent dans la neige
les montagnes renaissent dans ces Pokémon.
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.es:
Los criogonales aparecen durante las estaciones frías. se dice
que personas y Pokémon que mueren en la nieve
Las montañas renacen en estos Pokémon.
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.zh-tw:
冷凍出現在寒冷季節。據說
那些死在雪地裡的人和神奇寶貝
山脈在這些神奇寶貝中重生。
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.de:
Kryogonale treten in der kalten Jahreszeit auf. Es heißt
dass Menschen und Pokémon, die im Schnee sterben
Berge werden in diesen Pokémon wiedergeboren.
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.it:
I criogonali compaiono durante le stagioni fredde. Si dice
quelle persone e Pokémon che muoiono nella neve
le montagne rinascono in questi Pokémon.
Cryogonal appear during cold seasons. It.pt-br:
Criogonais aparecem durante as estações frias. É dito
que pessoas e Pokémon que morrem na neve
montanhas renascem nesses Pokémon.

Discard the top card of your deck. If th.en: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a {F} Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.
Discard the top card of your deck. If th.fr: Défaussez la carte du dessus de votre deck. Si cette carte est un Pokémon {F}, cette attaque inflige 60 dégâts supplémentaires.
Discard the top card of your deck. If th.es: Descarta la carta superior de tu mazo. Si esa carta es un Pokémon {F}, este ataque hace 60 daños más.
Discard the top card of your deck. If th.zh-tw: 棄掉你牌組最上面的牌。如果該卡是{F}神奇寶貝，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。
Discard the top card of your deck. If th.pt-br: Descarte a carta do topo do seu baralho. Se aquela carta for um Pokémon {F}, este ataque causa 60 de dano a mais.
Discard the top card of your deck. If th.de: Lege die oberste Karte deines Decks ab. Wenn es sich bei dieser Karte um ein {F}-Pokémon handelt, fügt dieser Angriff 60 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.
Discard the top card of your deck. If th.it: Scarta la prima carta del tuo mazzo. Se quella carta è un Pokémon {F}, questo attacco infligge 60 danni in più.

Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.en: Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.fr: Défaussez jusqu'à 2 cartes Outil Pokémon de votre main. Cette attaque inflige 50 dégâts pour chaque carte défaussée de cette manière.
Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.es: Descarta hasta 2 cartas de Herramientas Pokémon de tu mano. Este ataque hace 50 puntos de daño por cada carta que descartes de esta manera.
Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.zh-tw: 從手牌捨棄最多2張寶可夢工具卡。你以這種方式丟棄的每張牌都會造成 50 點傷害。
Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.pt-br: Descarte até 2 cartas de Ferramentas Pokémon da sua mão. Este ataque causa 50 de dano para cada carta descartada dessa forma.
Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.de: Wirf bis zu 2 Pokémon-Ausrüstungskarten aus deiner Hand ab. Dieser Angriff fügt 50 Schadenspunkte für jede auf diese Weise abgeworfene Karte zu.
Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards from.it: Scarta fino a 2 carte Oggetto Pokémon dalla tua mano. Questo attacco infligge 50 danni per ogni carta che hai scartato in questo modo.

Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.en:
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so even being
hit by a car won't faze this Pokémon. However, it
is extremely susceptible to rain.
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.fr:
Donphan est couvert d'une peau dure, donc même s'il est
heurté par une voiture ne dérangera pas ce Pokémon. Cependant, il
est extrêmement sensible à la pluie.
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.es:
Donphan está cubierto de piel dura, por lo que incluso siendo
atropellado por un coche no perturbará a este Pokémon. Sin embargo,
es extremadamente susceptible a la lluvia.
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.zh-tw:
唐凡全身覆蓋著堅韌的獸皮，所以即使是
被車撞不會讓這只神奇寶貝感到困擾。然而，它
極易受雨影響。
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.it:
Donphan è ricoperto di pelle dura, quindi anche lo è
investito da un'auto non spaventerà questo Pokémon. Tuttavia, esso
è estremamente suscettibile alla pioggia.
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.de:
Donphan ist mit zäher Haut bedeckt, also ebenmäßig
Wenn es von einem Auto angefahren wird, wird dieses Pokémon nicht aus der Fassung gebracht. Allerdings ist es
ist extrem anfällig für Regen.
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so eve.pt-br:
Donphan é coberto por uma pele dura, então mesmo sendo
atropelado por um carro não intimidará este Pokémon. No entanto,
é extremamente suscetível à chuva.

Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.en:
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall grass
where bug Pokémon might be hiding and
then catches them as they come leaping out.
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.fr:
Fletchinder disperse des braises dans les herbes hautes
où les Pokémon bugs pourraient se cacher et
puis les attrape alors qu'ils sautent.
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.it:
Fletchinder sparge la brace nell'erba alta
dove potrebbero nascondersi i Pokémon bug e
poi li coglie mentre saltano fuori.
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.es:
Fletchinder esparce brasas en la hierba alta
dónde podrían esconderse los Pokémon bichos y
luego los atrapa cuando salen saltando.
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.de:
Fletchinder streut Glut ins hohe Gras
wo sich Käfer-Pokémon verstecken könnten und
Dann fängt er sie auf, als sie herausspringen.
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.zh-tw:
弗萊欽德將餘燼撒在高高的草叢中
蟲子寶可夢可能藏身的地方以及
然後在他們跳出來時抓住他們。
Fletchinder scatters embers in tall gras.pt-br:
Fletchinder espalha brasas na grama alta
onde Pokémon insetos podem estar escondidos e
então os pega quando eles saltam.

For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.en: For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, look at that many cards from the top of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order.
For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.es: Por cada uno de tus Pokémon {P} en juego, mira esa misma cantidad de cartas de la parte superior del mazo de tu oponente y devuélvelas en cualquier orden.
For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.pt-br: Para cada um dos seus {P} Pokémon em jogo, olhe aquela quantidade de cartas do topo do baralho do seu oponente e coloque-as de volta em qualquer ordem.
For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.de: Sieh dir für jedes deiner {P}-Pokémon im Spiel so viele Karten oben vom Deck deines Gegners an und lege sie in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück.
For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.it: Per ciascuno dei tuoi Pokémon {P} in gioco, guarda quel numero di carte dalla cima del mazzo del tuo avversario e rimettile a posto in qualsiasi ordine.
For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.fr: Pour chacun de vos {P} Pokémon en jeu, regardez autant de cartes du dessus du deck de votre adversaire et remettez-les dans n'importe quel ordre.
For each of your {P} Pokémon in play, lo.zh-tw: 對於場上的每隻 {P} 神奇寶貝，查看對手牌組頂部的相應數量的卡牌，然後將它們按任意順序放回原處。

Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.en:
Gazing at its luminescent spots will quickly
induce a hypnotic state, putting the observer
under Malamar's control.
Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.es:
Mirar sus puntos luminiscentes rápidamente
inducir un estado hipnótico, poniendo al observador
bajo el control de Malamar.
Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.fr:
Regarder ses taches luminescentes sera rapidement
induire un état hypnotique, mettant l'observateur
sous le contrôle de Malamar.
Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.pt-br:
Olhar para seus pontos luminescentes irá rapidamente
induzir um estado hipnótico, colocando o observador
sob o controle de Malamar.
Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.zh-tw:
凝視其發光點很快就會
誘導催眠狀態，使觀察者
在馬拉瑪的控制下。
Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.de:
Der Blick auf seine leuchtenden Punkte wird schnell sichtbar
einen hypnotischen Zustand herbeiführen und den Beobachter versetzen
unter Malamars Kontrolle.
Gazing at its luminescent spots will qui.it:
Osservare i suoi punti luminescenti sarà rapido
indurre uno stato ipnotico, mettendo l'osservatore in uno stato di ipnosi
sotto il controllo di Malamar.

Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.en: Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.es: Cura 50 puntos de daño de 1 de tus Pokémon en Banca.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.de: Heile 50 Schadenspunkte bei 1 Pokémon auf deiner Bank.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.pt-br: Cure 50 de dano de 1 dos seus Pokémon no Banco.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.fr: Soignez 50 dégâts à l'un de vos Pokémon de Banc.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.zh-tw: 治療你 1 只後備神奇寶貝造成的 50 點傷害。
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Benched Po.it: Cura 50 danni da 1 dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina.

Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.en: Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, and it recovers from being Asleep, Paralyzed, and Confused.
Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.fr: Soignez 60 dégâts de l'un de vos Miltank, et il récupère après avoir été endormi, paralysé et confus.
Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.es: Cura 60 daños de 1 de tu Miltank y se recupera de estar dormido, paralizado y confundido.
Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.de: Heile 60 Schaden von einem deiner Miltanks und er erholt sich aus dem Schlaf, der Lähmung und der Verwirrung.
Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.pt-br: Cure 60 de dano de 1 de seu Miltank e ele se recupera de Adormecido, Paralisado e Confuso.
Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.zh-tw: 治療你的 1 個米爾坦克 60 點傷害，並且它會從睡眠、麻痺和混亂狀態中恢復。
Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Miltank, a.it: Cura 60 danni da 1 del tuo Miltank e si riprende dallo stato addormentato, paralizzato e confuso.

If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.en:
If it bonds with a person, it will gently envelop
the friend with its soft wings, then hum.
If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.fr:
S'il se lie à une personne, il l'enveloppera doucement
l'ami avec ses ailes douces, puis fredonne.
If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.es:
Si se une a una persona, la envolverá suavemente.
el amigo con sus suaves alas, luego tararea.
If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.it:
Se si lega a una persona, la avvolgerà delicatamente
l'amico con le sue morbide ali, poi canticchia.
If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.pt-br:
Se se relacionar com uma pessoa, envolverá suavemente
o amigo com suas asas macias, então cantarola.
If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.de:
Wenn es sich mit einem Menschen verbindet, wird es ihn sanft umhüllen
der Freund mit seinen weichen Flügeln, dann summen.
If it bonds with a person, it will gentl.zh-tw:
如果它與一個人結合，它會輕輕地包圍
朋友帶著柔軟的翅膀，然後哼哼。

If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.en: If Latios is on your Bench, this attack does 20 more damage.
If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.it: Se Latios è nella tua panchina, questo attacco infligge 20 danni in più.
If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.de: Wenn Latios auf deiner Bank ist, fügt dieser Angriff 20 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.
If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.fr: Si Latios est sur votre Banc, cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts supplémentaires.
If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.es: Si Latios está en tu Banca, este ataque hace 20 daños más.
If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.pt-br: Se Latios estiver no seu banco, este ataque causará 20 de dano a mais.
If Latios is on your Bench, this attack.zh-tw: 如果拉帝歐斯在你的替補席上，這次攻擊會造成 20 點額外傷害。

If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.en: If this Pokémon has 2 or more different types of Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.
If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.es: Si este Pokémon tiene 2 o más tipos diferentes de Energía unidas, este ataque hace 60 puntos de daño más.
If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.fr: Si ce Pokémon est attaché à 2 types d'Énergie différents ou plus, cette attaque inflige 60 dégâts supplémentaires.
If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.de: Wenn an dieses Pokémon 2 oder mehr verschiedene Energietypen angelegt sind, fügt dieser Angriff 60 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.
If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.pt-br: Se este Pokémon tiver 2 ou mais tipos diferentes de Energia anexados, este ataque causará 60 de dano a mais.
If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.zh-tw: 如果該神奇寶貝附加了 2 種或以上不同類型的能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。
If this Pokémon has 2 or more different.it: Se questo Pokémon ha 2 o più tipi diversi di Energie assegnate, questo attacco infligge 60 danni in più.

If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.en: If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attached, this attack does 40 more damage.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.es: Si este Pokémon tiene alguna Energía {W} unida, este ataque hace 40 puntos de daño más.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.fr: Si ce Pokémon a une Énergie {W} attachée, cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts supplémentaires.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.it: Se questo Pokémon ha delle Energie {W} assegnate, questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.zh-tw: 如果該神奇寶貝附加了任何 {W} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 40 點。
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.de: Wenn an dieses Pokémon {W}-Energie angelegt ist, fügt dieser Angriff 40 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.
If this Pokémon has any {W} Energy attac.pt-br: Se este Pokémon tiver alguma Energia {W} anexada, este ataque causará 40 pontos de dano a mais.

If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.en: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.es: Si este Pokémon tiene al menos 2 Energías {R} extra unidas, este ataque hace 60 puntos de daño más.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.fr: Si ce Pokémon a au moins 2 Énergies {R} supplémentaires attachées, cette attaque inflige 60 dégâts supplémentaires.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.it: Se questo Pokémon ha almeno due Energie {R} extra assegnate, questo attacco infligge 60 danni in più.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.de: Wenn an dieses Pokémon mindestens 2 zusätzliche {R}-Energien angelegt sind, fügt dieser Angriff 60 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.pt-br: Se este Pokémon tiver pelo menos 2 energias {R} extras anexadas, este ataque causará 60 de dano a mais.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {R}.zh-tw: 如果這只神奇寶貝附加了至少 2 個額外的 {R} 能量，則此攻擊造成的傷害增加 60 點。

If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.en: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack can be used for 1 {L} Energy.
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.fr: Si ce Pokémon subit des dégâts, cette attaque peut être utilisée pour 1 {L} Énergie.
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.es: Si este Pokémon tiene daño, este ataque puede usarse por 1 {L} de Energía.
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.zh-tw: 如果該神奇寶貝受到傷害，則該攻擊可消耗 1 {L} 點能量。
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.it: Se questo Pokémon ha dei danni, questo attacco può essere usato per 1 Energia {L}.
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.de: Wenn dieses Pokémon Schaden hat, kann dieser Angriff für 1 {L} Energie verwendet werden.
If this Pokémon has damage on it, this a.pt-br: Se este Pokémon sofrer dano, este ataque poderá ser usado por 1 {L} Energia.

If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.en: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.es: Si este Pokémon está en el Punto Activo y queda fuera de combate por el daño de un ataque del Pokémon de tu rival, lanza una moneda. Si sale cara, el Pokémon atacante queda fuera de combate.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.fr: Si ce Pokémon est dans le Point Actif et est mis KO par les dégâts d'une attaque du Pokémon de votre adversaire, lancez une pièce. Si c'est face, le Pokémon attaquant est mis KO.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.it: Se questo Pokémon è in posizione attiva e viene messo KO dai danni di un attacco dei Pokémon del tuo avversario, lancia una moneta. Se esce testa, il Pokémon attaccante viene messo KO.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.zh-tw: 如果該神奇寶貝位於活動位置並因對手神奇寶貝的攻擊而被擊倒，則拋一枚硬幣。如果正面朝上，則攻擊的神奇寶貝將被擊倒。
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.pt-br: Se este Pokémon estiver no Ponto Ativo e for Nocauteado pelo dano de um ataque do Pokémon do seu oponente, jogue uma moeda. Se der cara, o Pokémon atacante será nocauteado.
If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot an.de: Wenn sich dieses Pokémon an der aktiven Stelle befindet und durch den Schaden eines Angriffs des Pokémon deines Gegners kampfunfähig gemacht wird, wirf eine Münze. Bei „Kopf“ wird das angreifende Pokémon kampfunfähig gemacht.

If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.en: If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.es: Si tienes a Latias en juego, este Pokémon no tiene Coste de Retirada.
If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.fr: Si vous avez Latias en jeu, ce Pokémon n'a pas de coût de retraite.
If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.it: Se hai Latias in gioco, questo Pokémon non ha costo di ritirata.
If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.zh-tw: 如果你有拉帝亞斯在場，這只神奇寶貝沒有撤退成本。
If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.de: Wenn du Latias im Spiel hast, hat dieses Pokémon keine Rückzugskosten.
If you have Latias in play, this Pokémon.pt-br: Se você tiver Latias em jogo, este Pokémon não terá custo de Recuo.

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an evolved Pokémon, devolve it by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent's hand.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.fr: Si le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est un Pokémon évolué, transférez-le en mettant la carte d'Évolution la plus élevée sur lui dans la main de votre adversaire.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.es: Si el Pokémon Activo de tu oponente es un Pokémon evolucionado, transmítelo poniendo la carta de Etapa de Evolución más alta en la mano de tu oponente.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.zh-tw: 如果對手的活躍寶可夢是進化寶可夢，則將其進化階段最高的卡放入對手手牌，將其移交。
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.de: Wenn das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ein entwickeltes Pokémon ist, devolviere es, indem du die Karte mit der höchsten Entwicklungsstufe darauf auf die Hand deines Gegners nimmst.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.pt-br: Se o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente for um Pokémon evoluído, devolva-o colocando a carta de Evolução de Estágio mais alta dele na mão do seu oponente.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an.it: Se il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è un Pokémon evoluto, devoluzione mettendo la carta Evoluzione di Fase più alta nella mano del tuo avversario.

If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zangoose, this attack does 40 more damage.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.es: Si el Pokémon Activo de tu rival es Zangoose, este ataque hace 40 puntos de daño más.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.fr: Si le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est Zangoose, cette attaque inflige 40 dégâts supplémentaires.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.pt-br: Se o Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente for Zangoose, este ataque causará 40 de dano a mais.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.it: Se il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è Zangoose, questo attacco infligge 40 danni in più.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.zh-tw: 如果對手的出戰寶可夢是讚鵝，則這次攻擊造成的傷害增加 40 點。
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Zan.de: Wenn das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners Zangoose ist, fügt dieser Angriff 40 weitere Schadenspunkte zu.

If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.en: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this Pokémon's attacks, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.it: Se il Pokémon del tuo avversario viene messo KO dai danni inflitti dagli attacchi di questo Pokémon, durante il prossimo turno del tuo avversario, previeni tutti i danni e gli effetti degli attacchi inflitti a questo Pokémon.
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.fr: Si le Pokémon de votre adversaire est mis KO par les dégâts des attaques de ce Pokémon, pendant le prochain tour de votre adversaire, prévenez tous les dégâts et effets des attaques infligées à ce Pokémon.
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.zh-tw: 如果對手的神奇寶貝被該神奇寶貝的攻擊造成的傷害擊倒，則在對手的下一個回合中，阻止對該神奇寶貝造成的所有攻擊傷害及其效果。
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.es: Si el Pokémon de tu rival queda fuera de combate por el daño de los ataques de este Pokémon, durante el próximo turno de tu rival, evita todo el daño (y los efectos de) los ataques realizados a este Pokémon.
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.de: Wenn das Pokémon deines Gegners durch Schaden durch die Angriffe dieses Pokémon kampfunfähig wird, verhindere im nächsten Zug deines Gegners jeglichen Schaden und alle Auswirkungen von Angriffen, die diesem Pokémon zugefügt werden.
If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Ou.pt-br: Se o Pokémon do seu oponente for Nocauteado pelo dano dos ataques deste Pokémon, durante o próximo turno do seu oponente, evite todos os danos e efeitos dos ataques causados ​​a este Pokémon.

It can be found near the sea. The large.en:
It can be found near the sea. The large pincers
grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
It can be found near the sea. The large.es:
Se puede encontrar cerca del mar. Las pinzas grandes
volver a crecer si se los arranca de sus órbitas.
It can be found near the sea. The large.fr:
On le trouve près de la mer. Les grosses pinces
repousser s'ils sont arrachés de leurs orbites.
It can be found near the sea. The large.pt-br:
Pode ser encontrado perto do mar. As grandes pinças
voltar a crescer se forem arrancados das órbitas.
It can be found near the sea. The large.zh-tw:
它可以在海邊附近找到。大鉗子
如果它們被從插座中拔出，它們會重新長出來。
It can be found near the sea. The large.de:
Es kann in der Nähe des Meeres gefunden werden. Die große Zange
wachsen nach, wenn sie aus ihren Höhlen gerissen werden.
It can be found near the sea. The large.it:
Può essere trovato vicino al mare. Le grandi tenaglie
ricrescono se vengono strappati dalle loro orbite.

It changes into the forms of others to s.en:
It changes into the forms of others to surprise
them. Apparently, it often transforms into a
silent child.
It changes into the forms of others to s.es:
Cambia a las formas de otros para sorprender.
ellos. Al parecer, a menudo se transforma en un
niño silencioso.
It changes into the forms of others to s.fr:
Il se transforme en forme d'autrui pour surprendre
eux. Apparemment, cela se transforme souvent en
enfant silencieux.
It changes into the forms of others to s.zh-tw:
變化成別人的形態給大家帶來驚喜
他們。顯然，它經常轉變為
沉默的孩子。
It changes into the forms of others to s.it:
Si trasforma nelle forme degli altri per sorprendere
loro. Apparentemente, spesso si trasforma in a
bambino silenzioso.
It changes into the forms of others to s.de:
Es verwandelt sich in die Formen anderer, um zu überraschen
sie. Anscheinend verwandelt es sich oft in ein
stilles Kind.
It changes into the forms of others to s.pt-br:
Ele muda para a forma de outros para surpreender
eles. Aparentemente, muitas vezes se transforma em um
criança silenciosa.

It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.en:
It communicates using telepathy. Its body is
covered in down that refracts light to make
it invisible.
It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.fr:
Il communique par télépathie. Son corps est
recouvert de duvet qui réfracte la lumière pour faire
c'est invisible.
It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.es:
Se comunica mediante telepatía. Su cuerpo es
cubierto de plumón que refracta la luz para hacer
es invisible.
It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.it:
Comunica usando la telepatia. Il suo corpo lo è
ricoperto di piumino che rifrange la luce per fare
è invisibile.
It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.pt-br:
Ele se comunica por telepatia. Seu corpo é
coberto de penugem que refrata a luz para fazer
é invisível.
It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.zh-tw:
它使用心靈感應進行交流。它的身體是
覆蓋有折射光線的羽絨
它是看不見的。
It communicates using telepathy. Its bod.de:
Es kommuniziert mittels Telepathie. Sein Körper ist
Mit Daunen bedeckt, die das Licht brechen
es unsichtbar.

It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.en:
It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes
a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.fr:
Il nettoie constamment ses ailes cotonneuses. Il faut
une douche pour se nettoyer si elle devient sale.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.pt-br:
Ele limpa constantemente suas asas parecidas com algodão. É preciso
um chuveiro para se limpar caso fique sujo.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.it:
Si pulisce costantemente le sue ali simili al cotone. Ci vuole
una doccia per pulirsi se si sporca.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.es:
Se limpia constantemente sus alas parecidas al algodón. se necesita
una ducha para limpiarse si se ensucia.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.de:
Es pflegt ständig seine watteähnlichen Flügel. Es dauert
eine Dusche, um sich selbst zu reinigen, wenn sie schmutzig wird.
It constantly grooms its cotton-like win.zh-tw:
它不斷地梳理棉花般的翅膀。這需要
如果弄髒了，可以自行清潔淋浴。

It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.en:
It envelops its prey in its veillike arms and draws
it down to the deeps, five miles below the
ocean's surface.
It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.es:
Envuelve a su presa en sus brazos como velos y atrae
hasta las profundidades, cinco millas por debajo del
la superficie del océano.
It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.fr:
Il enveloppe sa proie dans ses bras en forme de voile et attire
jusqu'aux profondeurs, à cinq milles sous le
la surface de l'océan.
It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.it:
Avvolge la preda tra le sue braccia simili a veli e la attira
giù negli abissi, cinque miglia sotto il
superficie dell'oceano.
It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.de:
Es umhüllt seine Beute mit seinen schleierartigen Armen und zieht
es bis in die Tiefe, fünf Meilen unter dem
Meeresoberfläche.
It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.zh-tw:
它用面紗般的手臂包圍獵物並吸引
它一直深入到海底五英里的深處
海洋表面。
It envelops its prey in its veillike arm.pt-br:
Ele envolve sua presa em seus braços semelhantes a véus e puxa
até as profundezas, cinco milhas abaixo do
superfície do oceano.

It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.en:
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It flies
around easily, even while carrying prey
that weighs more than 220 lbs.
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.fr:
Il possède des capacités de vol de premier ordre. Ça vole
se déplacer facilement, même en transportant une proie
qui pèse plus de 220 livres.
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.es:
Tiene capacidades de vuelo de primer nivel. Vuela
moverse fácilmente, incluso mientras lleva presas
que pesa más de 220 libras.
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.it:
Ha capacità di volo di prim'ordine. Vola
muoversi facilmente, anche mentre trasporta la preda
che pesa più di 220 libbre.
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.pt-br:
Possui capacidades de vôo de alto nível. Ele voa
facilmente, mesmo carregando uma presa
que pesa mais de 220 libras.
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.zh-tw:
它具有一流的飛行能力。它飛
即使攜帶獵物，也能輕鬆四處走動
重量超過 220 磅。
It has top-notch flying capabilities. It.de:
Es verfügt über erstklassige Flugfähigkeiten. Es fliegt
leicht herumlaufen, selbst beim Tragen von Beute
das mehr als 220 Pfund wiegt.

It is constantly wracked by a headache..en:
It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the
headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious
powers.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..es:
Está constantemente atormentado por un dolor de cabeza. cuando el
El dolor de cabeza se vuelve intenso, comienza a usar misteriosos.
poderes.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..fr:
Il est constamment ravagé par un mal de tête. Quand le
le mal de tête devient intense, il commence à utiliser un mystérieux
pouvoirs.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..it:
È costantemente tormentato dal mal di testa. Quando il
il mal di testa diventa intenso, inizia a essere misterioso
poteri.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..pt-br:
É constantemente assolado por uma dor de cabeça. Quando o
dor de cabeça fica intensa, começa a usar misteriosos
poderes.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..de:
Es wird ständig von Kopfschmerzen geplagt. Wenn die
Der Kopfschmerz wird intensiv, es beginnt geheimnisvoll zu wirken
Befugnisse.
It is constantly wracked by a headache..zh-tw:
它經常被頭痛所折磨。當
頭痛變得劇烈，它開始使用神秘
權力。

It lives about one yard underground, whe.en:
It lives about one yard underground, where it
feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears
aboveground.
It lives about one yard underground, whe.fr:
Il vit à environ un mètre sous terre, où il
se nourrit des racines des plantes. Il apparaît parfois
hors sol.
It lives about one yard underground, whe.es:
Vive aproximadamente a un metro bajo tierra, donde
se alimenta de raíces de plantas. A veces aparece
sobre el suelo.
It lives about one yard underground, whe.zh-tw:
它住在地下一碼左右，
以植物根部為食。有時會出現
地上。
It lives about one yard underground, whe.it:
Vive a circa un metro sotto terra, dove...
si nutre delle radici delle piante. A volte appare
fuori terra.
It lives about one yard underground, whe.pt-br:
Vive cerca de um metro abaixo do solo, onde
alimenta-se de raízes de plantas. Às vezes aparece
acima do solo.
It lives about one yard underground, whe.de:
Es lebt etwa einen Meter unter der Erde, wo es ist
ernährt sich von Pflanzenwurzeln. Es erscheint manchmal
oberirdisch.

It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.en:
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a
foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means
to punch them.
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.fr:
Il vit dans les eaux chaudes et peu profondes. S'il rencontre un
ennemi, il crachera ses organes internes pour
pour les frapper.
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.es:
Vive en aguas cálidas y poco profundas. Si encuentra un
enemigo, escupirá sus órganos internos como medio
para golpearlos.
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.it:
Vive in acque calde e poco profonde. Se incontra a
nemico, sputerà i suoi organi interni come mezzo
per prenderli a pugni.
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.zh-tw:
它生活在溫暖的淺水中。如果它遇到一個
敵人，它會吐出內臟作為手段
打他們。
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.de:
Es lebt in warmen, flachen Gewässern. Wenn es auf a trifft
Feind, es wird als Mittel seine inneren Organe ausspucken
um sie zu schlagen.
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it.pt-br:
Vive em águas quentes e rasas. Se encontrar um
inimigo, ele cuspirá seus órgãos internos como um meio
para socá-los.

It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.en:
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock
breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it
locates a replacement.
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.fr:
Il fait un trou dans une roche appropriée. Si ce rocher
se brise, le Pokémon reste agité jusqu'à ce qu'il
trouve un remplaçant.
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.es:
Hace un agujero en una roca adecuada. si esa roca
se rompe, el Pokémon permanece agitado hasta que
localiza un reemplazo.
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.it:
Fa un buco in una roccia adatta. Se quella roccia
si rompe, il Pokémon rimane agitato finché non si rompe
individua un sostituto.
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.zh-tw:
它在合適的岩石上打一個洞。如果那塊石頭
打破後，神奇寶貝會一直焦躁不安，直到它
找到替代品。
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.de:
Es macht ein Loch in einen geeigneten Stein. Wenn dieser Stein
bricht, bleibt das Pokémon aufgeregt, bis es
findet einen Ersatz.
It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If t.pt-br:
Faz um buraco numa rocha adequada. Se aquela pedra
quebra, o Pokémon permanece agitado até
localiza um substituto.

It spins while making its luminescent sp.en:
It spins while making its luminescent spots flash.
These spots allow it to communicate with others
by using different patterns of light.
It spins while making its luminescent sp.es:
Gira mientras hace destellar sus puntos luminiscentes.
Estos puntos le permiten comunicarse con los demás.
mediante el uso de diferentes patrones de luz.
It spins while making its luminescent sp.fr:
Il tourne en faisant clignoter ses taches luminescentes.
Ces spots lui permettent de communiquer avec les autres
en utilisant différents modèles de lumière.
It spins while making its luminescent sp.pt-br:
Ele gira enquanto faz seus pontos luminescentes piscarem.
Esses pontos permitem que ele se comunique com outras pessoas
usando diferentes padrões de luz.
It spins while making its luminescent sp.it:
Gira facendo lampeggiare i suoi punti luminescenti.
Questi punti gli permettono di comunicare con gli altri
utilizzando diversi modelli di luce.
It spins while making its luminescent sp.zh-tw:
它一邊旋轉，一邊讓發光點閃爍。
這些點可以讓它與其他人交流
通過使用不同的光圖案。
It spins while making its luminescent sp.de:
Es dreht sich und lässt seine Leuchtpunkte blinken.
Diese Stellen ermöglichen es ihm, mit anderen zu kommunizieren
durch die Verwendung verschiedener Lichtmuster.

It understands human speech and is highl.en:
It understands human speech and is highly
intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that
dislikes fighting.
It understands human speech and is highl.fr:
Il comprend la parole humaine et est hautement
intelligent. C'est un tendre Pokémon qui
n'aime pas se battre.
It understands human speech and is highl.pt-br:
Ele entende a fala humana e é altamente
inteligente. É um Pokémon gentil que
não gosta de lutar.
It understands human speech and is highl.de:
Es versteht die menschliche Sprache und ist sehr gut
intelligent. Es ist ein zartes Pokémon
kämpft nicht gern.
It understands human speech and is highl.es:
Entiende el habla humana y es altamente
inteligente. Es un Pokémon tierno que
no le gusta pelear.
It understands human speech and is highl.it:
Capisce il linguaggio umano ed è altamente
intelligente. È un Pokémon tenero quello
non ama combattere.
It understands human speech and is highl.zh-tw:
它能理解人類的語言並且具有高度
聰明。這是一隻溫柔的神奇寶貝
不喜歡打鬥。

It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.en:
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. Tours that
take people swimming with Mantyke are a
super-popular beach activity.
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.es:
Es muy amigable y fácilmente domesticable. Tours que
llevar a la gente a nadar con Mantyke es una
actividad de playa súper popular.
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.fr:
Il est très amical et facile à apprivoiser. Des visites qui
emmenez les gens nager avec Mantyke sont un
activité de plage très populaire.
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.zh-tw:
它非常友好並且很容易被馴服。旅行團
帶著 Mantyke 一起游泳的人是
超受歡迎的海灘活動。
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.de:
Es ist sehr freundlich und leicht zu zähmen. Touren das
Nehmen Sie Leute mit, die mit Mantyke schwimmen gehen
äußerst beliebte Strandaktivität.
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.pt-br:
É altamente amigável e facilmente domesticado. Passeios que
levar as pessoas para nadar com Mantyke é um
atividade de praia super popular.
It's highly friendly and easily tamed. T.it:
È molto amichevole e facilmente addomesticabile. Lo visita
portare le persone a nuotare con Mantyke sono a
attività in spiaggia super popolare.

It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.en:
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten those
it encounters, it fans out the claws on its
front paws.
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.fr:
C'est le rival de Seviper. Pour menacer ceux
il rencontre, il déploie ses griffes sur son
pattes avant.
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.zh-tw:
這是塞維珀的主要競爭對手。去威脅那些
它遇到了，它就會張開爪子
前爪。
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.es:
Es el archirrival de Seviper. Para amenazar a aquellos
encuentra, abre en abanico las garras de su
patas delanteras.
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.pt-br:
É o arquirrival de Seviper. Para ameaçar aqueles
encontra, espalha as garras em seu
patas dianteiras.
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.de:
Es ist Sevipers Erzrivale. Diese zu bedrohen
es begegnet, es breitet seine Krallen aus
Vorderpfoten.
It's Seviper's archrival. To threaten th.it:
È l'arcinemico di Seviper. Per minacciarli
incontra, apre a ventaglio i suoi artigli
zampe anteriori.

Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.en:
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and is bouncy
and soft. If it bounces even once, it cannot stop.
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.es:
Su cuerpo tiene un aroma ligeramente dulce y es animado.
y suave. Si rebota aunque sea una vez, no puede detenerse.
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.fr:
