Son corps a un parfum légèrement sucré et est rebondissant
et doux. S'il rebondit ne serait-ce qu'une seule fois, il ne peut pas s'arrêter.
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.pt-br:
Seu corpo tem um aroma levemente adocicado e é saltitante
e macio. Se saltar pelo menos uma vez, não poderá parar.
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.it:
Il suo corpo ha un profumo leggermente dolce ed è rimbalzante
e morbido. Se rimbalza anche una volta, non può fermarsi.
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.de:
Sein Körper hat einen leicht süßlichen Duft und ist federnd
und weich. Wenn es auch nur einmal abprallt, kann es nicht aufhören.
Its body has a faintly sweet scent and i.zh-tw:
它的身體有淡淡的甜味，而且有彈性
和柔軟的。即使彈起一次，也無法停止。

Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.en:
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It is said the cry
may rarely be imbued with happiness-giving power.
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.es:
Su grito suena como un encantamiento. se dice el llanto
rara vez puede estar imbuido del poder de dar felicidad.
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.zh-tw:
它的叫聲聽起來就像是咒語。據說哭聲
可能很少充滿給予幸福的力量。
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.fr:
Son cri ressemble à une incantation. On dit le cri
peut rarement être imprégné d’un pouvoir générateur de bonheur.
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.it:
Il suo grido sembra un incantesimo. Si dice il grido
può raramente essere intriso di potere che dà felicità.
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.pt-br:
Seu grito soa como um encantamento. Diz-se que o choro
raramente pode estar imbuído do poder de dar felicidade.
Its cry sounds like an incantation. It i.de:
Sein Schrei klingt wie eine Beschwörung. Es heißt, der Schrei
kann selten von glückspendender Kraft durchdrungen sein.

Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.en:
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower
strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy
to move.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.pt-br:
Sua pinça grande e dura tem 10.000 cavalos de potência
força. No entanto, sendo tão grande, é pesado
para se mover.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.de:
Seine große und harte Zange hat 10.000 PS
Stärke. Da es jedoch so groß ist, ist es unhandlich
bewegen.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.es:
Su pinza grande y dura tiene 10.000 caballos de fuerza.
fuerza. Sin embargo, al ser tan grande, resulta difícil de manejar.
para moverse.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.fr:
Sa pince large et dure a 10 000 chevaux
force. Cependant, étant si grand, il est difficile à manier
bouger.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.it:
La sua tenaglia grande e dura ha 10.000 cavalli
forza. Tuttavia, essendo così grande, è poco maneggevole
muoversi.
Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-hor.zh-tw:
其大而硬的鉗子有萬馬力
力量。不過太大了，不方便
移動。

Its shell is overflowing with its height.en:
Its shell is overflowing with its heightened
otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as
protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.
Its shell is overflowing with its height.es:
Su caparazón rebosa con su realzado
energía de otro mundo. El ectoplasma sirve como
protección para el espíritu central de este Pokémon.
Its shell is overflowing with its height.de:
Seine Schale ist überfüllt mit seinen Erhöhungen
jenseitige Energie. Das Ektoplasma dient als
Schutz für den Kerngeist dieses Pokémon.
Its shell is overflowing with its height.zh-tw:
它的外殼充滿了它高高的
超凡脫俗的能量。外質充當
保護這只神奇寶貝的核心精神。
Its shell is overflowing with its height.fr:
Sa coquille déborde de son relief
énergie d'un autre monde. L'ectoplasme sert de
protection de l'esprit principal de ce Pokémon.
Its shell is overflowing with its height.pt-br:
Sua concha está transbordando com seu elevado
energia sobrenatural. O ectoplasma serve como
proteção para o espírito central deste Pokémon.
Its shell is overflowing with its height.it:
Il suo guscio è traboccante di intensificazione
energia ultraterrena. L'ectoplasma serve come
protezione per lo spirito centrale di questo Pokémon.

Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.en:
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It flings that tail
around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.es:
Su cola rebota como una pelota de goma. Lanza esa cola
alrededor para luchar contra oponentes más grandes que él mismo.
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.fr:
Sa queue rebondit comme une balle en caoutchouc. Il jette cette queue
autour pour combattre des adversaires plus grands que lui.
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.it:
La sua coda rimbalza come una palla di gomma. Lancia quella coda
in giro per combattere avversari più grandi di lui.
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.pt-br:
Sua cauda salta como uma bola de borracha. Ele arremessa aquela cauda
ao redor para lutar contra adversários maiores que ele.
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.zh-tw:
它的尾巴像橡皮球一樣彈跳。它甩動那條尾巴
四處對抗比自己強大的對手。
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball. It.de:
Sein Schwanz hüpft wie ein Gummiball. Es wirft diesen Schwanz
herum, um gegen Gegner zu kämpfen, die größer sind als er selbst.

Its three heads bob separately up and do.en:
Its three heads bob separately up and down to
loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it
to burrow.
Its three heads bob separately up and do.fr:
Ses trois têtes bougent séparément de haut en bas pour
ameublir le sol à proximité, ce qui le rend plus facile
creuser.
Its three heads bob separately up and do.es:
Sus tres cabezas se mueven por separado hacia arriba y hacia abajo para
aflojar la tierra cercana, haciéndola más fácil
para excavar.
Its three heads bob separately up and do.pt-br:
Suas três cabeças balançam separadamente para cima e para baixo
afrouxe o solo próximo, facilitando
para cavar.
Its three heads bob separately up and do.it:
Le sue tre teste si muovono separatamente su e giù
allentare il terreno vicino, rendendolo più facile
scavare.
Its three heads bob separately up and do.zh-tw:
它的三個頭分別上下擺動
鬆動附近的土壤，使其更容易生長
挖洞。
Its three heads bob separately up and do.de:
Seine drei Köpfe bewegen sich einzeln auf und ab
Lockern Sie den Boden in der Nähe, um ihn leichter zu machen
graben.

Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.en:
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch to many
times the length of its body. No one has figured
out how Lickilicky's tongue can stretch so far.
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.es:
La extraña lengua de Lickilicky puede extenderse a muchos
veces la longitud de su cuerpo. Nadie se ha dado cuenta
Descubra cómo la lengua de Lickilicky puede estirarse hasta tal punto.
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.fr:
L'étrange langue de Lickilicky peut s'étendre à beaucoup
fois la longueur de son corps. Personne n'a compris
comment la langue de Lickilicky peut s'étirer jusqu'à présent.
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.pt-br:
A estranha língua de Lickilicky pode se estender a muitos
vezes o comprimento do seu corpo. Ninguém imaginou
descobrir como a língua de Lickilicky pode esticar tanto.
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.zh-tw:
Lickilicky 奇怪的舌頭可以延伸到很多
其身體長度的幾倍。沒有人想到
看看 Lickilicky 的舌頭如何能伸展這麼遠。
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.de:
Lickilickys seltsame Zunge kann viele ansprechen
mal die Länge seines Körpers. Niemand hat es herausgefunden
Finden Sie heraus, wie weit Lickilickys Zunge sich dehnen kann.
Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch.it:
La strana lingua di Lickilicky può allungarsi a molti
volte la lunghezza del suo corpo. Nessuno lo ha capito
come riesce ad allungarsi così tanto la lingua di Lickilicky.

Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.en: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all Pokémon Tool cards you find there into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.fr: Regardez les 4 premières cartes de votre deck. Mettez toutes les cartes Outil Pokémon que vous y trouvez dans votre main. Mélangez les autres cartes dans votre deck.
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.es: Mira las 4 primeras cartas de tu mazo. Pon en tu mano todas las cartas de Herramientas Pokémon que encuentres allí. Mezcla las otras cartas de nuevo en tu mazo.
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.zh-tw: 查看你牌組頂的 4 張牌。將在那裡找到的所有神奇寶貝工具卡放入手牌。將其他牌洗回你的牌庫中。
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.de: Schauen Sie sich die obersten 4 Karten Ihres Decks an. Nimm alle Pokémon-Ausrüstungskarten, die du dort findest, auf deine Hand. Mische die anderen Karten zurück in deinen Stapel.
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.pt-br: Veja as 4 primeiras cartas do seu baralho. Coloque em sua mão todas as cartas de Ferramentas Pokémon que encontrar. Embaralhe as outras cartas de volta no seu baralho.
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Pu.it: Guarda le prime 4 carte del tuo mazzo. Metti nella tua mano tutte le carte Oggetto Pokémon che trovi lì. Rimescola le altre carte nel tuo mazzo.

Milotic has provided inspiration to many.en:
Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists.
It has even been referred to as the most
beautiful Pokémon of all.
Milotic has provided inspiration to many.es:
Milotic ha servido de inspiración a muchos artistas.
Incluso se le ha denominado el más
Hermoso Pokémon de todos.
Milotic has provided inspiration to many.fr:
Milotic a inspiré de nombreux artistes.
Il a même été qualifié de plus
beau Pokémon de tous.
Milotic has provided inspiration to many.zh-tw:
米洛蒂奇為許多藝術家提供了靈感。
甚至被稱為最
美麗的神奇寶貝。
Milotic has provided inspiration to many.de:
Milotic hat viele Künstler inspiriert.
Es wurde sogar als das meiste bezeichnet
wunderschönes Pokémon von allen.
Milotic has provided inspiration to many.pt-br:
Milotic inspirou muitos artistas.
Foi até referido como o mais
lindo Pokémon de todos.
Milotic has provided inspiration to many.it:
Milotic ha fornito ispirazione a molti artisti.
È stato anche definito il più
bellissimi Pokémon in assoluto.

Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.en:
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk, so it's
been supporting the lives of people and other
Pokémon since ancient times.
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.fr:
Miltank produit du lait très nutritif, c'est donc
soutenu la vie des gens et d'autres
Pokémon depuis l'Antiquité.
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.pt-br:
Miltank produz leite altamente nutritivo, por isso é
tem apoiado a vida de pessoas e outros
Pokémon desde os tempos antigos.
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.es:
Miltank produce leche altamente nutritiva, por lo que es
estado apoyando la vida de las personas y otros
Pokémon desde la antigüedad.
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.de:
Miltank produziert hochnährstoffreiche Milch
unterstützt das Leben von Menschen und anderen
Pokémon seit der Antike.
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.it:
Miltank produce latte altamente nutriente, quindi è così
hanno sostenuto la vita di persone e altri
Pokémon fin dai tempi antichi.
Miltank produces highly nutritious milk,.zh-tw:
Miltank 生產高營養牛奶，因此
一直在支持人們和其他人的生活
自古以來的神奇寶貝。

Most of this Pokémon's body composition.en:
Most of this Pokémon's body composition is
identical to sea water. It makes sunken ships
its lair.
Most of this Pokémon's body composition.es:
La mayor parte de la composición corporal de este Pokémon es
Idéntico al agua de mar. Hace barcos hundidos
su guarida.
Most of this Pokémon's body composition.fr:
La majeure partie de la composition corporelle de ce Pokémon est
identique à l'eau de mer. Il fait couler des navires
son antre.
Most of this Pokémon's body composition.it:
La maggior parte della composizione corporea di questo Pokémon lo è
identico all'acqua di mare. Produce navi affondate
la sua tana.
Most of this Pokémon's body composition.de:
Der größte Teil der Körperzusammensetzung dieses Pokémon ist
identisch mit Meerwasser. Es macht versunkene Schiffe
sein Versteck.
Most of this Pokémon's body composition.zh-tw:
該神奇寶貝的大部分身體成分是
與海水相同。它使沉船
它的巢穴。
Most of this Pokémon's body composition.pt-br:
A maior parte da composição corporal deste Pokémon é
idêntica à água do mar. Faz navios afundados
seu covil.

Once during your turn, when you play thi.en: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may heal 60 damage from 1 of your {W} Pokémon.
Once during your turn, when you play thi.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, quando você jogar este Pokémon da sua mão para evoluir 1 dos seus Pokémon, você poderá curar 60 de dano de 1 dos seus {W} Pokémon.
Once during your turn, when you play thi.de: Einmal während deines Zuges, wenn du dieses Pokémon aus deiner Hand spielst, um 1 deiner Pokémon zu entwickeln, kannst du 60 Schadenspunkte von 1 deiner {W} Pokémon heilen.
Once during your turn, when you play thi.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, lorsque vous jouez ce Pokémon depuis votre main pour faire évoluer 1 de vos Pokémon, vous pouvez soigner 60 dégâts d'1 de vos Pokémon {W}.
Once during your turn, when you play thi.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，當你從手牌中使用這只神奇寶貝來進化你的 1 只神奇寶貝時，你可以從你的 1 只 {W} 神奇寶貝那裡治療 60 點傷害。
Once during your turn, when you play thi.es: Una vez durante tu turno, cuando juegues este Pokémon de tu mano para hacer evolucionar a 1 de tus Pokémon, podrás curar 60 puntos de daño de 1 de tus Pokémon {W}.
Once during your turn, when you play thi.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, quando giochi questo Pokémon dalla tua mano per far evolvere 1 dei tuoi Pokémon, puoi curare 60 danni da 1 dei tuoi Pokémon {W}.

Once during your turn, when you put this.en: Once during your turn, when you put this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may have your opponent reveal their hand.
Once during your turn, when you put this.pt-br: Uma vez durante o seu turno, quando você colocar este Pokémon da sua mão no seu Banco, você poderá fazer com que seu oponente revele a mão dele.
Once during your turn, when you put this.es: Una vez durante tu turno, cuando pongas este Pokémon de tu mano en tu Banca, puedes hacer que tu oponente revele su mano.
Once during your turn, when you put this.it: Una sola volta durante il tuo turno, quando metti questo Pokémon dalla tua mano nella tua panchina, puoi chiedere al tuo avversario di rivelare la sua mano.
Once during your turn, when you put this.de: Einmal während deines Zuges, wenn du dieses Pokémon aus deiner Hand auf deine Bank legst, kannst du deinen Gegner seine Hand aufdecken lassen.
Once during your turn, when you put this.zh-tw: 在你的回合中，當你將這只神奇寶貝從你的手牌放到你的替補席上時，你可能會讓對手亮出他們的手牌。
Once during your turn, when you put this.fr: Une fois pendant votre tour, lorsque vous placez ce Pokémon de votre main sur votre Banc, vous pouvez demander à votre adversaire de révéler sa main.

Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.en:
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bladders
allow this Pokémon to survive the intense water
pressure of the deep sea.
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.fr:
Des écailles dures comme la pierre et des vessies natatoires remplies d'huile
permettre à ce Pokémon de survivre à l'eau intense
pression des profondeurs marines.
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.de:
Steinharte Schuppen und ölgefüllte Schwimmblasen
Erlaube diesem Pokémon, das intensive Wasser zu überleben
Druck der Tiefsee.
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.es:
Escamas duras como piedras y vejigas natatorias llenas de aceite.
permite que este Pokémon sobreviva al agua intensa
presión de las profundidades del mar.
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.zh-tw:
堅硬的鱗片和充滿油的魚鰾
讓這只神奇寶貝在激烈的水中生存
深海的壓力。
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.pt-br:
Escamas duras e bexigas natatórias cheias de óleo
permita que este Pokémon sobreviva à água intensa
pressão do mar profundo.
Rock-hard scales and oil-filled swim bla.it:
Scaglie dure come la roccia e vesciche natatorie piene di olio
permetti a questo Pokémon di sopravvivere all'acqua intensa
pressione del mare profondo.

Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.en:
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid
drifting seaweed. It eats rotten seaweed to
create its poison.
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.es:
Skrelp evade a sus enemigos escondiéndose entre
algas a la deriva. Come algas podridas para
crear su veneno.
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.fr:
Skrelp échappe à ses ennemis en se cachant au milieu
algues dérivantes. Il mange des algues pourries pour
créer son poison.
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.zh-tw:
Skrelp 通過隱藏在其中來躲避敵人
漂流的海藻。牠吃腐爛的海藻
創造其毒。
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.de:
Skrelp entkommt seinen Feinden, indem er sich inmitten versteckt
treibende Algen. Es frisst faule Algen
erschaffe sein Gift.
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.pt-br:
Skrelp foge de seus inimigos escondendo-se em meio
algas marinhas à deriva. Ele come algas podres para
criar seu veneno.
Skrelp evades its enemies by hiding amid.it:
Skrelp sfugge ai suoi nemici nascondendosi in mezzo
alghe alla deriva. Mangia alghe marce
creare il suo veleno.

Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.en:
Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were
trapped in an illusion and punished.
Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.fr:
Les histoires disent que ceux qui ont tenté d'attraper Zoroark étaient
piégé dans une illusion et puni.
Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.de:
Geschichten sagen, dass diejenigen, die versuchten, Zoroark zu fangen, es waren
in einer Illusion gefangen und bestraft.
Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.it:
Le storie dicono che coloro che hanno cercato di catturare Zoroark lo sono stati
intrappolato in un'illusione e punito.
Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.zh-tw:
故事稱那些試圖抓住索羅亞克的人是
陷入幻覺並受到懲罰。
Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.es:
Las historias dicen que aquellos que intentaron atrapar a Zoroark fueron
atrapado en una ilusión y castigado.
Stories say those who tried to catch Zor.pt-br:
As histórias dizem que aqueles que tentaram capturar Zoroark foram
preso em uma ilusão e punido.

Take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone.en: Take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

Tentacool is not a particularly strong s.en:

busca presas.

它，這個神奇寶貝開發了它用來

Dank Bakterien, die im Watt lebten
Dadurch hat dieses Pokémon die Organe entwickelt, die es benötigt

The Pokémon this card is attached to can.en: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use any attack from its previous Evolutions. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

This attack does 20 damage for each Benc.en: This attack does 20 damage for each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

This attack does damage to your opponent.en: This attack does damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

This attack does damage to your opponent.pt-br: Este ataque causa dano ao Pokémon Ativo do seu oponente igual ao dano que este Pokémon causa nele.

climas. No saldrá de su roca

its hormonal balance changes and it becomes aggressive.

Ce Pokémon est normalement calme, mais une fois qu'il entre en combat,

This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass.en:

Until this Pokémon leaves the Active Spo.en: Until this Pokémon leaves the Active Spot, this Pokémon's Rolling Frenzy attack does +30 damage. This effect stacks.

Until this Pokémon leaves the Active Spo.de: Bis dieses Pokémon den aktiven Bereich verlässt, verursacht der Angriff „Rollende Raserei“ dieses Pokémon +30 Schaden. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar.

once covered. What looks like a stone could be

una vez cubierto. Lo que parece una piedra podría ser
